choices: One of my friends had invited me over
A cousin of mine was staying for a while.
The rest of my family was out on vacation
Some neighbors wanted me to babysit
I was tied to my bed
1.content:
Somewhere in the States sat a small town, with all the important services but far from any other developed area. It seemed to be an island of civilization amidst untamed land, which isolated it from outside contact but also made it a beautiful contrast with the still natural surroundings. On the west side of town was the magnificently blue ocean, a field of dunes between the shore and the cliff upon which several houses were built, usually the bigger and more manor-like houses that belonged to the wealthier of the town. Everywhere else the town was fenced in by thick woodland, broken only by the many various trails and clearings that people liked to visit and travel through. A bit to the north, a small mountain rose up above the canopy of the forest, the peak breaking the top by just a bit. This was a good town, and this was where I lived.

Sunlight shone brightly through my bedroom window before landing on my face, rousing me from a sleep-in. Yawning, I took a look around my room.

The window to the right of my bed faced east, hence the rising sun waking me up each morning - far better than an alarm clock during the school year. Beneath the windowsill was a wooden desk, a place for both homework and leisure. Strewn across it was a mess of papers and books, though because it was summer break the space would soon be repurposed. But, being the prince of procrastination that I am, I decided to do that later.

In the wall to the left of the bed was my closet where I dump my clothes, as well as some tools that satisfy my tickling fascination. All my interests have made a home in there, and there is probably still some candy among the clutter too buried to be found again. Yet apart from my closet the rest of my room was pretty neat: between the foot of the bed and the door was a worktable where most of my non-paper related stuff happens, like inventive modifications to common house items and the occasional science project.

Familiar smells filled my nostrils, and beyond the window a bird chirped happily. All seemed at peace, a perfect summer morning. I was ready to sit up when I realized...
1.title: Summer Starts

11.content:
Though I may be a different drummer, I am actually quite sociable (much to the surprise of my parents). Several of my friends wanted to hang out with me, but because of the end of school homework rush I simply didn't have the time. With summer here though, I was able to catch up on a few invitations.

My friend since the first grade, Jenna is bursting with energy at all times. She's very outgoing and her natural charm has made her very popular. We may not always hang out with the same people and we don't always talk at lunch, but we're childhood friends and there's something about surviving the the competition with another stubborn kid that forges a strong friendship. It's been a while since we last hung out though, and she wants to fix that.

Catherine is an attractive tech geek, and a relatively new friend. To be honest, it's a wonder that she's still in high school with all her mechanical ingenuity. What started our friendship was our open sharing of tickling fantasies, inventing a lot of incredibly advances machinery that achieves those purposes. I've been her 'guinea pig' for these machines, something that I rather enjoy, and she has a whole new array of inventions.

One of my newest friends, Phoebe is both hot and popular, though not in the sense of distancing herself from 'nerds' and other kids like that. Actually, she's incredibly caring. We sat next to each other in history class and we just started talking, and before I knew it we were friends. We've confided some things in each other and built up a trusting relationship. For a while she's been asking if we could hang out together - somewhere alone.

Next door to me lives Maddie. She's very shy and quiet, but once she opens up she's very kind and caring. Our parents were close friends before we were born, and so Maddie and I grew up very close to each other. The friendship is an ancient one, but it is very enduring. She also tutors me in mathematics, of which my parents approve. Before summer she was especially quiet about something, and she asked me to come over soon.

Always doing something, Sharon is a balance of indoor and outdoor activities. When she's not playing sports or swimming in her pool she's reading books in her room or playing a video game on the TV. Her closet and shelves were so crammed that stuff was literally spilling onto the floor: footballs, baseballs, a basketball, books, games, and other odd items she's collected. She needed help getting organized, and I offered.
11.title: Invitations

111.content:
Having showered, changed and had a good breakfast, I decided to go see Jenna. The bubbly girl always knew what to do with those long summer days with the only difficulty arising when she couldn't make up her mind. This seemed to be the case when I made her way to her house and saw Jenna out on the porch, looking over three pieces of paper as she chewed her bottom lip in the adorable way she always did when trying to make up her mind. Due to the heat, she was wearing a tanktop that showed off a healthy amount of midriff along with shorts that ended midway down her thighs and bright pink sandals. She was an attractive girl, dark hair down to her shoulders that was tied up in a ponytail and nut brown skin with brown eyes that dazzled whenever she smiled, which was a lot.

Upon seeing me, Jenna smiled widely, her bright teeth almost dazzling before indicating a couple fliers she had in her hand "Just in time!" She announced "Got these in today about three new attractions opening up and I need your help to decide what we're going to see. There's the Kitchy Karnival opening up and it promises a load of rides with Kitchy the Klown having a huge show during it. We could always go to the beach of course, there's a huge crowd from school going so we could make a day of it there, you'll enjoy all the girls in swimsuits I imagine." She said with a giggle before presenting you with the final leaflet "There's also this traveling wrestling group arriving in town and they're offering prizes for two people who can enter and take on their own wrestlers. We could enter together!"

Placing down the leaflets, Jenna gave me a look "Which one do you want to go to then?"

After some thought, I eventually answered by saying "Let's go to the...
111.title: Bubbly Jenna

1111.content:
I always was a sucker for a good carnival and opted for that, Jenna nodding in agreement as she soon led the way towards the Kitchy Karnival. I'd heard about it, apparently it was a bit different than your typical circus and ride attraction but always left you with a smile on your face. Walking through the town on such a pleasant day felt good, Jenna constantly talking about something or other and I responded in kind, enjoying her company. It took half an hour to get to where the carnival was and I had a blast just from being with Jenna.

The carnival was huge, tents and attractions spreading out all over the place with the big top tent right in the very middle of it. Despite it being fairly early, I could see men and women all around us getting into things and it was already pretty busy. Jenna's eyes opened wide as she looked all over, unable to decide on what to do first. Just as I was having the same problem on what to do, a honking noise from behind us got our attention and turned to see a clown behind us.

She was in her mid twenties and quite your typical clown, white make up, red nose and frizzy orange wig. But with a bright smile under the make up she looked quite attractive along with a curvy figure that was highlighted by the tight fitting patchwork shirt and bright blue trousers. Her shoes were still enormous though and made squeaks with each step. Seeing that she had our attention, she gave a dramatic bow and a smile "Greetings chasers of chuckles! Grabbers of giggles! And welcome to the Kitchy Karnival! Allow me to give a preview of our attractions!"

With that, she stood back up and flicked her wrists, two large rainbow coloured feather dusters appearing in her hands seemingly from nowhere. Giving me a wink, she then briefly tickled Jenna's bare belly with the tools, brushing her belly with them as she swirled the feathers around her navel. Jenna instantly burst into laughter and backed away, swatting the dusters from her bare skin as she giggled.

"Marvelous!" The clown said "You'll fit in right here, at Kitchy Karnival!" She announced before handing the dusters over to me "Such a pretty giggle always needs encouragement!" She said as I took hold of the dusters and smiled at her.

"Not too much!" Jenna said although the grin on her face said encouragement was never out of the question really.

Laughing at Jenna's words, the clown indicated the carnival around us "And to which attraction first? The stalls with their delightful games such as 'Feather Dunk' and 'Hook the Prize'? Or maybe our rides with such excitement that the 'House of Giggles' and many others can give you? Or the main attraction, the Big Top Tent with our own clown show on where Kitchy herself will make an appearance? All are open to you."

I shared a look with Jenna that said it all. I looked to the clown and said "We'll go to the...
1111.title: ... Karnival."

choices: "One of us should go for it!"
"Let's see if there are any more exciting games!"
11111.content:
Jenna didn't wait long as she grabbed onto my hand and started to drag me towards the game stalls. There certainly was quite a large number as Jenna flitted from one to the other, trying to figure out which one to go for. The sound of laughter echoed around us as the games were (of course) ones where tickling played an important part of each one. Men and women were reduced to giggly messes from the various machines in the stalls as they pushed themselves to beat the challenges and gain the prizes. I saw Jenna's eyes light up with glee at the various sights in front of us and I kept the feather dusters the clown had given me tightly, feeling strangely safer for their presence.

Eventually, Jenna settled on one stall in particular as we watched a pretty blonde woman take part in the challenge. She was a rather buxom blonde woman looking to be in her late twenties who had stripped down to her bra as part of the challenge. Her legs were tied to the ground with some nylon rope while her body was held in place with a strap under her chest keeping her tied to a board that rested against her lower body. She held a bucket over her head while standing in front of a horizontal wheel as the challenge began. The wheel had dozens of feathers of all shapes and sizes sticking out of the edge and as the wheel spun, all of them brushed against the woman's belly, tickling her constantly The woman shook and laughed as she was tickled, her belly getting brushed with the plumes from one side directly to the other and each feather dipped into her navel before flicking out, only adding to her torment.

It didn't take long for the woman to break and she covered her bare belly with her hands, the bucket she was holding up fell and proved to be full of cold water as it splashed down on top of the woman, only adding to her squeals. A female clown went to untie her as well as giving the woman a towel to dry off as the crowd that had gathered gave a round of applause for the effort.

With the woman gone, the clown turned to the crowd and gave a cheery smile "Who's next to take out challenge?" She asked "The person to hold the bucket above their heads for one minute without spilling a drop wins the grand prize! Does anyone dare to see how much they can take of the dreaded tickle wheel?!"

Everyone in the audience looked around to see if anyone was willing to volunteer for the treatment as Jenna faced me with a grin. Before I could say anything, she said...
11111.title: Games

111112.content:
"C'mon, let's go see what other games there are!" Jenna said enthusiastically as she pulled my hand eagerly. Jenna could be just like a little kid sometimes, she was just so bubbly and happy all the time. It could be quite contagious sometimes.

"Haha, slow down, Jenna! Don't pull my arm out" I said, laughing as she tugged me along.

"Oooh, I wonder what this game is," she said, suddenly stopping in front of a large tent. Inside I could see that there were were rows of people in stocks and a small crowd watching the mirthful proceedings

"Glad you asked, dearie," a smartly-dressed young man with a colorful bowtie leaning against a sign outside the tent said. "Welcome to the Stocks of Fortune! Consider yourself a master tickler? Think you know the first thing about feathers?"

"Tickle them with the pointy end?" I offered, knowing full well it was meant as a rhetorical question.

"I wouldn't be so sure about that one, dear boy," the man shrugged. "But feel free to prove me wrong! Here at the Stocks of Fortune we give you the chance to showcase your tickling skills, and win some lovely prizes in the process!" He boomed loudly, reminding me a lot of those hammy game show hosts.

"Looks interesting. What's the game?" Jenna asked curiously.

"It's very simple, dear! Every stock has a number on it, from one to ten. If you can get our ticklish staff members to say 'stop', 'no more, ''mercy', or etc before the time limit, then you win a fabulous prize!"

"Time limit?" I asked, a little confused how this game worked.

"That's what the numbers are for, dear boy! Number five means you have five minutes to make 'em squeal for mercy! So choose wisely, the lower numbers will be easier, but the rewards will be smaller! I'm personally a fan of the higher numbers, as they say, take the risk, take the reward!" He gushed dramatically.

"What do you think, looks like fun, doesn't it? It'd be nice to not be on the receiving end of a tickling for once," Jenna giggled, prodding me in the ribs.

"What are you talking about? You tickle me more than I tickled you!" I chuckled, poking her back.

"So what do ya say, kids? It's fun for all ages!" The man said, trying to usher us in. I looked up at the colorful tent and bustling crowd inside.
111112.title: The Stocks of Fortune!

1111121.content:
"Two tickets please," I said, reaching for my wallet.

"Wonderful!" The smartly-dressed man smiled as he passed us two tickets and beckoned us in. "Good luck! Oh, and tell number one I said hi!"

It was brightly lit and noisy inside with the sound of chattering and laughter. I could see there were ten stocks filled with ten ticklish individuals, some of which were already giggling with laughter while others were just idly chit-chatting. I actually reasoned that this must be a rather cushy job. If no one came to challenge you, you just sat around and gossiped, right? I wondered if they were hiring...

"Alright, let's take a look around, okay?" Jenna said, grabbing hold of my arm again and dragging me along. We looked around, and saw that there was a big crowd around number one, a petite brown-haired wearing a sundress whose feet seemed incredibly responsive. Checking out her soft-looking feet with metallic red toenail polish it wasn't that surprising. She looked like she had barely walked a day in her life, her feet seemed jumpy to every touch and were constantly wiggling and flexing.

I also noticed that there was a toolbox and a sign next to her feet that stated which tools were allowed to be used. It seems for the delightfully sensitive girl at stocks number one only feathers and fingers were allowed. Apparently her feet were so sensitive that even those could make her beg for mercy. And after watching for a few minutes, I realized that she probably gave up three out of every five times, and even when she didn't her girlish laughter and squirming was so adorable the losers would often want to play again.

Seeing that Jenna was biting her lip, looking rather enraptured at the sight of a handsome blonde boy getting his feet tickled in stocks three, I began feeling a little jealous. I couldn't resist sneaking up behind her and squeezing her sides, making her yelp, jolting her from her trance as she turned to me. "Let's check out the other end, I like big gambles, don't you?" I smiled.

"Yeah, okay," she nodded, tearing her eyes away from the pretty boy in the stocks. I made a mental note to remember to ask if they were hiring, because while I was watching the show at stocks number one, I had also noticed that quite there were quite a few gals having a good time here, especially the pretty ones in the stocks. This would also be a great place to go looking for dates who also shared my interest, I'm sure.

Down at the end of the row there weren't as many people, probably because of the high difficulty and the higher wagers. Though the technique at this end was noticeably higher, as I watched a brown-haired middle-school girl I vaguely recognized tickle a dark-haired Chinese girl practically to tears at number nine. I noticed that while stocks number one had only allowed feathers and fingers, at number ten it seemed more devilish tickling weapons were allowed as I watched the young girl apply a toothbrush to great effect, scrubbing the soles and toes of the stocked girl's pale feet and never letting up for a moment. The middle-schooler was ruthless and meticulous, scrubbing all over the wiggling feet and following them wherever they went. The cute Chinese girl tried to curl her toes up to cover the vulnerable skin between them, but her tormentor would just casually grab her toes with one hand, pry them back, and began to wave the toothbrush underneath the sensitive digits, causing the victim to go ballistic and squeak with laughter. I could see that the Chinese girl kept trying to scrunch her feet shut, but the middle-schooler still managed to keep them pinned back with ease.

To make things even worse for the stocked Asian girl, the middle-schooler kept on teasing her, making it even more embarrassing and humiliating that a younger girl was able to making her squeal with laughter like this.

"Coochee Coochee Coo! Can't believe you're a nine, this is too easy!" she giggled, continuing to tease the Chinese feet with glee, scratching each and every ticklish nook and cranny,

"Ohohohohokay! Nohoho more! Mehehercy!" the pale-skinned girl in the stocks said, giggling hysterically.

"Hear that? Victory is mine!" the middle-school girl cheered triumphantly as a clapping stall assistant next to the stocks passed her a giant teddy bear. "Oh, hey!" she said, greeting me. "This carnival sure is fun, huh?"

My mind whirred for a bit and I realized where I had recognized her from. This girl was Katelyn, a neighbor of mine who also had a reputation in her middle-school for pulling pranks. It also seemed like she was a veteran tickler. The egg timer on the stocks said she still have a full two minutes to go.

"Hey, Katelyn. You sure are good at this," I said, before realizing she and Jenna had never met and introduced them to each other.

"Hi, Jenna, nice to meet you. This big boy over here's a nice guy, but you gotta make sure he doesn't step out of line," she giggled, as she poked me in the ribs, which Jenna took as her cue to poke me from the other side now.

"Hehehey, stop it, girls!" I said, batting her fingers away.

"Wow, you didn't even last ten seconds. You should be in stocks number one," Jenna laughed, with Katelyn quickly joining in.

A few moments later, Katelyn's eyes went to her watch. "Oh, snap, I'm late. I said I'd meet some of my friends at this time. Have fun you two! See you later, big boy!" she called as she skipped off.

"Huh, fancy running into her here," I muttered. "So what do you want to play, Jenna? Want to take our chances on the high numbers? Or go for a lower number first to get warmed up?"
1111121.title: Feeling Lucky?

11111211.content:
"Let's get our confidence up first, shall we? Besides, I've seen you tickle before, you're not that good," I said, sticking my tongue out. She made a face and reached out and made a lunge at my sides, but I sidestepped and dodged her. "See, what I mean? You need a warm-up," I said taking her arm and steering her to the number four stocks, the blonde boy I had seen her looking at earlier.

"Feeling lucky, sweetheart?" The blondie said, wiggling his feet at her. I was actually taken aback for a moment, that guy was really a dedicated worker. I saw Jenna shoot me a big grin. I shrugged, grinning back and gave her a pat on the back.

"I know, I am considerate and awesome," I said, looked around and seeing that there was no line at number five either. An idea just popped into my head. "Come to think of it, you think you're really good right? Up for a little wager?"

Jenna raised her eyebrows and laughed. "Let's do it, bring it on!"

"I'll take number five," I said, gesturing to my thumb at the red-haired girl in stocks five, "I betcha I can win before you. Loser has to volunteer to go into the stocks. Sound fair?"

"Oh, you are so on..." she said competitively, clapping her hands together and rubbing them. "You're going down..." she said playfully.

After paying the stall assistants at number three and four we both sat down at the stools in front of our victim's feet. We gestured to the assistants and told them to start their timers at the same time because we were having a little contest. And then I turned my attention to the cute girl whose feet were mine to play with for the next few minutes.

"Hi. Since you're a number four, I take it you're plenty ticklish?"

"You'll have to work that out for yourself, boy," the redhead smiled, wiggling her feet at me. "But I'm not nearly as ticklish as blondie over there," she gestured. Out of the corner of my eye I saw Jenna do a fist-pump. "Oh, and I heard about your bet with your girl over there," she said, looking evilly at me, "I think I'm going to try extra hard to endure this round. My break is after this, and it's not often you get a bit of good ol' revenge tickling," she said, giving me a sinister grin.

I shrugged, trying to seem nonchalant. "I like a challenge, besides; as I'm sure you'll find out soon, I'm pretty good at this. You'd be surprised how much practice I get," I boasted, wiggling my fingers near her feet, which instantly clenched up as soon as they went close.

"Hey, no cheating! We haven't started yet," Jenna called out as it looked like I had started prematurely, as the assistants were still setting things up.

"Fine, fine," I replied as retracted my hands and instead looked at what tools I had been offered, at number four I had four minutes to make her cry for mercy so all I had in my disposal was a sash of ribbon which I wasn't actually how I was meant to use. Surely they weren't meant to be used to tie here toes back, the stocks already had string that went around the captives' big toes to prevent movement. I picked up the ribbon and looked at it and wondered how I was supposed to use it.

I supposed one could use the ends of the ribbon to lightly tickle her feet, though I rather doubted they would cause extreme laughter, but I suppose it still tickled a little bit, nevertheless. Better than nothing, I reasoned. Jenna leaned over and saw my tool and chuckled, waving her bristly hairbrush at me. "You're going down! A ribbon versus a hairbrush! No contest!" She said confidently. The assistants setting up the timers looked to the two of us, gesturing they were ready to begin.

"It's go time. Get ready to lose!" Jenna said, turning to the tanned feet of the stocked boy in front of her. She could get awfully competitive at times, but I wasn't about to go down without a fight, as I concentrated my attention and the wiggling pale feet in front of me. The toes were tightly clenched, revealing black nail polish on as both feet shivered in anticipation.

I reached up and tickled lightly across the top of the toes, prompting the toes of that foot to spread up and outwards. I was willing to beat those toes were ticklish, just about every girl was ticklish there. But before I went all-out on her toes, I danced my fingers across both smooth soles at the same time, wanting to gauge her reactions and get a comparison before I played with those flexing toes. To my dismay I had been at these for almost half a minute and there was no still laughter. I could hear rapid, heavy breaths and occasional snorts from my redheaded captive. This might be a little harder than I thought. To further demoralize me, I could hear that Jenna already had the blonde boy giggling hysterically, as she scrubbed the toothbrush up, down and all over. So, she was trying to hold it in, eh? I had an idea of how to deal with that.

"Holding is in only gonna make it worse!" I said, as just using my index fingers, I rapidly traced lines up and down the arch of a foot, alternating between the two, before stroking up and down both feet simultaneously. This light tickling actually seemed more effective in getting her to giggle, I gradually added more and more fingers till I was using all ten fingers and she was having to really try hard to clamp down and hold back the laughter building up inside.

"Bahahahahaha!" She giggled. I grinned triumphantly, having finally made her burst into sweet laughter. I glanced over at the clock and saw that I had taken a minutes and a half just to get her laughing. Alright, I would need a hell of a reversal to win this now, Jenna was now making her target shout with laughter and it sounded like he was close to giving up.

I looked up at the redhead grinning at me confidently, she seemed proud she had managed to hold out so long, if I wanted to turn it around I would have to use some desperate measures. Time to go for broke!
11111211.title: Easy Money, Right?

111112111.content:
Figuring I was going to lose unless I did something drastic, I formulated a plan. It was a desperate gamble, but I was betting with an intense attack I could coax a reflexive "stop, please" out of her.

Using the fact I already had her giggling to my advantage, I began stroking across each of her toes, aiming for the pads and teasing her pale toes with quick little strokes. She would clench her toes defensively, but I would persistently weave my fingers through her toes just to let a finger slip in and tickle those fleshy undersides. Miraculously this move paid dividends, as soon I had her squeaking and giggling. Then still attacking her feet with my left hand, I reached down with the right and retrieved the ribbon. I had just had an idea of exactly how to use it. I stopped tickling her toes long enough to slip the ribbon between the big toe and second toe on her left foot. Then, carefully watching the redhead's expression for if it was working, I slid the ribbon back and forth, up and down and all over delicate skin between her toes. I saw her face screw up in a grimace for a second from the unique, but no less ticklish sensation, before she broke out into blasts of hysterical giggles. It seemed it had been quite effective, but the drawback was manoeuvringa the ribbon between her toes took both hands.

I was gambling that using the ribbon had her right on the edge of surrendering, and that one little surprise push was all I needed to get her to give up. I chanced a glance over at how Jenna was doing, the blonde boy was shrieking in an oddly high-pitch and looked like he was close to breaking too.

Alright, time to break out my last resort, I leaned down and lapped at the toes on her foot without the ribbon with my tongue. Half-expecting the assistant to call me out for cheating. Nothing happened however, as all that transpired was that her giggles got deeper and heavier as a result of the oral tickling. Thankfully the toe-ties around her big toes prevented her feet from moving anywhere, which made life easier. After a few moments of this, I heard exactly what I wanted to her "Comehohohhoon Sthahahp it! Sthap!" I gestured to the stall assistant and when he nodded and stopped the egg timer, I raise my hands and cheered, feeling like I had just won a championship.

I glanced over at Jenna who had stopped tickling and was scratching her head. "I can't believe you pulled that off!" She exclaimed.

"Haha, don't feel down. You can pick the prize," I said, feeling jubilant at my victory, as I stood up to talk to the assistant. The redhead whose feet I had just licked stepped out of the stocks and slipped her feet into a pair of flip-flops and stuck her hand out.

"I gotta admit I'm impressed. Most boys don't have the guts to pull stuff like that," she laughed. "You got me there. I'm Amber, visit us again sometime. Next time you won't win!" She vowed, patting my shoulder as she walked off. I grinned at her, as I watched her walk off.

Jenna was giggling as she selected a big plushie as a prize. She hugged it as we both stood up and walked away from the stocks to let someone else have a go. "That sure was fun, wasn't it?" She smiled cheerfully, as she slipped her arm around mine.

"It sure was. But don't think being all sweet to me is going to make me forget you just lost the bet."

She laughed but noticeably still kept her arm around mine. I wondered if she had really fun and she maybe didn't really mind her upcoming ordeal. She was a really fun girl to be around, so it wouldn't have surprised me.

"So what do you want to do now?" She asked.
111112111.title: Defy the Odds

11111212.content:
"I like a challenge, don't you?" I asked rhetorically. "Let's go for a big gamble, I think we sort of know what we're doing. Well, I do anyway," I smiled confidently.

"Alright then, mister big shot," Jenna laughed. "How about eight?" I turned and looked at the girl in stocks number eight.

"Don't we know her?" I asked.

"Yes, we do," Jenna answered cheerfully as she strolled over to the number eight stocks and greeted their occupant. "Hey, Lizzy! Didn't think I'd see you here!"

Lizzy, also known as just Liz, was an blonde-haired Australian-born girl who had immigrated here and had a part-time job as a lifeguard at the local swimming pool. It didn't surprise me that she got along so well with Jenna as they had a lot in common: friendliness, a mutual love of coffee, and from what I could tell, ticklishness. "Hey, Jenna! Nice to see you! What brings you here?" she replied.

"Oh, y'know, just checking out some of the games here with the big guy over here," Jenna said, gesturing at me. "What are you doing here anyway?"

"Just searching for some money, and here they pay you just to be ticklish. Looked like it might be kinda fun too!" Liz smiled.

"Haha, well, we don't want your boss to see you just chit-chatting. So we better play this game of yours," Jenna said, winking mischievously to her friend. "I got this one, just sit back and watch the master at work," Jenna said confidently, turning to me. I nodded and decided to just sit back and enjoy the show. A cutie tickling another cutie was almost always an entertaining sight. I deeply considered taking my camera-phone out, but annoyingly enough the recording function had broken recently.

I went up and paid for the game as the assistant set up the egg-timer for eight minutes. Jenna wiggled her fingers at her Australian friend.

"I'm digging in. I totally remember how ticklish your feet are from that time I invited you over for a sleepover," Jenna grinned playfully. I was imagining erotic pillow fights when laughter jolted me from my fantasy.

It seemed Jenna had already begun and she had picked up two feathers that seemed to be her tools for this round. She ran both feathers up the blonde girl's soles at the same time, from heel to toes. The feet clenched and unclenched spasmodically as the feathers moved, enough that Jenna was able to dip the tips of the feathers into the bases of Liz’s toes as she went past them.

Jenna, giggling at her friend's reaction, grabbed the toes of the right foot and traced one feather's tip all over the stretched arches, slightly pink balls and heels, between the captive's toes and along the edges of the feet as she heard giggling. The left foot was far enough away that it couldn't reach to interfere with her as she played and played with the other foot, but it bucked and flexed energetically as she continued. She turned the feather around, and used the stiff quill end to sew up and down the soles, causing the toes she held to twitch and flex.

Sniffing blood, Jenna grabbed the foot around the arch and held it steady. Now with only her toes able to move, Liz's toes started wiggling back and forth to no avail. Using the tip of the feather, Jenna teased and stroked the tender webs of skin between the Australian girl's bubble-like toes.

11113.content:
The clown grinned widely at us, "Marvelous! Kitchy's shows always leave people laughing!" She accentuated her point with another quick tickle to Jenna's belly, causing the girl in question to giggle and back away a little more.

"I have heard of Kitchy's...playful reputation." My friend said.

"Oh, you have the right of it. The Countess of Chuckles is known to have lots of fun with those who see her shows." She paused, and smirked with amusement. "Though, if you're one of the lucky ones, you might not even be able to pay attention to the show."

Jenna and I looked at each other with confusion. "What do you mean by that?" I asked. "Wouldn't we want to be paying attention to the show?"

The clown chuckled. "You'll find out for yourself when you go to the seat ticket booth. Either way, have fun at the Big Top!" She waved at us as she walked away, laughing quietly to herself.

Jenna turned to me nervously. "What do you think she meant? Lucky ones? Who wouldn't want to pay attention to the show?"

I shrugged back. "Only one way to find out, I suppose." Jenna nodded her agreement, and the two of turned toward the Gigantic Tent, and started walking, with me giving Jenna a quick tickle with the feather dusters any time something caught her attention. Eventually, the ticket booth came into view with a fairly long line still ahead of us.

Eventually, after a few minutes of waiting, and talking quietly to ourselves, we got to the ticket booth, to find a clown who looked like he was in his mid-thirties, next to a big spinner that had five slender gold lines in star formation standing out against the rest of the blue board.

"Why hello kids!" The clown greeted. "I haven't seen you guys here before. New to the Karnival?" He asked, to which we nodded yes to. "Splendid! Well let me explain how this works! There's two types of seats in the big top. The first, and much more common are the blue ticket seats. They're about what you'd expect from normal circus seats. You'll be surrounded by other people, you'll be expected to not disturb the show, and you run the risk of catching the attention of Kitchy when she starts looking for volunteers from the audience to join her show. Which, don't get me wrong, would be fun and put a smile on your face. However, there's another, luckier place to sit. Centered around near the top of the tent, are ten sound proof boxes. We call these gold ticket seats. In there, you'll have privacy from the rest of the tent, you won't be called on by Kitchy, and since it's soundproof, you don't need to worry about disturbing the show. But! There's a catch." Jenna and I exchanged glances. "There's only one actual 'seat' up there. The other one is actually a set of stocks positioned so your face is pointed toward the glass in the box. One of you will be stripped to your underwear and immobilized in the stocks, the other will get to sit in the chair and inflict whatever ticklish desire they have on the poor person. Now you can see why they're sound proof. Which person is stocked is up to you. So far, 4 of the boxes have been taken up. Now, I can just give you blue tickets if you want, but if you're feeling lucky, we can give the spinner a...well, a spin, and see if you hit gold!"

Jenna and I looked at each other, not even needing to discuss this. We both already knew what we were gonna choose. I looked at the clown and said...

Even if I would stay fully clothed, unlike up there I suppose." She looked at the box almost wistfully, and I gave her a mischievous grin.

"Well tell you what. If the public exposure is the problem, I'll just head up to the stage if she points our way, and when we leave and go back home, I can tickle you in private. I won't even make you strip down." I said, then added: "Unless you want to of course."

1112.content:
While I would have been happy to hang around Jenna in any circumstances, getting to see her in a bikini sealed the deal. That didn't seem to cross her mind however and she agreed to meet me here at her place once we were ready. I quickly rushed home and changed into some swimming trunks and a t-shirt, grabbing a bag for some towels and food and water bottles. Remembering to grab some sun cream as well, I then walked back to Jenna's and saw her standing there, eagerly waiting, a bag over her shoulder and wearing a large white t-shirt that covered all the way down past her thighs.

Upon seeing me wave, she bounced over to the street. "Finally got here then?" she teased.

"Wouldn't miss it for the world," I replied, and Jenna actually looked fairly bashful at that, giving a sweetly shy smile and a hint of a blush coloring her cheeks. Hooking her arm in with mine, we started walking towards the beach. I felt a smile cross my face as Jenna did that. She always had been a very affectionate person, something I'd always liked about her.

"Some might think we're a couple going like this," I said, growing rather fond of the idea.

Jenna laughed as we descended the steps and saw the beach itself before us, the golden sands and azure sea calling out. "I'll just tell people you're here to cool me down with a big leafy fan. That's a lot more believable!"

Taking it in good humor, I covered my mouth in mock outrage. "Me? A mere servant?" I retorted, sneaking a hand down to Jenna's side and tickling her gently, squeezing the spot just below the ribs.

The tickling made Jenna throw her head back and laugh as she squirmed away from me. "Nohohofaiirahahaaa!!!" she protested as I held on and continued to give her ribs tickly pinches, making her jump and giggle for some time before she gave in. "Ohohoookahhaayeheheee!!! Youwinnhahahaaaa!!!" she giggled before I finally stopped, letting her catch her breath.

"So I'm not just a servant then?" I asked, beaming as Jenna smiled up at me.

"Not anymore. Now you've been upgraded to some guy I know," she said, and just managed to dodge my outstretched hands as I tried to tickle her again. She stuck her tongue out at me playfully and I had to chuckle as well. Jenna always managed to get people to smile, most of the time even without tickling them. Most of the time.

We walked out onto the beach together, chatting away about where would be a good spot when we found a rather secluded area between two dunes. It was protected from the wind and gave us a good view of the sea itself while also having the sun shining down on it. It was a perfect place to sit and we set our stuff down, wondering what to do. Then Jenna looked over the beach and saw something...

11123.content:
I followed Jenna's gaze and soon understood her mood shift. Walking over to us were Alicia, Mary, and Kimberly, three eighteen year old girls who stuck together tighter than glue. They all came from wealthy families who lived on the edge of town, and each of them was daddy's little girl. They banded together at a young age and since then have always needed to be the center of attention of everything. They constantly talked and talked to anybody willing to listen, and then anybody who wasn't willing to listen for that matter. I had begun to hope that with school over I wouldn't have to see them again, but I guess I was sorely mistaken.

The leader of the trio was named Alicia, a strawberry-blonde with curls down to her shoulders and cold blue eyes. She was the shortest of the three, her small body clad in a red bikini, but she also had the loudest mouth of them as well. What she lacked in size she compensated with volume. A hundredfold. She had a cute button nose that was more often than not twisted into an arrogant smirk, usually when she was degrading somebody else or boasting about all the cool stuff she had. And when she wasn't boasting or taunting, she was lounging around in barely acceptable clothing, doing her best to show off her body at all angles.

Mary was the tallest and most athletic of the group, her blue bikini doing nothing to hide the years of gymnastics class. Her jet black hair was always tied into a ponytail, which reached her lower back, so it wouldn't fall into her green eyes when she went running. Always right behind Alicia, she often supplemented the blonde's insults with a few jeers or threatening gestures, happy to let blondie do all the hard talking. Despite her less frontal role, most of the devious ideas and tricks that the group did were her's and as such you could always expect to see a sparkle of mischief in her eyes whenever she looked at you. Maybe she'd be planning just how to embarrass you enough to keep quiet and stay out of their way.

Finally, there was the redhead, Kimberly. Her ginger hair fell freely down her back, and a splotch of freckles dotted her face. And most of her upperbody too, as the yellow bikini she wore exposed a lot of skin and freckles covered a lot of it. Despite clinging onto Alicia and Mary, she wasn't actually a bad girl. In fact, had she never met the other two, I could definitely see her being a naturally popular person. But Alicia somehow managed to get Kimberly to cling to them, doing whatever they said. She was that timid good girl that ended up in the wrong crowd. And it was too bad as well, she had a very lovely smile when she wasn't around Alicia or Mary.

If there was one thing they had going for them, it was that they were, by every standard, smoking hot. It was something they make clear at all times, both in what they talked about and what they wore, and I must confess my eyes were drawn to their bikini-clad bodies more than I would have liked. They had gathered quite a following by the end of high school, a club that treated them like Queens and served their every whim. And anyone who wasn't part of this club was beneath them, and they treated these people (which was most of the school actually) worse than dirt, though Jenna always got the worst of it when she was around. Her natural friendliness and popularity got her pegged as a rival from the start, the three brats constantly trying to pull attention away from Jenna and towards themselves. Jenna managed to keep above it through good humor and sometimes just leaving, but I felt for a while that she was reaching the end of her patience.

"Well look at this. If it isn't Jenna and her little boyfriend," Alicia sneered as she walked over to us, Mary and Kimberly in tow.

"And we're here to have a good time. If you don't like that, feel free to stick your head in the sand," Jenna replied, and as I visualized the three of them actually doing that I couldn't help but snort, which got Alicia and Mary glaring daggers at me. I shrugged apologetically, but still couldn't resist smiling. It had happened many times before, it would happen many times again.

"Actually, we came here to issue a challenge," Alicia said, her eyes narrowing, clearly displeased that we were trying to blow her off. "The three of us have a beach ball net set up further into the dunes, nice and secluded. I want us to have a match there, you and your boytoy against me and Mary."

This was probably one of the worst trap setups ever. That didn't matter to Jenna though. "Why?" she asked.

An evil glint in Alicia's eye told me that she was ready to reel Jenna in, and also mentioned volumes of mischief she had in store for us. "I just want to take you on in a fair game is all. I'm tired of you acting like we're not important, that you're somehow better." Jenna rolled her eyes, clearly tired of this girl's hypocrisy. I shrugged, trying to take a relatively neutral stance, though I too was growing weary of hearing the double-standard these three constantly used. Alicia glared at both of us before continuing. "As I was saying, I'm tired of your attitude and want to settle this once and for all. If we beat you, then you have to pay a penalty forfeit."

"Same for you when you lose Alicia," Jenna snapped, although from the look on Alicia's face I could tell that thought hadn't even crossed her mind.

"Yeah sure, whatever," Alicia replied with an arrogant shrug. "So are you up for it Jenna, or you too scared that we'll humiliate you?"

As mentioned previously, this was possibly one of the worst trap setups ever. Outnumbered in a secluded area with three girls (well, two) that hated us? It practically yelled trick. And I highly doubted that these girls would play fair. But when I looked at Jenna, I could tell she was a bit more conflicted. She'd endured these brats for years, and now she was being directly challenged. She figured something was up too, but the chance to rub it into these snots if we won? The thought was very appealing.

It didn't take long for Jenna to reply as she said...
11123.title: Daddy's Little Girl (Times Three)

111231.content:
As Jenna agreed to the challenge, Alicia and Mary both wore really nasty smirks, and I definitely was having second thoughts. They had something planned and weren't even trying to hide it. Nevertheless, we were in now and there was no backing out . "We'll take you to the spot," Alicia said before looking down at Jenna's shirt. "And leave that behind. If you're going to play volleyball with us, at least leave your rags so I don't have to look at them."

"If you're jealous of my clothes, Alicia, don't be afraid to admit it," Jenna retorted, but she did take the shirt off as we both knew it'd just get in the way during a volleyball match. Underneath was a tye-dye bikini, the same patterns and colours of a 60's hippy shirt and it actually looked really good on her. I couldn't help but ogle her a bit, and when I brought my eyes back up to eye level I saw a hint of jealousy in Alicia's eyes. Throwing the towel over to the rest of our stuff, Jenna regarded the three standing before us with a smirk. "So, you going to take us to this secret spot? Or you having second thoughts?"

"In your dreams," Alicia replied with a glare as she turned and started walking. Kimberly and Mary followed suit as Jenna and I made up the rear after we had picked up our bags. To anybody watching, we could have been old friends going to play a friendly game. We were anything but.

"You sure about this?" I whispered, my gaze cast forward and downward. I must admit, there were worse places to be than behind three very attractive girls with equally attractive butts. That each butt was wearing only little more than underwear made it even better. Even if two out of three of them belonged to arrogant bullies.

"Relax, we can take them in volleyball easily," Jenna replied. Then she noticed I wasn't looking at her, and when she followed my stare she elbowed my ribs. "That is if you can keep from drooling at their eye candy."

"Got it, I'll just drool at yours instead," I answered, looking down at her bikini-clad body and earning a playful swat on the arm. Both Jenna and I started to giggle, making the three in front of us turn around and look at us oddly. Deciding it wasn't important, Alicia continued on without a word, evidently not wanting to get into an argument just yet. Mary glared at us suspiciously for a few seconds before following, and Kimberly just nervously tagged along. My voice dropping to a whisper, I continued talking with Jenna. "You know there's no way they're gonna play fair."

"I know," she whispered back, "but we're good enough that a few miscalls shouldn't matter. Don't worry, we got this." She gave me a huge smile, and I couldn't help but share it.

I just wished I could share her confidence.

It was five minutes before we reached the spot Alicia spoke of, finding that the net had already been set up. The setup was near a sandy cove, with dunes blocking us from both the wind and any passing eyes. A five-minute walk was quite a distance, and the chances of anybody passing by were slim. I realized with a sudden shock that it was just the five of us on our own, and I began thinking of how potentially vulnerable I and Jenna were. Looking at the three brats disarmed me. I couldn't see them being physical threats. Though you could never be too careful, and I was sure they'd thought of something.

After dropping our stuff over at the bottom of a nearby dune, Jenna and I checked out the net and couldn't see anything suspicious. It wasn't until I scanned the surroundings that I noticed two big holes in the ground nearby. They couldn't have been made naturally so I called over to Alicia. "Lemme guess, those are for the losers?"

Alicia nodded. "Yeah, those are part of the penalty," she replied. "The losing team, that will be you two, will lie down in those and get buried."

I quickly did a mental calculation, looking at the sea and the sun. The tides wouldn't reach this far inland, so murder wasn't her objective. "What sort of penalty is that?" Jenna asked, curious.

"Let's just say we've noticed that you two enjoy tickling," Alicia answered as she grinned at us.

"And to be honest, we want to see why you like it too," Mary followed up with, sharing a look with Alicia that told me they were honestly interested. Behind them, I noticed Kimberly was nervously looking up at me and back at her feet, blushing deeply.

I felt heat grow in my cheeks as well as I realized that the holes were short enough that anybody in them would have their feet sticking out and deep enough that a few body parts could be dug down to without freeing the victim. On the other hand, Jenna was grinning from ear to ear. "OK, not a bad idea. Anything that lets us make you three a pile of giggling wrecks is OK by me." She got into position by the net while Alicia and Mary fumed at the thought of getting trapped in those holes. Kimberly just blushed even more furiously. "So how do you want to play this?"

"The rules should be simple enough for even you to understand," Alicia replied as she and Mary got into place. "First team to score ten points wins. Kimberly will be keeping count from the side to make sure neither of you cheat."

Jenna rolled her eyes again at the hypocrisy, the notion we'd be the ones cheating when the ref was clearly in their pocket. Then again, Kimberly might be a bit more fair than either of the other two. Alicia had the ball first, and as she got into position I briefly imagined her in one of those holes, her feet sticking out and subjected to the tickling Jenna and I were giving them. Tearing my mind away from those happy thoughts, I focused on the match at hand as Alicia threw the ball into the air and struck, starting the game.
