Mary grinned in response as she moved next to Jenna's exposed ribs and Kimberly slowly made her way over to sit on Jenna's sand covered calves.

"What're you doing?!" I demanded. "You're supposed to be tickling me!" I saw Jenna glare at her captor that was soon stopped as Alicia took the fluffy feather in her hand and brush it up and down slowly across her belly. Instantly, Jenna let out a series of giggles out of her mouth that sounded quite sweet. The feather twirled around the sand covered stomach, brushing the grains off and then tickling the soft skin underneath, trailing the plume slowly in a circle around the toned belly. Jenna spluttered and giggled as she failed to hold in her laughter as the feather traced around her stomach in a slow and torturous fashion.

Despite my shouted protests for the tickling to stop, the three ignored me as Mary started with her own ticklish assault, poking her ribs, one after another as she start to keep count. Mary prodded each of Jenna's ribs in turn, the constant poking finally bringing Jenna's laughter higher and louder as the floodgate opened from that and the feather tickling her belly. Jenna started to laugh hard as Mary simply started squeezing her ribcage with both hands, her fingers digging in with obvious glee on Mary's part as she smiled in delight at Jenna's screams of laughter.

Kimberly remained the most reluctant to start tickling, but seeing her friends do it, she seemed to resign herself to the fact she had no choice. She began by tickling Jenna's thighs lightly, her nails gliding over the skin without pause as she tried to avoid Alicia's wrath. The tickling drove Jenna over the edge though as the three way assault, even if one was from a feather and the other half-hearted soft tickles on her thighs, completely overwhelmed her. Jenna arched up her chest, her breasts poking upwards in a way that caught my eye despite the situation.

This was torture for both of us. Jenna had her boundaries trodden on and shoved in her face, and I couldn't bear to see my friend like this. Though despite the fact Jenna was far beyond her limit, I had to admit I was enjoying the sight before me as the terrible trio tickled Jenna out of her mind. Jenna's body writhed and wriggled as the tickling did its magic "OHHHHAHAHHAAGGGAAHHAADD!!!! ICAAHAHHAANNNTTAHHAEKEEHEEIITEEEHTTTT!!!" Jenna screamed as her belly, ribs and thighs were tickled and exploited at the same time. Alicia's eyes gleamed as she tickled around Jenna's navel, the feather stroking just along the edges, provoking even higher screams of laughter from Jenna.

Despite my protests and Jenna's screaming with laughter, the tickling went on for a good long while before Alicia finally stopped and the other two followed suit. Beneath them, Jenna panted heavily, her hair sticking to her face and her body shining with sweat from her exertion. Jenna's chest heaved as she tried to get breath back in her lungs and I noticed that she looked ready to start begging for mercy if the tickling started again, pride or no pride.
11123122212.title: Twisted Karma

111231222121.content:
"While this has been fun." Alicia said "I think tickly little Jenna here has learned her lesson. Isn't that right?" She asked, reaching down and pinching Jenna on the cheek. Jenna, who was still gulping for air, couldn't even form a proper response and simply took the insult, her face plastered with hair sticking to her from the sweat. The sand trapping her legs and feet hadn't moved much considering the fact she must have been wriggling madly underneath it. I just hoped that she would be able to break free at some point, I doubted Alicia and the others were going to be that eager in digging us free.

"Are you OK?" I called over to Jenna who looked over to me and nodded. She seemed too exhausted to make a proper response but she went for a smile to reassure me, something I returned in kind. At least I knew she hadn't gone insane from so much tickling. I turned back to face those in front of me and saw that Alicia, Mary and Kimberly had already taken up position by my feet. Mary was at my left, Kimberly on my right and Alicia sat in between them, her hands able to go for both at the same time. Not wanting to appear spooked, I wriggled my toes at them daringly "Like what you see ladies?" I taunted, awaiting for the attack with equal amounts of dread and eagerness.

Alicia raised an eyebrow at that and I noticed they hadn't brought the feathers with them, they were going full force from the outset "Now that's the attitude I want to curb." Alicia announced as she brought her hands close to my feet, wriggling her fingers and long nails a hair's breath away from my soles. I couldn't stop myself from smiling in anticipation and clenching my toes in defence of the oncoming onslaught "Ooh, someone is ticklish aren't they?" Alicia taunted "I can see why you want him Jenna, ticklish little boys like this one must be a lot of fun to have around!"

I went to make a response to this only for it to be cut short when Alicia struck my by surprise, raking her long nails up my exposed soles. I let out a howl of laughter as that proved to be the signal for Mary and Kimberly to strike. My thoughts about them having tickled before gained more weight as I felt them pull back my toes, exposing the base of my digits before they started tickling them with their nails wriggling against my toes. Alicia joined in with a hand on each foot, tickling the heels of my feet with constant flicks of her nails.

Despite the sand, I threw my head back as much as possible and screamed with laughter from the four hand tickling assault on my feet. I was denied the luxury of even wriggling them about as Kimberly and Mary kept a firm grip on my toes, not letting them budge an inch. Now more than ever I was glad of the fact I was buried in sand as the fact I was enjoying this would have obvious if I'd been free. Despite that though, I had to make sure they didn't realise that, they might have just gone back to Jenna if they knew I wanted more tickling.

"STTAHAAHHAAPP!!!" I screamed through my laughter, the pleading only seeming to encourage their efforts as Kimberly and Mary tickled all of my toes at the same time, their fingers scratching at the very base of my toes, teasing as high as they could before going back down to the bottoms to start all over again. The tickling on my soles also sped up, Alicia moving up from my heels to the rest of my feet in a flurry of ticklish assault. Her long nails scraped against my feet from the arches to heels at random shots, the tickling never ending as she found new spots to tickle and tease all over my hyper-sensitive feet.

I wasn't sure how long the punishment lasted for but I was screaming the entire time, half enjoying the punishment I was being given until I started to feel tears fall down my cheeks. As ticklish as Jenna was, I was finding out I was even worse as the triple tickle attack was getting too much even for me and I went into silent laughter, trying to gasp for air through the silent screams I gave out under the ticklish treatment.

Eventually, I felt the fingers leave my feet although it took me some time to stop laughing. My feet still tingled overwhelmingly with the aftermath of sensations from the tickle attack given to me. I took in deep breaths of air to help recover and blinked through my tears, seeing the trio sitting by my feet still as Alicia regarded me with an obscenely smug expression.

"Are you OK?" I heard Jenna ask and looked over to see that she was still trapped as ever. Unable to call back, I simply nodded in response and she gave me a smile that made me feel a little bit better.

"Aww, look at the love birds looking out for one another." Alicia sneered as Mary smirked behind her "While this has been fun, I think it's time to...
111231222121.title: They finally switched targets

1112312221211.content:
I let out a thankful sigh at Alicia's announcement the trio were going, that is until Jenna finally spoke up, her voice strained after from laughing so hard and long "Aren't you going to free us first?"

Looking at Alicia's face, I knew at once what the answer was and glared at the trio "C-C'mon!" I said with a cracked voice "Haven't you done enough to us?"

Alicia merely laughed at this with Mary soon following and Kimberly giving a weak smile to back up her friends but nothing more. Getting up to her feet, Alicia regarded Jenna and me with the utmost contempt before answering "I'd have thought that was obvious. I did this for your own good you know, so that those haughty attitude of yours would be curbed. Really, we were doing you two a favour."

I could barely contain the anger I felt then at her sheer arrogance and tried to yank myself out of the sand but to no effect. Jenna wasn't so constrained however and shouted back "Just you wait for when we get free, we'll get you back ten times as bad! I bet you're even more ticklish than us!"

I knew taunting Alicia now of all times was a bad idea and she turned around with an evil glint in her eye as she walked over to Jenna "Looks as if someone still has an attitude problem." She said "Let's see what I can do to fix that." With that, she reached down and underneath Jenna, ignoring my friend's struggles and protests as she managed to untie Jenna's bikini top and yank it away from her body.

Jenna instantly let out a scream of protest as her chest was bared and I couldn't stop myself from looking, noticing that Jenna's breasts were of regular size with soft looking skin that was the only pale part of her skin that I could see. Jenna went red with anger and I myself felt blood rushing to my cheeks and elsewhere from the sight. Alicia laughed at our embarrassment and dangled the bikini top over Jenna's nose "Maybe this'll teach you to adjust that attitude of yours." She said before snatching the bikini top up and putting it over her shoulder "I'll take this as a souvenir to remind me of our fun little romp today... And the rest of your items."

At Alicia's command, Mary and Kimberly snatched up our stuff we had brought with us before taking out a single water bottle and throwing it at the space in between where me and Jenna were trapped "A small gift to show that I'm not completely heartless." Alicia said with a smug grin before she and the other two left us, the three giggling amongst themselves until they went over a dune and were out of sight and soon, out of earshot.

Left alone finally, I got to thinking on how to escape when I heard Jenna grunting. Looking over to her, I saw that she was twisting from side to side as she tried to pull her arms and legs free of the sand on top of her. I watched a bit more closely than normal as her breasts swayed in motion with her and that was rapidly coming close to making this whole ordeal have been almost tolerable.

After some moments of watching Jenna struggle...
1112312221211.title: Grabbing a souvenir

choices: We got off the beach OK
11123122212111.content:
After a long struggle, the sand holding Jenna down eventually became loose enough for her to finally break free. Pushing up her arms, she broke out of the sand holding her down and sat up before shoving the sand covering her legs as well. She managed to stand up unsteadily on her feet, looking unsurprisingly groggy after what she'd been through before crossing over to me. Not even bothering to cover her breasts, she dug away enough sand for me to eventually push up and free myself.

As I got out of the whole, Jenna grabbed the bottle of water the trio had left behind before opening it and taking a good, long gulp from it. She drank over a third of it before passing it over to me where I did the same, glad of the cool water going down my parched throat "I'm sorry." Jenna said meekly after I finished drinking and placed the cap back on the bottle. By now, she was looking down at the ground, her arms crossed over her chest and looking distinctly embarrassed.

Not wanting to kick her while she was down (Although it was all her fault we'd gotten into this mess), I patted Jenna on the shoulder in a comforting manner "It's OK, it's made for an interesting afternoon." I looked down to her bare chest even as she tried to hide her embarrassment "For me more than you I'll admit."

Jenna managed to chuckle at that before giving me a playful swat on the shoulder at that. She stopped and sighed "It's going to be tough getting home without getting spotted by someone."

"Not as if we've got much choice in the matter." I said, knowing that the walk back home could have plenty of people who wouldn't object to an ogle of Jenna in her current state "But we may as well get going now. At least we're not being tickled anymore."

"Not at the moment anyway." Jenna commented darkly as we started to head off along the beach, keeping down among the dunes to avoid being spotted by the various people along the place. It was going to be a tricky job indeed...
11123122212111.title: Long trek back home

111231222122.content:
"Well what have we here?" asked a deep familiar voice from the top of the sand dune. "If it isn't tweedledee, tweedledumber, and their tagalong ditz."

My gaze swung up to the top of the dune, as did the Alicia's, Kimberly's, and Mary's. The diversion gave Jenna a much-needed rest as she vacuumed air into her lungs. Standing at the top of the sand pile was someone I was usually happy to see, and given the circumstances I was thankful he somehow managed to find us.

"What are you doing here Nick?" Alicia asked vehemently. "How did you find us?"

Nick was a classmate and friend of mine, an Asian teen with long unruly black hair that reached his shoulders and two unreadable brown eyes. Today he was wearing a pair of loose gray swimming trunks, clearly intending to enjoy the water at one time or other. He was relatively short, a sore point for him, so he made up for it with a good amount of muscle and a piercing stare. Like the brats His parents were loaded as well, but unlike the three girls he was aware there were other people in the world besides himself. In fact, he was pretty much the polar opposite of Alicia and Mary, going out of his way to help people and being the class comedian, making everyone laugh at almost anything.

"I simply followed the stench of arrogance and bitchiness to the source. Seriously, it's amazing you three don't attract flies." And he had quite a mouth too.

That got all three of them glaring at him, and it looked as if Mary were seriously considering jumping up and going hand-to-hand right there. The four of them were rivals since the day Nick first attended school, the fighting going back and forth between the princesses and the clown. All were rich, all wanted to be popular. Nick was just better at it than the other three, a fact that stung badly.

"You're quite a dog, to be able to smell us from so far away," Alicia sneered, doing her best to look nasty.

Nick just laughed. "Bet you've been waiting to use that one. I must admit, I'm impressed. It only took a few weeks for your impaired brain to figure out what a dog is, blondie."

A vein started beating against Alicia's skull, threatened to burst when I broke out laughing. It was a nasty thing to say, but sometimes the only way to fight a dirty opponent was to get down in the mud with them. And Nick could fight dirty. The three brats were standing up now, waiting for their worst enemy to come down.

"By the way, I hope you don't mind having a blue and gray striped car, Mary. I tried parking next to it, but you know how horrible I am at driving. I may have accidentally scratched the paint job once or twice. Or several times."

Now it was Mary's forehead that was risking an explosion. "If you scratched my car you little snot, I'm gonna kill you!"

One thing that Nick did better than anyone else I knew was talk. Whether it was negotiating around an argument and keeping the peace, telling jokes and making people laugh, or insulting a bunch of brats and getting them worked up, his voice always made people pay attention. His message, both spoken and unspoken, always got across clearly and most of the time it had the effect he wanted. It was partly why he was such a good comedian; he always seemed to know what to say. Most of the time it was hilarious one-liners, but now and then during spats like these, he used his gift for a more devious purpose.

"By the way, the glove compartment of an open convertible is not the best place to put your keys," he said sternly as if giving them a lecture, a glittering keychain dangling from his fingers. "I figured you three wouldn't be wearing enough to carry them on you, and knowing how incredibly intelligent you all are, I looked in the first place of greatest convenience."

"You little shit!" Mary screamed, bolting up the incline. "Give me those!"

"Sure, come and get them," Nick taunted, looking down as if finally noticing me and Jenna. "Now there's an idea, how about I bury them like you buried my friends?"

Blood rushed to the athletic girl's face as she tried harder than ever to dash up the sand dune. Unfortunately, sand dunes tend to be made of sand, so trying to run uphill was difficult to say the least, and in her rage Mary slipped a few more times than she should have. Nick spent a few seconds laughing before turning to run, then turned back again, pretending he'd just remembered something.

"Oh yeah, thanks for the phone Alicia!" he called. "You forgot it in Mary's car, and I thought I should pick it up to make sure somebody doesn't steal it."

"No!" Alicia yelled, following Mary up the dune. "Give me my phone you twerp!" With the other two doing their best to climb the dune, Kimberly looked nervously at the ground before following them, unsure of what to do.

Nick just laughed and ran, disappearing beyond the crest of the dune. Less than a minute later, Mary and Alicia followed suit, Kimberly stumbling behind them, not wanting to be left behind. And then the cove grew eerily quiet, without Jenna's laughter or the giggling of the three brats to fill the space. Only Jenna's panting, which was slowly subsiding.

"You okay?" I asked.

Still breathing deeply, Jenna nodded. "Why... Why did they leave?"

I chuckled as I thought about what just happened. "Nick showed up," I told her. That was an answer all on its own, no explanation necessary.

"Ah, that makes sense," she said. "Good thing he showed up when he did. Except how do we get out now?"

That was a very good question. I was still buried deep in the sand, almost completely immobile and unable to get up. Jenna was a lot more free, but after her intense session there was no way she could get free. Drained as she was, I doubted she would be able to do much of anything for a bit aside from talk. The brats had gotten her good.

Trying to get out was pointless, but Nick had opened an opportunity for us and I wasn't about to pass it up. My entire body spasmed, all my remaining energy put into moving the tightly-packed sand. After a minute of struggling, all I had to show for my efforts was a new sheen of sweat on my forehead and aching muscles beneath the sand. I was even more tired now, and if the brats came back I doubted I'd be able to resist if they decided to restrain me as they had Jenna.

Just then, some footsteps on the sand alerted me to someone at the top of the dune. I looked up and saw...
111231222122.title: Fight Fire With Fire

choices: Enjoy the beach like we planned
1112312221221.content:
Cresting the dune was Nick's short yet muscular frame, shoulders shaking from laughter. He sauntered down the hill exuding an aura of victory, and I could tell just by looking at him that we wouldn't have to worry about any of the brats for a while.

"So how'd you manage to piss them off enough to get them to do this?" he asked amusedly, looking at my compact prison and Jenna's vulnerable position. "They may be rascals and bitches, but this is something new." As he reached the bottom of the dune, he did a quick scan of the surroundings, no doubt looking for anything else the bullies had left behind.

"Long story," I said quickly, trying to duck the question.

"What's the rush?" Nick asked. "It's not like you two are going anywhere. Though I can probably guess what happened," he finished, looking at the pile of seagull feathers near Jenna, whose cheeks began heating up.

"W-well, they just kind of challenged us to a volleyball match - and they cheated! The damn brats cheated!" Jenna yelled, her temper flaring at the memory.

"And you're surprised... Why? Those three would throw someone off a boat for a Klondike bar. Hell, they'd throw you off a boat just for kicks. If something's on the line, expect them to cheat. It's what I'd do."

A very excellent point, I thought. It wasn't really a surprise, as both Jenna and I saw the trap coming long before it happened, but I'm sure Jenna still smarted of indignation that the brats helped themselves to a prize they cheated to get. Then again, Jenna had a huge amount of pride, which was what got us here in the first place.

"You're looking very nice in that position by the way, Jenna. Wish I could've been here, I'm sure those tits of your were bouncing all-"

"Shut it Nick," Jenna said frostily. Did I mention he had a mouth?

Shrugging, he walked over to Jenna and reached out. She flinched, somewhat afraid he would start tickling her. I wouldn't put it past him to be honest, he had a very ruthless reputation when it came to tickling.

"Don't worry," he assured Jenna, smiling warmly at her. "I'm mean, but I'm not cruel. I'm sure whatever those brats did to you was more than you're used to, I wouldn't dare take advantage of you.

Blushing slightly, Jenna looked away as Nick began digging away at her limbs, being mindful about where the sand went. "Speaking of whom," I piped up, "where are they?"

"Looking for Mary's keys and Alicia's phone," Nick answered, chuckling. "I actually buried them in the beach. Come high tide, the phone will be ruined and the keys will be lost forever. That was plenty incentive for them to find their items quickly, so we don't have to worry about them returning anytime soon." He had just freed Jenna's left arm, which she moved and stretched to remind her muscles how they felt naturally, and began digging away at her right.

"What?" I asked incredulously. Nick was famous for pulling pranks on bullies, never had his stunt risked permanent damage to anything.

"Don't worry, once we're outta here I'll call Alicia's phone. Knowing her, she's got that thing on full volume. They'll hear it blasting away from anywhere on the beach. If they've got anything between their ears, they'll find the phone and keys well before the tide comes in."

I sighed, relieved in knowing that he hadn't crossed that line yet. Again, his ability to plan things out stumped me. "Wait, why do you have Alicia's number?"

"Prank calls, duh. There's no way I'd consider dating any of them," he said, pretending to barf right there on the sand all over Jenna's arm, which she did not appreciate. "They've got a nice bounce, both up high and down low, but it's the kind of thing the looks better window shopping - as soon as you take it home, you'll ask yourself 'why did I get this thing?' and dump it as soon as possible." I laughed, thinking just how true that was. More sand flew away from Jenna's arm, and pretty soon her entire upper half was free. "Think you can take it from here?"

"Yeah," she told him, reaching down to start digging away at her legs.

Nodding, Nick then walked over to me and started digging. I was down pretty deep, a fact that Nick kept saying over and over again while he tirelessly shoveled sand, and it was a few minutes before I was able to move at all. The three brats had managed to bury me in only a minute, but then again it was a lot easier to dump sand than dig it out. And there were three of them, compared to one Nick. Sometimes I wondered how he managed to keep up with all of them, and decided now was a good time to voice the thought.

"It's not that hard really," he answered. "It may be three against one, but really they cling so tightly together it's like insulting one of them insults all of them, and since it's all collective it's pretty easy thinking of things to all them. Besides, they're so used to simply overwhelming their target that they don't know how to use their group advantage so well." Just then, his hands brushed against my arm, and I saw him shovel sand with increased vigor now that the end was in sight. "And... Ah, done!" he shouted triumphantly as he hauled the last few large handfuls of sand onto the beach next to me, allowing me to sit up and stretch my tired muscles.

Looking over at Jenna, I noticed that she had already gotten out and was helping herself to a water bottle over by our stuff. When she came up for air, she looked at me and smiled somewhat tiredly. "You okay?" I asked.

"Yeah," she said, taking another swig. "My pride got the worst of it, but it's not like anyone was around to see us."

I nodded in agreement, but Nick looked a little uneasy, scanning the surrounding area again. I'm not quite sure what he was looking for, but he seemed pretty serious, nothing like when he was searching for more stuff to steal. "Um, Nick? What's wrong?"

"You say it was very embarrassing, but no one was around to see it?" he said, finishing one scan and sweeping back for another pass. "It sounds way too good to be true. If there's one thing I know about the brats, it's that they don't pass up a golden opportunity. Having you two buried and the sand and getting tickled to death-" Both Jenna and I stared at him with shock. How did he know what had happened. He noticed our stares and quickly made a gesture. "Oh come on, what else would they be doing with a pile of seagull feathers? Anyway, such a humiliation is too good for them to pass up. So there has to be... Aha!" he exclaimed suddenly, getting up and marching over towards a spot on the dune.

His target seemed to be a little break in the sand, a little niche that seemed out of place. I was too far away to see what it was, still flexing my sore body. Nick walked over, reached down, and grabbed something in the sand. When he came back up, a video camera was in his hand.

Jenna and I gaped.

"Yep, knew it," Nick said, fumbling with the edge of the camera and retrieving the memory card. "Never trust those three. If they issue a challenge, just deny it. They don't play fair, and they only actually confront people when they want something from them - that's why they rig the games. I've been caught in a trap like this before, though thankfully not at the hands of the brats." He turned back to us, smiling. "Experience," he told us sagely.

"Wow, thanks," Jenna half-whispered, still not believing that her entire ordeal had been caught on tape.

"Hey, no problem. You guys are my friends, and denying the brats a victory is a nice bonus." We all shared a smile before Nick, leaning back as if he was about to pitch a baseball, jolted forward and threw the memory chip all the way into the ocean, where the water would ruin anything it had gotten. "I'd like to have seen that, but probably too risky to keep." Jenna nodded, grateful.

"You arrived just in time," I said. "There's no telling what more they would have done given the chance. Tha-"

"Stop thanking me," Nick ordered. "It makes me feel all weird. Besides, I took Jenna's gratitude for both of you." I complied, smiling. This guy was a really something, no doubt about that. "You two probably need some rest. Want to head back to my house? My nan's cool with almost anything I do - no seriously, I could probably get away with murder - so it's no trouble. Or we could head somewhere else on the beach, away from this place." He eyed Jenna none too subtly. "I'd certainly enjoy it."

"Ugh," Jenna moaned. "If I wasn't so tired, I'd probably kill you." We all looked at each other, just before we broke out laughing. What a day this was turning out to be.
1112312221221.title: Rescue

11123122212212.content:
"We can do that later," I said, looking at Jenna, feeling the ache in my limbs more than ever. "Right now, I just want to have a nice long shower, get rid of all this sand, and sleep for a week."

Jenna only nodded in reply, covering a yawn. Her ordeal had taken a lot out of her it seemed, although I wasn't surprised. Having her feet and body tickled as relentlessly as that must have made her absolutely exhausted. I walked over to where we dumped our stuff and grabbed my bag, Jenna lazily rising and picking up her own things. Seeing how tired she was, Nick quickly moved in and helped take a load off her hands, hefting the heavier bags. Together, we made our way across the beach, away from that hidden cove where we got tricked and trapped. As we crested the top of the dune, we say the line of parked cars in the distance, and started heading for them. Nick blazed ahead while I hung back with Jenna, still not back to full steam. For a while, silence stretched as we made for the cars.

"I'm sorry," Jenna said eventually. "I shouldn't have let myself fall into their trap."

"You made a mistake, they happen," I responded as I got a little closer, putting a hand on her shoulder in a comforting gesture. "Just remember not to go for it next time and tickle them before they can say anything."

"Hah!" Jenna laughed, a glint appearing in her eye. "I'd love for that to happen! A few minutes alone with a trapped Alicia is all I need." She then turned back to me with an apologetic smile. "But seriously, I'm sorry for almost getting you humiliated like that. If Nick hadn't shown up, that video of us being tickled half to death would have been all over the internet tonight."

"They'd tell everyone where to find it too," Nick called back. "I promise you, that video would've gotten hundreds of views by the next day."

"Yeah, three girls tickling a really hot girl would have caught some attention," I agreed with a grin, Jenna looking up at me before playfully pushing me away. I chuckled at her response and went on. "And thanks to those three, I know what parts of you are ticklish to feathers. Certainly info I'll be using soon."

"Do that and I'll truss you up like a turkey and hand you over to Alicia myself!" Jenna threatened, trying to glare but failing. As bad as it had been with the bratty trio tickling us, Jenna still had an enjoyment for tickling that wouldn't go away just yet.

"Knowing this guy, being trussed up like a turkey and being handed on a silver platter to three girls with the intent to tickle him shitless sounds like paradise," Nick laughed, and I couldn't help but agree. "Anyway, here we are," he told us as he motioned towards his car, a very nice green convertible number. He dropped our stuff in the trunk, got in the driver's seat, then reached into his pocket and pulled out his phone."We've gotten to a safe distance," he told us while dialing. "Time to let those three where their stuff is."

As Jenna and I put our stuff in the boot of the car, Nick tapped a rhythm on the wheel and waited on his phone, suddenly letting out a chuckle when the ringing stopped. "Congratulations, turns out you're not a complete idiot!" he said into the phone, quickly switching it off. I swear I could hear Alicia screaming through the receiver before Nick cut her off. Putting the phone on the seat beside him, Nick started the car and off we went. We drove with few words, me and Jenna just happy to be having a moment's rest and Nick concentrating on the road ahead. Though he turned the radio onto a light rock station at one point, at which Jenna had an animated argument with him about what music was worth listening to at the time. She won after a bonk on Nick's head and he turned the radio off again.

It wasn't long before we got to Nick's house, a sprawling two storey place built for a family but big enough to shelter two. Leaving our stuff in his car, Nick took us into the house, where the furniture was large and cushy, the floors were a mixture of tiles and carpets, and the general decor was just generally very stylish. He directed me to one bathroom with a shower on the first floor and Jenna to another on the second floor. As soon as I turned on the shower, it was milliseconds before I was stripping and jumping under the hot spray. I don't know how long I stood in there and washed sand off, but I was reluctant to get out while the warm water soothing the ache in my muscles. Eventually, I decided that I'd had enough relaxation time and grabbed a towel from the linen basket in the bathroom. Just outside, Nick had left me a pair of clean boxers and a t-shirt to get changed into. As I slipped them on, I made a mental note to pay Nick back somehow. Between rescuing us from the clutches of three brats and saving us from being taped and blackmailed, I figured he'd earned a few favors from me and Jenna.

I walked out of the bathroom and into the living room where Nick was lounging. He'd swapped the trunks for a pair of jogging shorts, but he still left his chest bare, proud of the substantial muscle that he was building. Seeing me walk in he glanced at the clock. "Took you long enough, thought you'd never get out of there," he said with a grin before motioning to the table in front of the couch where some sandwiches and cans of drinks were sitting. "Help yourself, looked as if you could do with a pick-me-up."

Without a moment's hesitation I began helping myself to the food and a drink when Jenna walked into the room as well, sporting a similar looking shorts and t-shirt combo as me. "Ooh, food!" she exclaimed and hopped over to the table, grabbing some sandwiches and a drink before tucking in. After her experience, Jenna proved to be famished as she wolfed down the majority of the sandwiches in a short amount of time.

There was largely silence (well, not so much) between the three of us for a while, Jenna and I eating and drinking as much as we could with Nick often chuckling or outright laughing randomly at comedy central. Annoyingly he kept this up the entire time, and I made another mental note to unplug the TV next time he was over. When every crumb had finally been devoured, Jenna sat back on the couch and sighed in contentment. "So, yummy," she said before sitting back up. "Now then, it's time for us to think about getting back at those three."

"What?" I asked, my mind performing three one-eighties and about seven backflips before I could respond. "I thought we'd have a short break before we got to that!" I protested, having just gotten comfortable on the couch.

Jenna went on regardless."But I've got an idea that'll let us get back at them big time! Don't you want some revenge after what they did and planned to do?"

"They might not expect retaliation so soon," Nick pointed out helpfully.

I paused in thought at that and had to admit, going for revenge against the three was something I desperately wanted to do. But head straight in for it? I took a moment's pause and decided to...
11123122212212.title: Rest and regroup

111231222122122.content:
Despite my better judgment on the subject, I sat back and nodded my head as I waited to hear what Jenna had to say. Looking over to Nick, I noticed him doing exactly the same thing although he generally seemed a lot more enthusiastic than I felt. I got the impression that this was because he enjoyed someone getting tickled half to death, regardless of who it was. It could've been the brats, Jenna, me, some random person - hell, even himself - and he'd enjoy it all the same.

"Alicia's hosting some kind of pool party tonight, right?" Jenna asked, bringing my focus back to her.

"Yup, it's going to be the usual rich club there," Nick interjected. "I heard Sally talk about it a few days ago. Alicia's invited the elite of the school there, going to be about a dozen or so included, not including the three who got you earlier."

The odds didn't seem very good to me but Jenna simply smiled in response. "That's great! The more there are, the worse it'll be for Alicia and the other two when we get there!"

While Jenna's enthusiasm was to be commended, I wondered if she was really thinking this through. "And what are we going to do once we get there?" I asked pointedly.

"Think about it, those three are going to be in nothing more than bikinis," Jenna replied, and I did indeed think about it. I thought about girls wearing nothing more than bikinis a lot to be honest. I brought myself down back to Earth as Jenna spoke. "That means it'll leave us plenty of spots to tickle them, right in front of everybody. We'll sneak in, get through the party and then start tickling them in front of all their friends. When we're done with them, they'll be absolutely humiliated and then we'll have had our revenge."

I had to admit, that was a very tempting plan. A party full of bikini clad girls, all watching us tickle torture Alicia, Mary and Kimberly out of their minds? Sounded like a very fun way to spend an evening. But there were some flaws I had to bring up. "And what if we're caught by them instead? You really want another round of being held down and tickled by those three?"

"I wouldn't mind seeing that." Nick answered with a grin, earning himself a swat on the head from Jenna, but it did little to discourage him. "Hell, if I knew something like this was going to go down, I would've invited everyone here myself. Maybe even double the guest list since two thirds of everybody will likely not show up to one of their parties if it were their last day alive."

Jenna rolled her eyes and went on to ignore Nick as she looked back at me. "Look, it's just going to be a short thing. We'll hop over the fence, find Alicia, tickle her until she cries uncle and then get out of there. Alicia herself made the suggestion, there's no way they'll be expecting us to actually do it."

"Whoa whoa whoa, time out," Nick suddenly blared, holding his hands up in the classical time out fashion. "Alicia told you about this?"

"Yeah, why?" Jenna asked.

"Because it's a trap," he explained. "If she mentioned it, then the thought has crossed her mind. There's no way she'd count on you two not going for it, she's careful enough to prepare just in case even if she doesn't think you're going to go through. Best case scenario, you'll fall into a trap and surprise them before they tickle you. Worst case scenario, you walk right into their bratty claws and get tickled, likely by the entire party."

"Come on, that's ridiculous," Jenna said, though I didn't totally agree. Then again, Nick was known to be a bit paranoid, and it was a win-win thing for me either way.

"All I'm saying is that it's better to err on the side of caution," he said sagely, interlacing his fingers behind his head. "Fine, just let me say I told you so when I haul your laughing butts out of there."

"We're going to be fine," Jenna tried to assure him, though I felt that it was partly directed towards me.

"You said that about the volleyball match." I pointed out although if we were to do this correctly, I would have loved some revenge against those three and I could see Jenna was burning with anticipation in the thought of getting some payback. But the plan was thin to say the least and filled with risk. If it went wrong, we'd just wind up in the clutches of Alicia again and with no Nick or anyone else to come save us this time.

After mulling it over, I decided to...
111231222122122.title: Thinking things through

1112312221221221.content:
I gave in, I had to really. Jenna was dead set on getting revenge after what the trio had done to her and what they had been planning on doing to the both of us. A shot at hunting down Alicia while she was wearing a bikini and tickling her in public until she begged for mercy in front of a crowd of her nearest and dearest? It had to be done "OK, I'm in." I said, earning a grateful look and hug from Jenna, making my choice worth it from the outset.

"So are you going to help or what?" Jenna asked as she broke the hug to turn to our rescuer.

Nick shrugged. "I'll give you two a lift to Alicia's house and wait nearby with the getaway vehicle, but don't say I didn't warn you going in. I got a gut feeling telling me you two are going to regret this, but I won't stop you if you're bent on doing this. Just means I'll need to save your asses - again."

"Thank you for that vote of confidence," Jenna said sarcastically as she rolled her eyes. Despite that tiff though, Jenna seemed eager to see the plan through and even I admitted to myself that it could be fun. And even if it failed, over a dozen bikini clad girls taking their revenge on me and Jenna by tickling us? I had to admit that had something of an appeal to it but Jenna had probably been through enough for one day. Nick still seemed supportive, but that was probably because he was looking forward to hearing us howl with laughter.

With a few hours to go until the party, Nick offered us some spare bedrooms to nap in to help regain some of our strength. Me and Jenna took the opportunity to do so, the beds being large and soft and I didn't have to wait long before I drifted off into a deep nap. When Nick came to wake me up, I found it hard to believe it was time but looking out of the window into the sinking Sun clued me in that evening was fast approaching. Getting up, I made my way downstairs where me and Nick were soon joined by Jenna, looking a great deal more energetic than I would have thought she'd be.

After another round of sandwiches and drinks, we got into Nick's car and drove off towards Alicia's house, arriving soon after and we clued in on the party as we heard the sounds of loud music coming from the sizeable back garden surrounded by a large fence. Getting out of the car, me and Jenna sized up the situation. "So, any plan on getting in?" I asked.

Jenna stared at the large house and garden before us in thought before answering...
1112312221221221.title: We're going to regret this...

1112312222.content:
I hesitated, wondering what to say. On the one hand, the three of them concentrating on my feet at the same time would tickle insanely, as well as a little embarrassing, to be completely powerless to stop them. On the other hand, they were all quite the lookers, so it wouldn't be that bad to be tickled by the likes of them. And I knew from experience just how sensitive Jenna's feet were. It was a testament to her will power that she wasn't outright begging and still had the strength to glare at them at all. "C'mon, boytoy. Who's it gonna be? 5,4,3,2,1..." threatened Mary cheerfully, unconsciously fingering the long feather she was still holding.

"Well, that's it. Looks like we get to play with both of them at once!" exclaimed Alicia, bringing her hands to my feet. I burst into annoyingly high-pitched giggles as the light scratching of ten delicate long nails tickled my arches, my feet flexing to try and lessen the sensations shooting up my legs.

Mary moved to help her, but Alicia scooted over, blocking off the rest of my feet while still skittering her fingers all over my soles relentlessly. "Not now, Mary, this one's mine. Why don't you two go discipline the brat? I think I'll tickle this one alone for awhile." Mary pouted cutely, moving on her knees back over to Jenna. She really did have a nice rear, especially when clad in a tight bikini, and it was a great annoyance that Alicia's constant tickling prevented me from properly appreciating it. "Ahahhaha! God-that tickles!" I laughed, though still noticed Mary had tightly grabbed hold of Jenna's foot, once again pulling her toes back.

"No-wait! Not again! Ahahah-I'll get you fohor thhihis!" she yelped as the athletic brunette started rapidly sawing the feather across the sensitive skin between her delicate toes and the foot proper, before going on to take the pointy end of yet another feather and pretended to write something on the arch of her captive's other foot simultaneously. Her irritation at being forced to torment the same target twice in a row soon seemed quite forgotten in Jenna's screamed laughter.

Unfortunately, I was too busy roaring my head off and straining against my sandy prison to notice Mary's skilled technique in detail. Alicia seized my left big toe, pulling it over to the right one and holding them together and back with the same hand, while reaching around behind her to grab hold of a long feather from the pile. I gulped at the sight of it, and she smiled sweetly at me before lowering it to my completely exposed and helplessly stretched out soles. "Oh nonhoho! Hahahah! Stohohop!" I screamed. My reflexive begging drove her on, and she leaned her head in. My feet were already clean from the feathers dusting away at every inch of it continuously, and now she started to lightly nibble at the side of one arch. I flipped my head around wildly, becoming well acquainted with an unforeseen fact; being tightly packed in the sand resulted in me not being able to struggle at all, so there was no where for my excess energy to go, unlike if I had been tied up and could at least thrash around.

That alone was a torture. I felt her tongue slipping between my toes now, the sharp tip of the feather scratching at the ball of my other foot. To her credit, she held it almost vertically, so when she dragged the point up, the soft, fluffy feather proper brushed maddeningly against my toes. They were free to twist and wiggle now, but whenever her little feather tip dragged along my foot, they jerked forward, just in time to catch the rest of the feather in the grooves of skin. They would fling themselves back, thrusting my heel forward to avoid the tickling, which resulted in it being perfectly positioned to catch the down scratch of the feather tip. It was a maddening cycle that seemed impossible to break. Beside me, I could hear Jenna laughing at least as hard, and managed to snatch up my wits long enough to glimpse at her.

Kimberly was back at her post by Jenna's head, watching somewhat nervously with a blush tinting her cheeks, and then flinching slightly as Mary found a sweet spot at the base of Jenna's big toe and let go of the other digits to really dig her fingers in. Kimberly put down her feather and slowly started digging away at the sand around Jenna's head, scooping up clumps so that she was excavating all around her shoulders. I felt a moment of excited hope - before Alicia found that one nerve cluster at the ball of my foot and began to concentrate her torturous tools on it, stealing any focus I might have been feeling. Kimberly must have been too sympathetic to their captive's laughter filled screams and decided to free us! I anxiously looked back at the other two, but they were much too engaged on our spastic feet.

"Ahahahaha-Oh my Gohod! Stohohohop! Hahahaha!"

"Let us gohoho! We've had enough! Hahahahaha!"

I could feel myself beginning to tire under the relentless tickling. Sweat was running down my forehead and everywhere else on my body, which ached in some places from being pounded against the sand fruitlessly for so long.

I continued laughing away, the chuckles slowly dying down as Alicia thankfully began to slow. "You're in luck, big boy. I'm tired of just using my hands on you. So I'll go find a few more tools for us to play with!" She smiled that infuriating, princess grin - somewhere between smug and cute - again, and then sauntered away with the most incredible hip-twist I had ever seen.

Hearing laughter still going full force to my right, I anxiously looked over at Jenna, before glancing back to check on Kimberly's progress. With Alicia gone, we would have the advantage if she managed to spring us. I looked back at the freckle-faced girl, and slumped in disappointment.

She had stopped scooping away at the sand around Jenna. Now her shoulders, chest and a large part of her toned stomach were visible. When she fell, she had flung her arms out to either side to break her fall, and they were still stuck there under the pounds of sand. She bucked around frenziedly in her half sitting/half lying down position, swinging back and forth in her excess energy. The motion, uh... How to put this? The motion set a couple other things swinging as well, and it was quite captivating to watch.

I snapped out of it as Kimberly took her own huge feather - I don't know what bird it could have come from, but it almost definitely was not a seagull - and started teasing almost all the skin she could see with it. Around Jenna's neck, down towards the base of it, and finally, down around and in her top, letting her other hand stroke around Jenna's tanned belly a bit for some extra giggles. Jenna's laughing reached a surprising new pitch, and I made a mental note to remember the spot.

"Hey Kim, do you think we should tickle her someplace else?" Mary piped up, leaning forward to nibble at her captive's helpless arch.

"Er, how exactly?" asked Kimberly, still twirling the feather in Jenna's cleavage. "I think we should maybe give her a break, she looks pretty worn out... And we haven't had a crack at her cute boyfriend over there yet either!"

"Don't worry, I have an idea."

They got up, leaving Jenna still giggling and shaking in the sand, sweating profusely, and started up a quick conversation not far away. "Wow, Jenna, are you okay? You were really turning red there," I asked, worried. Her feet were at least as ticklish as mine, which was saying a lot, and I hadn't been tickled for nearly as long as she had. She wearily flopped her head over to look at me, panting and squirming still, trying to loosen the sand weighing her down. "I don't now. I really can't take much more of this. When we get out of here, we are so gonna get them!" She noticed that my torturer was absent."Hey, where's Alicia?"

"She went to get more tickle tools. Let's hope they get bored of this soon..." I explained, glancing at where Kimberly and Mary were still deep in discussion, the former appearing reluctant at what was being proposed. As she was the least sadistic of the party, I took it this did not bode well for us.

Alicia came back, arms full of bits and baubles she must of thought could be useful, and raising an eyebrow when she saw we were left unattended. She dropped the goods, giving my foot a little scratch while she was down, eliciting an exaggerated giggle from me with my sensitized skin, and then sauntered off to where her friends were talking.
