1142112.content:
It was probably me just being paranoid but I decided to go check up on Maddie. I got out of the basement but left the book at the bottom of the stairs, didn't seem much point in taking it further. Having freed myself of the weighty tome, I sprinted up the stairs, expecting Maddie to be ready and didn't think of knocking as I opened her bedroom door. Not thinking much, I started to ask "Hey Maddie, you...?"

"EEK!" Came the cry as I suddenly realised that Maddie wasn't quite ready yet. In fact, she was only wearing her underwear, matching bright pink bra and panties which went well with her bright face. Standing near her bed, she pulled up the duvet and tried to cover her body with it, glaring at me as I stood there and gaped like a fish "What're you doing?!" She demanded.

"Um... Checking up on you?" I said lamely as I felt the heat rise to my ears from sheer embarrassment at having done this "Look, I'm sorry!" I quickly added "I just... got worried I suppose."

Maddie's expression softened somewhat and she relaxed. Her hair looked damp and it seemed as if she'd just gotten out of the shower "I'm fine." She said before giving a small smile "A lot better now that I have someone to talk to over this, even if it does sound like I'm going crazy."

Keeping my true thoughts to myself, I simply walked over to Maddie and put a comforting hand on her bare shoulder "Hey, I'm here for you." I said "We'll sort this out, one way or another trust me."

Maddie surprised me by dropping the duvet and pulling me in for a hug "Thank you." She whispered as she held her body close to mine. Something that got me more than a little flustered from having an attractive young woman in her underwear embracing me.

Deciding to return the gesture, I hugged Maddie back and, unable to resist the temptation, whispered in her ear "Of course, there's one real tickle monster you should be worried about... ME!" I cried out as my fingers started to tickle her bare sides and ribs, holding her in place with the hug as I stroked her naked skin.

Maddie didn't event have time to react before the tickling started, her mouth opening wide as she let out a shout of laughter that was soon followed with her pleasant, melodic giggled "Nohohooofahahaiirr!!" She protested playfully, losing her balance as she fell back onto the bed, pulling me with her. I continued tickling her after the landing of course, my fingers teasing all down her sides as she wriggled and pleaded for mercy through her laughter although my own excitement and enjoyment of the situation made me reluctant to stop just yet.

As I squeezed her lower ribs and made Maddie laugh even harder, I decided to...
1142112.title: Go and check up on Maddie

11421121.content:
I knew Maddie was worried, frightened even, of the strange book and the mysterious meanings it beheld. So, I figured, why not give her a good laugh before we ventured into the unknown? Besides, Maddie had always been a more... desired target of my tickling wishes. A way to satisfy two things at once! As I kept my hands busy with Maddie's ribs, I glanced around her room for something to playfully restrain her with. Looking over at her nightstand, I saw a very curious thing peeking out from one of the shelves. Reaching over, I pulled out two pairs of black, strangely furred handcuffs!

"Ohohoho... Maddie, you naughty little girl..." I jested playfully, dangling them in front of her face. Still worn from the tickling, Maddie barely replied with a sharp gasp, as if I had found something out about her! I grinned, sitting gently on her back, and pulled her feet closer. "These are fun little toys Maddie... What do you say we play with them?" Tenderly, I snapped shut the handcuffs around Maddie's ankles, keeping them in place. I then took her arms and held them back, cuffing one hand at first, but moving the chain of the second pair of handcuffs over the first pair, then locking her other wrist in place, restraining her quite handily.

It was then I wiggled my fingers all over her feet, her peachy soles no match for my digits. Within seconds, Maddie began to sing with laughter, barely able to contain herself. I explored her feet, touching toes, soles, heels, and everywhere in between, happy to hear her cry of laughter. After thirty long minutes had passed, I slowed my efforts, aiming to let Maddie breathe for a bit.

"So, that was fun huh? Such marvelous cuffs you have..."

Once her breath had recovered, Maddie replied..
11421121.title: All in Good Fun...

choices: Unharmed, but in T'Calu's strange World...
Captured, at the hands of T'Calu herself!
114211211.content:
"But...Those aren't mine!" Maddie replied, much to my confusion.

"What do you mean? I found them right there, in your nightstand..."

"That's exactly it, I've never seen those before in my life!"

"Well..." I pondered, utterly curious at the goings on. Maddie wasn't known for lying, and even if she was, there was no point in doing so now when I had already found the mysterious handcuffs and tickled her with them. I looked back at the instruments and gazed again at the black fur, and how very otherworldly they seemed. "...If they aren't yours...Who's are they?"

"They, and now she, are mine, mortal!" exclaimed a booming, yet overtly feminine voice. The words seemed to coat your spine with icicles. "I, T'Calu, have chosen this mortal!

Without warning, a portal that swirled with deep, dark energies opened above me and Maddie, and with a heave, sucked us both in! From either the trauma of being warped through the portal, or something else entirely, both Maddie and myself were knocked out cold.

When I awoke, I was...
114211211.title: A Product of Higher Powers

choices: Accept T'Calu's challenges and travel her realm
Take Maddie's place and hope she could save me from Earth
1142112111.content:
I slowly awoke amid a deep, dark fog that surrounded me completely. Blinking as I tried to gain my bearings, I realised how oddly warm this place was despite the fact I'd lost everything except my boxers. I shook my head groggily and slowly got to my feet, looking around but finding that I couldn't see anything, the surrounding fog far too thick. "Maddie?" I called out, hoping that she was somewhere close by. "Maddie are you there?!"

Silence was my only answer and I started to get worried very quickly. Had Maddie come through with me? Had she managed to escape? I tried not to panic as I looked one way then the other, searching for any sign of Maddie, before I finally heard something from afar. It was the sound of wild laughter that I recognised as Maddie's. I managed to pinpoint its source and began running straight for it, crying out for my friend all the way, hoping she was alright.

Maddie's laughter got louder as I ran towards it, finally reaching something that loomed up from the ground. It was a large circle, seemingly made of stone and housing a pool of water where Maddie's laughter was coming from. I leaned over the edge and peered into the shallow pool, within which I could see a vision, as clear as a TV screen. In it was Maddie, stripped down to only her panties and flanked by two figures. They had the appearance of beautiful shapely women, but their ashen grey skin, flaming red hair, and feathered black wings marked them as inhabitants of a world other than Earth.

The two beings were currently tormenting Maddie to great effect. Her hands were suspended above her head by the handcuffs I had put on her earlier as the two Demonesses took full advantage of this fact. They each had a long, stiff feather in their hands, and were using the plumes to tickle Maddie's breasts. Maddie screamed with laughter from each touch her breasts received from the feathers, her two tormentors taking great delight in teasing the globes and going after her nipples in particular, flicking the very tips of the feathers against her nipples. As I watched, I couldn't help but notice that the attention seemed to be making her nipples hard indeed.

Maddie's face was flushed and contorted with her laughter. She couldn't even speak through her ticklish squeals and her legs kicked impotently in mid-air. Her half naked body was bright red and I was wondering just how long she'd been getting tickled on her breasts like that.

"A most enjoyable mortal to play with," a voice from behind me said. I twisted around to see a swirling blackness, like a whirlpool made of shadows surrounding a light which shone like a star deep in its centre. "For too long have I been denied a sacrifice. Too long have I dwelt in this realm without a new soul to be mine. But that shall soon change."

"Y-You're T'Calu?" I asked, my voice barely more than a terrified squeak at seeing this manifestation of a Goddess before me.

"Indeed I am, mortal. And your companion is the first of what will be my many slaves now that the time has come for me to resume my place as Bringer of Laughing Torment and Delight."

"L-Let her go!" I called out with a great deal more nerve than I felt. "She's done nothing to you, so let her go now!"

An amused chuckle came from the swirling shadows, her deep, feminine voice making me shiver as she spoke not unlike someone would observing an interesting bug. "You make such demands of me mortal? Ah, such foolishness will have to be curbed. But... it has been so long sinceI have seen such defiance, and I would loathe to see it be crushed so soon. I shall give you the opportunity to save your friend, but on my terms."

"What terms?" I asked, not liking where this was going at all.

"You have two choices on how to proceed. One is that your dear friend here remains in her position, enduring this torment from my minions, while you travel and explore my realm. Across it are several tasks and challenges that you must complete to ever hope to return to Earth. Should you fail too many times, both of you will remain here as my first sacrifices.

"Your second choice is that you take this girl's place and suffer my deepest and darkest torments, but your friend will be returned to your world. From that side she is free to devise a plan to save you, which I honestly think is more likely than you succeeding my challenges. The choice is yours: stay and accept the tasks, or take her place and hope she can resue you."

I paused in thought as I considered this, Maddie's frantic laughter still echoing around me. Maddie would probably have a better chance to rescue me from Earth if I took her place. But how could I be sure she'd even remember this as anything but a dream? If I stayed here, I could fight and maybe find a way to rescue her without relying on these games of T'Calu's. Then again, Maddie would have to notice when I was missing sometime and as smart as she was she'd probably devise some way of saving me. After a few moments, I made up my mind to...
1142112111.title: A Dangerous Choice

choices: Old abandoned camping ground in the forest. Close to the mountain.
Island off the coast. Just out of sight of the beach.
Set of secret tunnels beneath my house. Leads into this underground house.
1143.content:
Taken slightly aback, I quickly responded: "Of course you can Maddie. You know you can tell me anything...is this why you've been so out of it these last few months?"

She blushed a little bit. "Was I that obvious?" I could only give her a deadpan stare. "Yeah this is why. I...found something. Well...somePLACE. It's really cool! And completely secret! Even if it takes some time to get there. And I thought I could surprise you with it, after school ended. So I've been...preparing."

"Preparing? Preparing for what?"

She started rambling a little bit. "You! Sort of. I've slowly been making it 'livable'. So to speak. That way we can hang out there or have sleepovers like we used to or something. I just..." She paused like she was thinking about how to say this next bit. "I'm trying...to impress you..."

That threw me for a loop. Impress me? Why? "Maddie. We've been friends since we were in diapers. You don't need to impress me. I already think you're awesome."

She visibly turned quite red. "It's just...you let yourself be open to the world for anyone to know who you are and what you like and think. Plus with all the times you've stood up for me..." I sighed. She was referring to people bullying her for being shy and hiding behind hoodies and bangs. Which I of course never let slide. "I just wanted to impress you the way you always impress me..."

I didn't know what to say. That was really moving. I never thought I did anything special but apparently she did. She looked really embarrassed so I decided to ease the tension with a joke. "Well you could always wear t-shirts more. Make it easier to tickle your sides."

She snorted and cracked a small grin at that. "I think I'll keep the hoodies for now. I think you've proven more than enough that I'm plenty ticklish in heavy apparel.. Let alone lighter clothing."

Mission accomplished. But as for this place..."Alright Maddie. Let's see this super cool secret place you've been making liveable."

Maddie's face lit up like a Christmas Tree. "Oh don't worry you're gonna love it! Just let me go upstairs and get ready real quick."

"Get ready? Where is this place?"

"It's a bit of a distance. There's this...."
1143.title: "Can I tell you something private?"

choices: Go on a run with her
Get her to clean up the house
115.content:
After my normal morning routine of shower, breakfast and so on, I got on my bike and made my way over to Sharon's house. Her family was enjoying a week away while Sharon looked after the house, which supposedly included cleaning the place up. Walking up to the door and knocking on it, I heard a series of crashes and bangs that hinted that Sharon had been somewhat lax in her duty.

The door opened up to show Sharon beaming at me. Her full name was Sharon Rani, her father was from India before moving to town with her mother to live. She inherited some characteristics from her father, rich brown skin with black hair but hers was long and was tied back in a ponytail that fell down to her back. Sharon had a wide smile and dark eyes that tended to dart from place to place to see what could grab her attention. Truth be told, while accomplished with a lot of things, she could be a complete ditz at times and tended to leave important things right up until the very last minute. But she was always happy to help and a cheerful person so I really couldn't help but like her.

"Ah, you're here!" She said before motioning through the door with her hand "Come on through, sorry about the mess." I stepped through the doorway and raised my eyebrows at the sight before me. Somehow, Sharon had managed to turn the place upside down in the two days since her parents had gone out. The floor was a mess of books, clothes and sporting equipment littered about in a chaotic manner. I then remembered this was just the living room and shuddered to think what the rest of the house was like.

I turned to question Sharon over this when I saw she wasn't dressed in an outfit for cleaning. While I was in battered shorts and a shirt, Sharon was dressed in an outfit for exercise, running shorts and a bright yellow tank top. I slowly realised that cleaning wasn't exactly on Sharon's mind right now "Forgetting the reason I came round here?" I asked, indicating her clothing.

"Oh that can wait a while." Sharon said, waving her hand towards the piles "I was in the mood for going out running this morning, getting a few miles. I was hoping you'd join me!"

I let out a sigh at Sharon's lack of focus and my eye caught the one bit of cleaning equipment I could see in the mess around us. Not answering Sharon for the moment, I walked over and picked it up by the handle to reveal a feather duster decorated with bright pink feathers. Turning around and smiling evilly at Sharon, I asked "What are we going to do this morning?"

Sharon flinched at the sight of the feather duster and with good reason, she was easily one of the most ticklish people I knew. She had even started wearing thick socks during her martial arts lessons simply because too many people had tickled her feet during fights for an unfair advantage or to even get her to submit. Sharon held out her hands in front of her in a weak protest "C'mon, I promise we'll clean up after we've had our run. It won't take long, honest!"

Tapping the soft feathers against the palm of my hand, I considered Sharon's words before deciding to...
115.title: Procrastination

choices: Keep going to reinforce the lesson.
1152.content:
"Oh, sure," I said, pretending to go along with her plans. "The house will be just as dirty when we get back, right?"

"That's the spirit," she said, grinning at me as she walked to the door. She was too busy feeling triumphant that she had so easily convinced me to join her in procrastinating that she didn't notice me stick my foot out and trip her up.

"Oof, what was that that for!" She said, surprised, as she tumbled and landed on her large couch, stomach-first. I sat down on her shins, knowing that although Sharon was sporty, she was more of a lean and toned athlete than a weightlifter and she shouldn't be able to squirm free or lift me when I had my full body weight pressing down on her.

"Actually, no. If we go out for a run, when we come back you'll be sweaty so you'll need to shower. And then you'll be hungry. So then we’ll go out to the mall to eat. And then you'll want to go shopping for a bit 'while we're there'. Then when we come back you'll feel too tired to do anything and we'd have wasted a whole day," I said ticking the things off with my fingers. "I remember doing this last summer, Sharon..." I said, as I pulled off her Nike trainers.

"Hehe, hey now. Let's talk about this! I'll be good!" Sharon said, already giggling. Oh, she was so going to get it, I decided. I admit to doing this for the dual-purpose of not only persuading her to stop wasting time, but because she was so much fun to tickle. I was in her martial arts class, and I had always looked forward to squaring off against her because forcing a surrender via tickling was by far my favorite move in class. In fact, due to my constant use of it against the female members of the class, some of the girls had even began fighting fire with fire and using the same moves on me!

"I'm just going to give you a little... motivation to start cleaning up after yourself more," I said as I tugged off her black ankle socks, exposing her pretty bare feet. "You should be thanking me! I'm such a good friend for doing this."

Putting the emphasis on 'this', I began dragging just one finger along her left foot and her toes were already she was already fidgeting. I had tried to sound serious but I couldn't help myself from smiling as her toes curled in the cutest way.

Sharon could probably hear that in my voice as she just giggled as she flexed her feet defensively."

"You love it, really," I teased as I lightly wiggled my index finger up and down the middle of my friend's sole. "And don't worry, this is just the warm-up. If you don't use a feather duster for dusting, then the only thing it's good for is tickling the feet of a very ticklish girl, don't you agree?" I said asked I continued lightly scratches down her friend's helpless feet.

"Nohohoho!" Sharon said, giggling frantically as she tried to squirm free as I continue lightly teasing all her sensitive feet. They curled, wiggled and twitched as they tried to escape. Sometimes she would hide her mouth behind her hands, as if she was embarrassed by how I making her squeak and squeal.

‘Comehohohonm, stop teasing me so hahahahahaha much!” Sharon said, chuckling uncontrollably. "Weheheh, have work to do!"

I found that hilarious. So now Queen procrastinator wants to work? But I wasn't going to let her off this easily. Not when I had her lovely brown feet at my mercy. I reached out and plucked the pink feather duster from the table I had put down on earlier.

"You're right, Sharon. We do have work to do. In fact, I think I'll start with dusting your feet right here," I said, brandishing the feather duster as I gave her a few seconds to reply before diving in..

Sharon was still giggling when she twisted her torso and craned her neck so she saw the bright pink feather duster in my hands hovering dangerously over her trapped feet. "Uh, my feet are clean. Really. No need to dust them. Let's get to work!" She said unconvincingly, curling her toes defensively.

I pretender to seriously ponder her offer, all the while I slowly drug a finger up and down her foot. It was adorable seeing her trying to keep her giggles in. After a few moments of this I decided keeping her in suspense was too cruel. "Nah, more dust collects than you realize. We gotta get it off," I grinned.

Sharon shook her head, still giggling, and said 'crap' in flirty way which I took as my cue to begin. I twirled and spun the small feather duster in my hand so the bristles tantalized all over her feet. I feathered the tops and the bottoms of both feet, sometime she would try to cover up one foot with another but I would just grab each foot and spend time dusting it individually. After a while she would try kicking my arm with her free foot, but whenever she did that I would loudly say to her "Oh, if you insist. I'll dust that foot now," and I'd grab that foot and dust it vigorously all the while Sharon was screaming at me saying that wasn't what she meant.

After a while of this she began clenched my hands into fists and thumped them on the couch, loud boyish laughter still flowing from her mouth. I was having so much fun feathering her feet that I hadn't noticed the time. I had been tickling her feet for almost twenty minutes and we did have a house to clean...
1152.title: How You Motivate Someone

11522.content:
With a certain amount of reluctance, I let go of Sharon's feet before looking back over to her "Now are we going to get to work?" I asked, twirling the feather duster in my fingers as a threat should she give the wrong answer.

A stream of giggles was my answer at first as Sharon felt the after effects of the tickling as well as just generally laughing at her situation "OK! OK! We'll get to work!" She answered "Just no more tickling!" Although the way she wriggled her toes made me think that she was trying to provoke me into more ticklish attacks. Part of the reason why our martial arts instructor allowed the tickling to continue as a technique was the fact that Sharon enjoyed it so much.

Resisting the urge to carry on, I got off Sharon and stepped off the couch, placing the feather duster in my pocket as I waited for Sharon to get up "Alright then, how shall we start?" I asked, eager to get this done and finished so I'd have more opportunities to tickle Sharon after.

Getting off the couch, Sharon looked around her and gave a sigh "From bottom to top would be best." She answered "Let's do this floor and then the bedrooms and we should get everything sorted."

"Unless you mess things up again." I retorted before looking around the place "How on Earth did you manage to make such a mess anyway?" I asked incredulously.

Sharon simply gave a giggle at that "Oh you know... Things just build up." She answered before starting things off by walking over to a nearby pile of magazines and picking them up "Let's get rid of the clutter first and then clean underneath.

It was as good a plan as any and we were soon at it, tidying up the huge mess Sharon had created and then cleaning everything underneath. As ever, once Sharon got beyond her ditzy nature and tendency to procrastinate, she was a hard worker and I was surprised at the progress we were making. Barely an hour had gone past when we were finished on the ground floor and moving up to the next.

Although one thing I noticed as that Sharon hadn't put her shoes back on and instead went around completely barefoot. Every time she kneeled down, she seemed to do it in such a way that her long feet were pointed directly at me, her shapely toes wiggling as if teasing me. I sometimes struggled to ignore that and what made it worse was that whenever Sharon reached up to clean something just above her head, I could swear she was making her tank top ride up on purpose so that her well toned belly and navel were exposed. It was large and deep and from experience, I knew it was deathly ticklish.

Every time I turned away after seeing Sharon's feet or belly, I swore I could hear her titter and I knew she was doing it on purpose as some revenge on having turned down her plans for a fun day. I smiled to myself as I walked upstairs, knowing I was going to give it to her good and proper once we were finished. We separated as we got upstairs as I vacuumed the hallway and Sharon cleaned up her parent's bedroom. I finished that job and switched the vacuum off just in time to hear a horrified gasp come from Sharon in her parent's room.

Wondering what had happened, I rushed into the room to find...
11522.title: To work, to work

115222.content:
As soon as I rushed into the room, I was greeted with the comical sight of Sharon perched on the bed, having jumped up there once she had seen the thing that had terrified her so. Following her gaze, I gave a smirk as I saw the remarkably large bee that was hitting itself against the window and trying to get out of the room. Walking over to the window, I got out the feather duster and guided the bee to where the window was opening, the little creature flying away with a merry buzz as it left.

Sharon visibly sagged with relief as the bee was sent from the room and she hopped off the bed and gave me a hug fit for a hero. "Thank you so much!" she exclaimed.

Unable to resist, I used one hand to pick Sharon's tank top up, exposing her belly, and with my other I tickled her sides gently using the feather duster, brushing the soft plumes lightly against the soft skin of her midriff. Sharon squeaked and began to giggle in a melodically but didn't give up the hug, instead moving her body back slightly to allow greater access to her belly for the feathers.

Resisting the open invitation was incredibly difficult, but I stopped the tickling and Sharon looked at me in a disappointed way, pouting adorably. "We still have work to do, remember?" I asked, bopping her on the nose with the duster. "Don't worry, I'll tickle you when we're finished."

"Oh alright," Sharon sighed as she picked up the rag and polish she'd been using. "We really do need to clean up the mess around here after all."

"Yes, that you made," I responded before putting the feather duster back in my pocket and getting back to work as Sharon stuck her tongue out at me. Thinking about just how I'd get back at her later on, I got to work cleaning the rest of the house as Sharon did her part. Soon, surprisingly, everything was done and in order. I put the vacuum back and sat down in the living room with a sigh of relief. I looked at the clock and was surprised to see that it was only just midday. We must have been working hard.

My thoughts were interrupted by none other than Sharon who came in from the kitchen and handed me a glass of fruit juice and a plate of sandwiches. "A small reward for your help," she explained with a grateful smile. "I really couldn't have done it this fast without you."

"You wouldn't have done it at all without me," I answered before tucking into the food and drink, enjoying the recharge immensely. I felt the feather duster poke in my pocket and grinned as I finished the food. "That reminds me," I said, "weren't we going to do something after we finished?"

Sharon stared at me blankly for a moment before her eyes lit up. "Of course! We were going for a run! Thanks for reminding me!" she said before rushing upstairs to get changed into some running clothes. Like I said, a complete ditz at times.

I felt the feather duster in my hand and wondered whether to get her the moment she came downstairs or go on the run with her. It was a nice day out after all. Soon, I heard Sharon make her way downstairs and resolved to...

As soon as she turned around and I saw the startled look on her face, my hands dove toward her ribs and half tickled half pushed her onto the couch. In fact, she looked back to me as she jogged and stuck her tongue out "C'mon you big baby!" She called out "It's not that hard! Maybe I should give you some incentive!"

1152222.title: A healthy jog

11522221.content:
"Heads up!" I shouted, trying to warn Sharon. Because of my breathlessness however, my warning failed to reach her ears and I watched as Sharon jogged right into a dark-skinned woman. They collided, both falling to the ground painfully. 

The woman Sharon had inadvertently body slammed looked rather peculiar. Her skin was relatively dark, she had long black hair, worn loose, and plenty of jewelry. I estimated there to be about three dozen different shiny bracelets, rings and necklaces all strewn across her body. Her attire was rather exotic as well, a long skirt with a slit on the side reaching all the way to her hip, a sleeved belly shirt that showed several inches of skin, and no footwear. She was probably some kind of gypsy woman, I reasoned.

"Ouch..." Sharon groaned as she rubbed her head. "Sorry, miss, are you okay?" she apologized. Not answering, the woman merely clutched at her chest. After a few moments of awkward silence, where I helped Sharon get back to her feet, I noticed the strange woman scream. I looked over at her, concerned that she had been hurt in the fall.

"Are you alright? Need us to call an ambulance?" I asked, offering an outstretched hand to help the gypsy woman to her feet.

"Oh you careless idiots, what have you done?" the woman shouted, ignoring me as she continued to clutch her chest. I turned to get a better look, wondering if she might be having a heart attack, when I realized she wasn't clutching her chest but rather a silver amulet the size of a tennis ball, which seemed to be... leaking. A strange green and black fluid was trickling from the amulet and dripping through the gypsy woman's fingers, pouring onto the ground. Then, without warning, the strange amulet exploded violently, splattering me and Sharon with the strange substance. 

Utterly repulsed, I spat some of the disgusting fluid out of my mouth. I had made the mistake of trying to talk just before the amulet went boom. "Okay, what the hell?" I coughed. 

"Yeah, what just happened?" Sharon said, wiping her eyes. As I looked around at the subsequent mess, I noticed that the gypsy woman and her bizarre trinket were nowhere in sight. She must've have been covered in the weird black muck as well, which was proven true when I noticed a set of footprints leading down the road. However, I was in no mood to chase her after all that running. Besides, the gypsy had probably gone to shower and change, an idea I considered very appealing.

"Your guess is as good as mine. I kinda want to get cleaned up though. Maybe we should finish this run tomorrow," I suggested, as I tried to flick some of the grime from my hands.

"Yeah, good idea. Who on Earth was that woman? And what was that weird exploding amulet?" Sharon asked curiously, as she peered left and right to see where the gypsy woman had gone to.


"We can discuss this on the way back," I insisted, steering Sharon in the direction that took us back home. Sharon was always curious, a quality I liked about her, but her priorities were a little out of order. The need to investigate some imaginary mystery should have been trumped by the fact that we were covered in crap. 

"Fine, fine. Aren't you the least bit curious though?" Sharon asked as we began to jog back. Thankfully, Sharon had insisted we bring sweat towels, so we managed to wipe off most of the grease-like fluid to the point that we didn't look like we had just jumped in a barrel of oil. 

"Yeah, but I'm more interested in this great stench we've acquired," I said pointedly, making Sharon giggle. The weird ink smelled like bizarre mixture of garlic and smoke, afterwards mixing in a bucket of horse droppings for kicks. "It's weird, but I have a really bad feeling about this," I said, jogging alongside her.

"What d'ya mean?"

"This isn't the first time something crazy has happened. I'm beginning to think there's something out there, or maybe a group of somethings, who like putting me in these weird situations. I mean, you can attest to a lot of crazy stuff. Stuff like the giant octopus that paid us a visit while we were at the beach, remember that?"

"Heehee, yeah. I liked him, he was rather gentle with me."

"He was, wasn't he? Anyway, just saying, strange things happen to me and people around me," I shrugged, a gesture that is significantly less effective when jogging next to someone. "And this whole thing screams 'strange' to me. I'm honestly half-expecting us to have unleashed some kind of slime monster just now."

"Oh come on, that only happened like once," Sharon said dismissively. "You worry too much. Tell you what, it's getting late, let's just head back and catch some Z's. We'll go running tomorrow morning, okay? We'll be fine, nothing will happen."

"I swear, you're tempting fate. Pushing it is never a good thing. But fine, I'm wiped out from you working me like a slave today anyway," I laughed, sticking my tongue out at her as we stopped right outside her house. We agreed to meet here early tomorrow morning, and I trudged back to my place, wondering how I was going to explain why I smelled like a compost heap.
11522221.title: Tempting Fate

115222211.content:
My excuse was pretty lame. I told my parents I'd slipped into a mud patch even though it was pretty obvious that it wasn't mud I was covered in. They didn't press however, so afterÂ showering I made a beeline for my room. Cleaning Sharon's house and the following jog drained my energy, so I simply undressed, slipped on some pajama shorts, and collapsed on my bed. I think I was asleep before my head hit the pillow.

One of the strangest things about sleeping is how you never really know at which point you've drifted off. Even more frustrating is if you actually stop and think about it, the only thing you'll achieve is restlessness and you toss and turn for another hour before you find a comfortable position. Likewise, you never really know when a dream starts. One minute I was curled up in my bed, and the next I was standing in the middle of the road, soaked in black gunkÂ again.

"Really? Of all the things that happened that I could've dreamt about, it had to be this?" I grumbled. Looked around, I realized that this was the same road where Sharon ran into the strange gypsy woman. I scanned the area, and it seemed that none other than Sharon herself was making an appearance in this dream, covered in the same black filth I was.Â 

"Hello, Sharon. That's weird, girls in my dreams don't usually wear so many clothes," I said, saying the first thing that came to my mind. Hey, I was in a dream, not like she was going to judge me for it.

"I'll say, neither do boys in my dreams," the dream-Sharon shrugged. "So, should I be tickling you, or should you be tickling me?"

Not that the idea wasn't enticing, but it was still rather sudden and I couldn't help but say reflexively. "Come again?"

"Well, in these kind of dreams usually it's one or the other, isn't it?" Dream-Sharon shrugged before pouncing on me. She grabbed and my sides and quickly tickled me to the ground. Just like the real thing, dream-Sharon was stronger than she looked, and annoyingly enough she managed to pin me down.

I tried squirming free, but she just giggled, ignoring my attempts to escape and began spidering her fingers up and down my ribs, drawing fast, frenzied giggles from me. Annoyingly enough, I was also wearing the same thin t-shirt I was from our jog, which provided little protection. Trying to knock her off didn't work either, because even in a dream, I wasn't going to punch a girl... besides, being tickled by an Indian cutie wasn't exactly a bad thing.

Sharon proceeded to go to town on my ribs and sides, grabbing and poking them aggressively. It was a far more muscle-stimulating tickle that left me breathless with laughter, and with one of my instinctive struggles I accidentally knocked her over onto her back. Seizing the opportunity, I smiled and straddled her mid-section.Â 

"Looks like it’s my turn!" I grinned, as I wiggled my fingers and dug into her flat stomach.Â 

She squeaked with laughter as I made contact and tried squirming away, but no matter where she twisted and turned my fingers were there, waiting to greet her skin. My fingers followed her toned belly with laser-like precision, poking and prodding. After a while, she stopped struggling and just took the tickling. At her surrender, I began blowing a few raspberries, mixed in with a few ticklish licks. After inadvertently licking a bit of black sludge, I went back to more standard tickling, which dream-Sharon enjoyed so much she lifted her arms up to allow me better access to her underarms. I chuckled, stroking my fingers up and down her sides before going up to harass her underarms and trailing back down to her taut belly.Â 

I was having so much fun that tormenting my very ticklish friend to hysterics that I was totally surprised when I felt a finger tap on my shoulder.

It was...
115222211.title: Dejavu

1152222111.content:
When I turned, I was met by two policemen who I vaguely recognized as being local, their uniforms bleached of almost all color. This was new. I wasn't how I was meant to respond to their sudden appearance. Sure I was tickling the living daylights out of my friend, but that wasn't illegal, was it? As I was wondering how to greet them, I felt a pair of hands grab my wrists and pull them behind my back. I was about to protest when I saw the man's emotionless and unblinking stare.

"C'mon, officer, what'd I do wrong?" I asked. I'd definitely never been arrested in a dream before. Not in real life either actually. And now that the fun part of the dream was over, I was kinda hoping it would end soon. They pushed me into the back of their police cruiser, dream-Sharon right behind me, her hands also cuffed behind her back. The officers still remained silent even as they got in the front and we took off for the station.

As I glanced outside the window, I noticed that the dreamworld seemed different from reality. Everything seemed a lot darker, like there wasn't enough light. When the car drove past the local Kitchy Karnival, I noticed how all the loud colors seemed to have been drained from the decorum. I felt like I was in a black and white movie, or maybe a film noir. While I was imagining how I would look in a fedora, I heard a yelp. I glanced over and saw that dream-Sharon was pinching herself. Taking up the idea, I mimicked her. All I accomplished was a smarting sting on my arm. "That's really weird... okay, why am I stuck in the shadow realm?"

"The shadow realm? Ugh, even in my dreams you're such a geek..." Dream-Sharon said. 

I gaped at her. Her dream? Before I could say anything however, the car jolted to a stop and the two blank-faced police officers pulled us out. As we were moved along, I took a look at the police station and had a good idea of what they were going to with us once we were inside.

To celebrate their fiftieth year-anniversary, the officers had recently put in a set of ornamental ceremonial stockades to celebrate their years of service and dedication to punish crime. Of course, I had a sneaking suspicion they were perfectly functional. This suspicion was confirmed as the two cops who had escorted Sharon and me pushed us to the stocks and strapped the two of us in. They uncuffed us just to retie our arms above our heads, leaving our armpits exposed as well.

I looked around at the station. On top of the messed up color scheme and the blank stares everyone was giving us, not a single officer there seemed to be working. Usually people were answering the phone, writing reports, pushing someone into the jail every once in a while, basically doing things that you would expect cops to do. Instead they just slowly gathered around the two of us, watching and waiting.

"Oh, boy..." Sharon gulped as she saw two officers take a seat by her feet, stripping her shoes and socks off, while two more took position at her sides. 

"You can say that again..." I said as I was quadruple-teamed in a similar fashion four policewomen. They ignored my feet and legs, choosing rather to congregate around my upper-body.

"Uh, can we talk about this?" I asked, hoping against hope that these people could be reasoned with. I looked at the curiously blank-faced officers and realized...
1152222111.title: Book 'em.

choices: I woke up in my bed.
I woke up in the very same place as I'd first dreamt of
11522221112.content:
There was no build-up, no teasing, no anticipation. They dove straight in, as if they wanted to hear us both screaming with laughter as soon as possible. And they certainly succeeded. 

The shock was like being by a violent bolt of lightning, or maybe being tackled by a two hundred dude. Suddenly all eight hands pounced at once, this one surprise attack dissolving all my defenses. There were two hands constantly rummaging into my underarms, but my mid-section was where the torment was worst at, being tormented by no less than three possessed policewomen. 

On each side, one was pinching each of my ribs with one hand and teasing the area in-between them with the other. Combined they kept me constantly bouncing squirming from left-to-right, but it was useless, if I leaned left, I would be leaning further into one set of nails, if I leaned right, the other.

The last policewomen seemed to have claimed my stomach and I soon became painfully aware that she had come prepared. It seemed she had come from the canteen, as she was wielding a pair of plastic forks, like a hungry customer at a restaurant, and using them to great effect. At first she explored my store torso with them, scratching around my sides and lower ribs and hips, then seemed to notice that my belly was particular sensible to this new weapon and began to focus on that area, ignoring my hysterical begging.

I had been tickled before (on a shockingly high number of occasions) but this was probably the first time there was no teasing, no anticipation, no taunting. Just bam, laughter. Though I began to find it hard to think too much when the person at my underarms switched from deep rummaging to gentle scribbling. Even policewomen seemed to have fairly long nails.

Somehow finding enough concentration to glance to my left, I clearly recognized Sharon's boyish laughter only slightly muffled by my own. Based on her frantic squeals, she was having a rough time too.

One officer was squeezing both her thighs at the same time, earning squeaks and squeals for his trouble. She actually started to lean forward in the stocks as she laughed. He mercilessly squeezed the inside of her thighs for several more moments before using both her hand to tickle the back of her kneecaps. I saw her squirm even more when he started to do this, it tickled in a way that made her want to escape rather than laugh.

Another caught Sharon's attention again when he began to tickle her ribs at the same time as her armpits, squeezing along the ribcage and earning squeals and gasps from the young girl. He then began to dig his nails into the soft skin and ran them up and down the lower part of her ribs. While he was doing this, he never stopped tickling her armpits. He tickled the center of them even harder, causing her to lean from one side to another in a vain attempt to escape the torture.

The final two officers down by her feet seemed to be desk jockeys, both brandishing ballpoint pens and stroking them up and down Sharon's brown feet, drawing squiggles, shapes, and figure eights. Sharon's feet were flexing and grasping so responsively to the sharp touch that despite the stocks they had to use one hand to keep her feet still.

Then the policewomen tormenting me intensified the tickling, suddenly all four of them digging into my underarms, eight hands, eighty fingers, forty fingers swirling and scatching over each of my ticklish underarms was too much, and I blacked out to the sound of my own laughter...
11522221112.title: Laying down the Law

115222211121.content:
I woke up in my bed, panting like I had just run a marathon. My skin still felt tingly like I could still feel fingers on my skin. I looked around and saw that was back in my good old room. I laid back on my bed and stared at the ceiling. It had all been just some weird dream... wait, didn't I have something I was meant to do? I checked my watched, cursed and realized I was late for my scheduled morning jog with Sharon.

A few minutes later, I was changed, wearing trainers and at Sharon's doorstep, having wolfed down a quick breakfast.

I rung the doorbell and a noticed a groggy Sharon answer the door, still in her pajamas. After sneakily glancing at how much skin her thin pajamas exposed, I decided to wait for her to get ready first.

As we got ready to begin jogging, I casually asked her, not wanting to sound insane. "So... sleep well?"

She looked at me with wide eyes. "You are a weirdness magnet, aren't you?"

"Well, that depends if you had a weird dream last night or not," I shrugged.

"I definitely did," she said quickly, as she pulled my arm. "Maybe we can jog later. How about instead we talk about how we've been cursed?"

We sat down in front of Sharon's couch discussing plans.To my surprise she seemed utterly convinced about it already, which was rather surprising. usually people in our situations in books and movies were in denial but I guess we were just a bit more savvy than that.

"So that was you in my dream last night? Every word was you?" I said, looking questioningly at her, starting to remember some of the stranger things she had said.

Sharon held my stare, flushing slightly. "Yeah, that was me. And what do you mean your dream? It was, uh, our dream, yeah!"

"Okay, fine, fine, but we need a plan," I said stroking my chin. "We should try finding that gypsy again."

"Yeah, but where? I mean should we try looking for her here, or in the uh, 'shadow realm' as you called it?" Sharon grinned teasingly.

"Oh, you are never going to let me live that down, are you?" I laughed, reaching out and poking Sharon in the sides, making her squeak. "And let's please not call it that. Anything but that."

"Fine, fine," Sharon giggled. "So what's the plan going to be?"
115222211121.title: Curse?

1152222111212.content:
"If the witch... Or whoever she was can send us to that place, she might be found there." I said thoughtfully "Well sleep tonight and try to track her down, maybe someone in the realm can point us in her direction or at least help us find a clue as to what that place us."

Sharon nodded along with me before sighing "Another night of being tickled in my dreams." She said before giving a smile "Same as any other night really." She chuckled. I smiled back a the joke and we resolved on meeting up in the dreamworld that night to find a solution to the problem. We exercised together for a bit so that sleep would come easier to us that night before I headed home and went to bed early, eager to find a solution to the problem.

After some time of tossing and turning, I eventually fell to sleep, my dream starting as soon as I drifted off. The first thing I noticed as that the area around me was darker than before. While before the background had appeared to be simply monochrome at times, there was a subtle difference as the darkness was that much starker and the sky above me was hazy, it being impossible to make out whether it was night or day.

I brought my eyes down to earth and saw that I was in a very different spot from last time and not as well dressed. I was in a pair of grey swimming shorts and in someone's backyard that had a large pool. I wondered briefly the meaning of this when sound finally reached my ears, that of someone screaming with laughter. I twisted around and saw the source, Sharon in a grey bikini having been tied down to a sunbed via her wrists on the rests and ankles to the chair itself. Around her stood three girls, one strawberry blonde, one with black hair and a red head I recognised as being Alicia, Mary and Kimberly respectively, three local rich snobs and bullies.

They too were clad in bikinis although they were all black ones which contrasted with the paleness of their skin. They all stood around Sharon and each had a feather in their hands. The plumes were huge, the size of a forearm and incredibly fluffy looking. They were also the only bit of colour in this place as they were blood red, a stark contrast to the black and grey surroundings. I shivered just from looking at those feathers as silly as it sounds, I got a feeling of real evil come from them as their standing out only added to the weird feel of the place.

What wasn't helping was Sharon who was positively screaming with laughter. I'd gotten her fairly well from when I first met her but I'd never gotten a reaction like that, no matter how much I tickled. Dream-Alicia was swirling her feather around Sharon's bare belly, the toned abs being constantly assaulted as the whole length of the feather went around and around her belly, constantly skimming over Sharon's navel. Dream-Mary used her feather on Sharon's feet, brushing up and down on each sole, not seeming to care that Sharon was curling her toes or trying to cover one foot with the other. But then again, the way in which the feather managed to brush up all of Sharon's foot at once negated these defences anyway. The final feather, wielded by dream-Kimberly, seemed to be the worst of them all. The third scarlet feather was being brushed up and down Sharon's thighs and teased the front of her bikini bottom, the thin material looking as if it offered no protection whatsoever as the plume brushed across and tickled Sharon's most sensitive area.

The three way assault seemed to be driving Sharon out of her mind as she thrashed her head from side to side as the tickling went on, her face contorted with laughter as she tried to escape from the tickling but to no avail. What we had gone through the previous night had just been a taster, I realised. Now this curse was kicking in fully. I watched as Sharon continued to scream with forced laughter from the feathers, unable to get a word through her shrieks as I remembered our original plan and decided that if these dream-people are distracted by Sharon, I could probably try and find the witch. But it didn't sit well with me just leaving Sharon to be tormented for hours until she woke up.

Eventually, I decided too...
1152222111212.title: Getting Darker

11522221112121.content:
As much as I knew being the chivalrous knight would probably not go well for me, or for Sharon, or very likely both of us, I just knew I couldn't leave Sharon to suffer like this. I tried to think quickly of a plan over the hysterical laughter of Sharon, who face was starting to get covered in tears from all the tickling. I could try and get the attention of the trio, see if I could reason with them. I mean sure, it didn't work with the policemen from the last dream, but I actually knew Alicia, Mary and Kimberly, no matter how much I didn't want to, and could try and convince them to let Sharon go.

I also thought about rushing them, pushing them away from the sunbed so that I could untie Sharon. I was sure (well, pretty sure) that I could take on each of them individually, maybe even two of them at a time. But I take all three of the spoilt brat crew, especially armed with those blood red feathers?

I decided to...
11522221112121.title: Help Sharon

11522222.content:
The sudden appearance of a car made my heart stop as Sharon came close to running right out in front of it. She managed to stop herself just in time though, her foots scraping against the pavement as she stopped short right on the edge of it. The car also screeched to a halt and I let out a large sigh of relief at seeing Sharon unharmed. I quickly rushed over to her, my own exhaustion temporarily forgotten.

"Are you OK?" I asked, checking for any damage over her.

"N-No... I'm OK." She answered although I could see she was shaking a little. I put an arm around Sharon's shoulders and hugged her tight as a way to comfort her. She let out a little sigh and put her head on my shoulder, eager for the support she was getting. I looked over to the car that had stopped right in front of it and noticed it was a police car. Normally this wouldn't have been a problem but the driver's door opened and out popped Officer Lane.

Officer 'Give me ten bucks and I just might look the other way' Lane, the most notoriously corrupt police officer in town. It was unknown how exactly she kept her job but it was thought she had something on the Mayor. She was a bully who loved to throw her weight and authority around to get herself ahead in money or would take you down to the station if you failed to comply. She was a tall woman of Amazonian proportions, legs and arms with large muscles that showed her work out regime was one of her few virtues. She had deep ebony skin and dark hair that was cut around the bottom of her ears. She had an attractive face but was marred by gleaming eyes that always showed her contempt for others when she spoke.

At seeing us, Lane broke out into a smirk "Well well," She said "Jaywalking and endangering lives, that's two serious counts right there."

I looked around the street but saw that no one was there to help us go against what Lane was saying. I scowled at her as she smirked at the both of us "We didn't do anything wrong! It was an accident!" I protested.

"Verbal assault on an officer of the law, another major charge." Lane said, obviously enjoying herself through all this "Now then, do you have anything to say that might make me decide to overlook your crimes for the time being?"

Sharon and me glared at her, we had no money on us and had nothing to offer her whatsoever "Just leave us alone!" Sharon shouted "You know we didn't do anything wrong so stop picking on us!"

Brave words, but not exactly smart ones as Officer Lane simply walked up to us, showing surprising speed for a woman her size as she reached out and grabbed onto each of our arms "That sounds like resisting arrest to me too." She said before pulling out some handcuffs and cuffing Sharon's hands behind her back before doing the same to me.

We were then shoved roughly into the back of the police car before the doors were locked after Lane got in "Now let's take a ride and I'm sure you two will come to regret your law breaking." She leered before starting the car and driving us to...
11522222.title: Long arm of the law

choices: Dropped us off in the same cell
115222221.content:
In sullen silence, me and Sharon sat back in the car and glared at the back of the head of Officer Lane. She was all smiles herself as she drove through the streets of town, telling us on how we should learn to mend ways and use this as a reminder that we should always give proper respect to the police from now on. Such hypocrisy made me and Sharon scowl throughout the car ride, wanting more than anything else to find some way to get Lane to shut up.

Noticing our less than enthusiastic take on her story, Lane stopped talking and pulled into a spot just outside the police station. We were right beside a large tree and shielded from prying eyes as Lane got out of the car and walked towards the rear, getting in next to Sharon as she shut the door behind her with an almighty slam. Needless to say, it was cramped between the three of us, in no small part due to Sharon squashing herself against me as she tried to escape out of the reach of Officer Lane but having the effect of only pressing me against the opposite door.

"Now what's all this sulking about?" Lane asked with a smarmy grin "While I know getting caught during your crimes isn't the best of experiences, you two should smile a little! I'm going to show you a better way of living that shows you the advantages of obeying the law."

"We didn't do anything!" Sharon shouted out, a little unwisely in my opinion "And we're not going to smile for you and the way you try to push people around!"

Lane glowered down at Sharon from her position beside us and it hit us just how vulnerable we were with her hulking over us and our hands cuffed behind out backs. Without warning, Lane's hands shot down and grabbed onto Sharon's thighs, pulling the girl up off balance as her head landed in my lap and Lane held her legs up with one arm. With her free hand, she started tickling the backs of Sharon's legs, her long nails scampering over the area where her thighs met her butt and all around it.

"NOHOODOHOHONNN'TTAHAAAA!!!" Sharon cried out in shock as the fingers tickled the sensitive skin, the running shorts offering little, if any, protection whatsoever from the ticklish assault. Sharon's head twisted from side to side while on my legs, her face contorted into one of forced laughter as the fingers did their work. Lane was slow and meticulous in her tickling, her fingers probing first the legs, and then Sharon's butt as she wriggled her nails into the soft skin. Lane showed no mercy at all as she continued to tickle Sharon's body, her fingers wriggling against the sensitive area and had a look of savage enjoyment on her face that it honestly scared me.

Although having Sharon twist and turn as she laughed from being tickled so close to my groin wasn't exactly a bad feeling, I couldn't let her punishment go on. As Lane made Sharon cry out even more as she delivered a series of ticklish pinches over her buttocks, I cried out "OK! OK! We'll do whatever you say! We're sorry for breaking the law! Just stop already!"

Officer Lane stopped the tickling at that and gave a sickly smile "Good to see you're learning sense." She said before opening the door behind her "But I think a day in the cells would really help set you two straight."

Getting out of the car, Lane ordered us to follow her, Sharon having to re-balance herself before she could, looking completely humiliated at her ordeal. She kept quiet this time though, knowing it'd be best for her and we walked in silence as Officer Lane...
115222221.title: Police Brutality

choices: Tell Sharon to run and try to distract Lane!
1152222212.content:
We were half-marched, half-dragged through the halls of the police station. It was largely deserted, with an occasional officer passing us with a downward look on their faces. Were the other officers aware of Lane and her corruption? Did they just not want to get involved? I looked to Sharon, who still looked humiliated, with strands of black hair sticking to her mocha skin. I wished I could have comforted her, but with my hands cuffed behind my back, there was little I could do.

Eventually, we reached the basement of the station. There were many empty holding cells, but a few had occupants... teenagers like ourselves, looking frightened and exhausted. Perhaps these were other victims of our Amazonian warden? We didn't have the chance to ask, as Sharon and I were roughly pushed into a fresh cell.

"Now," cooed Officer Lane, hands on hips, smug expression on her face. "We need to make sure you criminals are clean. We don't want any lice or fleas to contaminate the prison population."

Sharon and I exchanged curious looks. I wasn't sure if it was intended to be an insult or not.

"We don't have bugs on us..." Sharon muttered with a frown.

Officer Lane took off her police cap and shook her head. She was certainly beautiful... which just emphasized her cruelty.

"And why should I trust a little law-breaker like yourself? Now, get undressed. I need to hose you both down."

My blood ran cold at her command. "Uh, pardon?" I was so shocked I could barely comprehend the words.

She took a step forward, and her statue-esque body towered over me. "I'll ask one more time. Strip down to your underwear and get ready for the hose. If you don't comply, I will perform my duties as an officer and do it for you."

I gulped. Sharon looked just as stunned. While she was a close friend, I didn't particularly like the idea of undressing in front of her... and certainly not in a cold, dingy prison cell gawked at by a cruel captor. But there appeared to be little choice...
1152222212.title: Prison Cleaning

choices: Squirt the bottle in Lane's eyes and run!
11522222121.content:
Officer Lane motioned for us to come towards us, and she roughly spun us in place and removed our handcuffs. Shoving us back into the cell, she then gestured for us to undress.

Sighing, I reluctantly unzipped my jeans and kicked off my shoes. I noticed Sharon doing the same, with perhaps a bit more hesitation. All the while Officer Lane hungrily eyed us both. I could almost sense her lips smacking with anticipation.

"There's a good little pair of delinquents. If you keep it up, you might even get parole," our dark captress laughs. I merely glared at her.

Tearing off my shirt quickly like a bandaid, I folded my arms in front of me. I tried to maintain my dignity, but it was difficult with only my boxers on!

"There," grumbled Sharon nearby, tossing her yellow shirt into a heap. "Happy now?"

I stole a glance at my Indian friend, and couldn't help but smile at her body. Dark and elegant, her skin was smooth and flawless... and a nice contrast to her lacy yellow bra and matching panties. She didn't strike me as the type to wear such fancy underwear, but I suppose everyone had their secrets exposed now. I noticed Sharon smirk back at me, and she motioned her head down. I looked down to see I had chosen my bumblebee boxers this morning. Flushing red, I smiled as much as dared... as awkward as the situation was, Sharon certainly knew how to provoke my sense of humor!

"Well done," laughed Lane, and I suspected her laugh was more sinister than she let on. She reached behind her back and revealed a bottle of liquid.

Throwing it towards me, I caught it with ease.

"That's the delousing solution," Lane explained, leering at Sharon and myself. "I want you both greased up with that stuff before I get the hose."

I looked at Sharon, and she shrugged. There were worse things than having to rub down a half-naked girl... unfortunately, those things might be just around the corner...
11522222121.title: Comply with Lane

115222221212.content:
I stared at our captor. Officer Lane looked at me with anticipation with that fire in her eyes the seemed to border on insanity. I looked over at my scantily clad friend. Shanon was truly an Indian beauty and I felt a stir of emotions as I saw her rich brown skin. To say how she looked like you could saw she looked like a sister of Shyria Saran.

“Okay Officer.” I said thinking of a plan. I walked over to her with the delousing lotion and smiled at Shanon. “Play along 'kay.” I said winking, she smirked and smiled. With a squirt of the bottle I added a shine to her smooth and soft belly, she flinched as the cold solution impacted her warm skin. I took my hand and started to spread the lotion around, her belly already felt like very soft silk but the lotion made her toned stomach almost frictionless. Shanon immediately starting giggling and wrapped her arms around my neck and pressed her chest against my chest to keep her from doubling over.

“Good job delinquent.” Officer Lane said smiling a predatory grin. Shanon continued to giggle as my finger enjoyed running over her belly and sides. I wanted to also attack her bellybutton but she was going to need some of her breath for the next part. I continued for a moment before sadly stopping.

“Officer it would be faster if you sprayed while I rubbed ma'am.” I said to the Officer respectfully.

“You know what, I like you delinquent. Unlike your mocha friend over here you actually have respect.” She walked over and held out her hand for the delousing lotion.

“Get ready.” I whispered in Shanon's ear, she nodded in reply, her long dark hair covering her shoulders. I waited for the Amazon to get close before aiming for her eyes; however Shanon took the bottle out of my hand unexpectedly and and squirted the bottle into the officer's eyes.

“Aw! Damn it!” Lane yelled falling to her knees and clutching her eyes.

“Run!” I yelled to Shanon, taking her hand and dashing for the steps. She kept paced and was overtaking me as we reached the top of the steps. Officer Lane continued her yelling as she followed us up the stairs. On the upper floor we made a break for the door, Lane was behind us, I didn't see her pull out of taser.

Shanon screamed in shock and the taser stuck into her side and knocked her to the ground.

“Got you slumdog millionaire!” She said menacingly as she approached. “Your coming back to my house tonight, you thought what he just did was ticklish, just wait until your tickled from dusk till dawn by me and my sisters!” I tried to get Shanon up but she was motionless on the ground groaning.

“What is going on here!” I looked up ans saw Commissioner Jordan come out. He was a tall and muscular man with a no nonsense attitude. “Lane! What are you doing?”

“Just dealing with a criminal here sir.” Lane said in a sultry voice.

“Mister Rina's daughter, he's out of town for two weeks, why is she here?” He asked looking at her, Shanon's hair was plastered on the ground and he slick and smooth belly was rubbed onto the floor, her brown skin was covered in a sheen of cold sweat. Commissioner Jordan looked from the panting girl on the ground to me. “And him?”

“Just a couple of criminals I caught. Though I must say Miss Rina that was awfully stupid assaulting an officer like that.” Lane said savagely standing over Shanon, I stepped forward to defend her but she shoved me back.

“You know going to court is just going to end up getting you in trouble.” Jordan said rolling his eyes.

“Come on John.” She said in a flirtatious voice patting his chest. “Let me sentence her to a week and a half with me.” She beamed a smile at him.

“And what, let you have what is essentially a tickle slave until her parents are back?” Jordan said incredulously.

“I'll make it up to you.” She said putting a hand on his shoulder.

“And him?” He asked looking at me.

“Oh him- I don't care he can go as long as he stays out of my way.” I balled my fists in rage that this woman was trying to take away my friend's freedom, make her a slave essentially. Yet it would be Jordan who deemed her fate.

You can tell by the way Jordan looks at her that she's got some sort of dirt on him. He eyes Sharon sympathetically and then clears his throat. "Alright, Officer Lane. You can exact, ahem, justice on her. But please go easy, she's just a girl."

"Of course, of course, Commissioner Jordan." she says smoothly. "And I'm sure she'll soon turn to a model citizen." As Officer Lane grabs at Sharon, the Indian girl tries to run for it. However, Lane catches her around the waist before she can make it two steps with one muscular arm. To pacify Sharon she then digs her fingers on her other hand into her hips and waist.

Sharon is completely still for an instant then screeches, "HEEHEEHEE- PLEASESTOPOHNO-HAHAHAHA!!". It's useless as she can't break free from Lane's iron grip and the tickling soon tires her out. The officer hauls her out the door and into the courtyard, away from you. The Commissioner then speaks up to you.

"I hope she lets your friend go. I'd help if I could, you know. By the way, I think you're free to leave." He then opens the door for you and sees you out.

The minute you are out of his sight you double back around the side of the building to follow Officer Lane. You remember she mentioned something about going home to see her sisters, and you're sure they're no better than she is. ****

11522222121212.title: The sisters

choices: Let's go for a walk in the woods
Let's head to the beach, I want to work on my tan.
Let's see what you hide in your closet, sport.
For old time's sake... tickle fight!
I'm beat. Let's just hang out on the couch for now.
12.content:
My cousin Leslie was going to be here any minute now. She was 21 and coming back from college at a school a ways north of here, and was going to stay here for a couple weeks before going back to her parents' house. My parents were both off on a vacation themselves, so we'd have the house to just the two of us. They were having a "second honeymoon" on a European holiday, and I was happy for them to get out and enjoy themselves. They'd both been working hard lately. And honestly, I was looking forward to getting the house without any parental supervision.

I think they thought that if Leslie is here with me, I'd get into less trouble. Honestly, if it were anything like old times, she'd only get me in more of it. But she'd cause less trouble goofing off with me than getting into fights with her parents. I think that's why she wanted to stay here for a few weeks before going back home. Leslie was always pretty stubborn, and sometimes when she got mad said some things she didn't mean. I remember back when we were younger, she pulled the "I'm adopted, you're not my real parents" card. That embarrassed her later.

I put on some clothes and came downstairs, made myself some breakfast, started my day. I had just finished my scrambled eggs when I heard an aggressive knocking at the door. Leslie must be here. I opened the door to let her in, getting a look at her for the first time in a few years.

"Hey there, kiddo! Haven't seen you in a while, C'mere!" Leslie said to me, dropping a big dufflebag on the floor and wrapping me in a bear hug. I was surprised, but it was good to see her again. She was still a head taller than me, I was hoping I would've caught up, but it looks like now it'll never happen. She had dirty blonde hair that was shoulder length, and pale skin, the kind that will tan easily down here in a sunnier place. She was wearing a sleeveless tan colored tank top, and a loose pair of pants with a camo design. As she wrapped her arms around me, I noticed her shirt riding up. It was already showing an inch of her bare waist, but now slid up to show more of her midriff, even showing a hint of her navel. My first thought was a tall girl like her probably has trouble finding shirts that are long enough.

My second thought was that I should wriggle my hands down her sides and take the opportunity to tickle that bare skin of hers. We used to get into a lot of tickle fights when we were growing up. Maybe that's part of why I love tickling so much. But I remember that I also lost every one of those tickle fights. Even though I lost, I didn't actually mind, and I think Leslie knew it. I might've also had a bit of a crush on her growing up.

But with a twinge of regret, I pulled away from the hug. There was plenty of time to try and beat Leslie in a tickle fight later. Or, you know, just lose. That was fun too. "Oof, it's great to see you too, Leslie. Are you trying to smush me?" You say to her, grinning at her as you both head into the living room.

"Heh, only a little." She said, plopping herself down on the couch. "Whew, that was a long trip. But whatever, we've got the place to ourselves! Whatcha wanna do first sport? I'm itching to do something." She said, looking up at you. Leslie certainly was still energetic. I'll have to make sure to keep up with her.

"Well, you're the guest, Leslie. And its just your first day here. So, what do you want to do first?" You ask her. She sits pensively for a second, before finally saying...
12.title: My cousin shows up.

choices: A strange tree with unusual looking branches.
A field of tall grass strangely swaying on its own.
I don't care, now's the perfect chance to tickle her.
121.content:
"Let's go for a walk in the woods. Campus is so deep in the city that I don't think I've seen any wildlife in months," Leslie said, jumping up off the couch and stretching. Once again this revealed her lower belly and navel, causing my eyes to linger over the taut skin. Leslie's always been athletic, and the view only confirmed she's pretty toned and been taking good care of herself.

Leslie noticed my look and gave me a knowing smile. "I know what you're thinking, kiddo, and you're welcome to try," she told, just as she reached out and gave my ribs a quick squeeze. The sudden attack caught me off guard, and I let out an embarrassing yelp and squirmed out of her grasp. Leslie took on an overly dramatic fighting pose. "Come at me bro!"

"Ugh, you're still such a ham, Leslie," I said, trying to catch up to her quick pace. "But I'll get you back when you least expect it." She smirked at me and wiggled her eyebrows, obviously welcoming the challenge. Hmm, this walk in the woods might be more fun than I initially thought. Of course, I realized I also had to stay on my guard. She could always decide to pounce me for the heck of it.

We got our shoes on and headed out into the woods behind my house. There were a bunch of trails that snaked out into the trees, and to be honest I'd never gone down most of them. Or gone very far at least, since there never seemed like much point. But now with Leslie so determined to do something, I'm sure we'd run into something new. Leslie was leading the way, picking a path seemingly at random. I followed her as we walked single file down the narrow dirt path, letting her take rights and lefts as she saw fit. While I tried to keep a good sense of which forks we took and how to get back, I realized we were quickly getting ourselves lost. Not that it would be too hard to get back even if that happened. I could still figure out which way was back into town.

Neither of us said much as we hiked down the paths, which were getting increasingly knotted with roots as we ventured deeper into the forest. I could tell Leslie was enjoying the chance to get out into nature, occasionally stopping for a second to look at an interesting tree or flower. It felt nostalgic being with her, and despite the silence, I could tell we both felt comfortable around each other.

Walking behind her, I also couldn't help but notice when she pushed a branch out of the way and exposed a bare underarm just in front of me. Stretched out just in front of me like that, so inviting, I couldn't help but…

…get whapped with the branch as she let it go, catching me off guard and distracted. I quickly pushed the branch out of the way only to see her laughing at me. "Hey, eyes up front, tiger. Now where were you looking?" she asked me, and I could tell the whole thing was a deliberate set up. I couldn't help but chuckle, she totally got me. I'd have to be more careful if I was ever going to get her back.

Our path started inclining a bit, with Leslie pushing ahead and gaining a little distance from me. Unfortunately, she was in a bit better shape, and making her way up the incline easier than me. As I was catching up, I saw her stop at the top of the hill. I could tell something unusual had caught her interest. "Hey!" she yelled back at me, not even turning around. "C'mere and look at this!" What got her so excited, I wondered?
121.title: Walk in the Woods

choices: We run to the safety of the barren hill ahead.
The grass is too much for us, and we fall over.
Distracted, we didn't notice the hole in the ground ahead of us...
1212.content:
Pushing away my immediate, tickle-obsessed instincts, I decided to see what caught Leslie's attention. I jogged up the path to where she was, getting only a little winded by the time I caught up to her. Gasping slightly, I saw she was pointing out over a field in front of us.

We were standing in front of a field of tallgrass. It looked like it came up a little over knee high in front of us, but further in it looked like the grass rose well past my waist. The field was about the size of a football field, with a bare hill on the other side past the taller part of the grass. The tallgrass was swaying back and forth in the breeze, and was probably putting out a good amount of pollen. Thankfully neither of us had allergies. This species of grass had kind of a purple tinge to it, but was otherwise incredibly normal looking. For the life of me, I couldn't tell what got Leslie excited.

"So… grass?" I asked her, looked at her with a confused expression. "I know you've been living the big city life lately, but you've seen tallgrass before, Leslie."

"No, dufus. Look!" Leslie said, pointing again. "See how the grass is swaying? There's no wind at all! None of the leaves in the trees are moving. The air is perfectly still. So why is the grass moving around like that? It's not even all moving in one direction, it can't be wind."

Looking again, Leslie was right. The nearby trees were completely still. I couldn't feel even a hint of breeze in the air. But that grass kept waving back and forth, almost hypnotically. First one way, then the other, almost like it was searching for something. Super weird.

"C'mon! Let's go check it out!" Leslie called back to me, already heading out into the field. I hurried to catch up to her, as we entered the tallgrass at the same time. I could swear it reacted to us, swaying to and fro a little faster as we started making our way through the field. The stalks brushed against my legs and seemed to wiggle behind my knees. The effect was starting to make me giddy, as I noticed the grass was distinctly tickly.

"M-man Leslie, this grass is really hehe, really moving- haha" I said, surprised at myself for breaking down into laughter from just some grass brushing my legs. Somehow it tickled way more than I expected. Tons of little fronds lightly brushed across my skin, as if they were hunting for a sensitive spot to linger over.

"I know! It's crazy. Maybe we'll figure out why if we make it across the field. Man, is the grass getting to you? Little baby too tickwish?" Leslie teased, making me try and scowl at her. She seemed to be keeping her composure just fine. Although I definitely noticed a grin on her face. And it definitely seemed like a ticklish kind.

We pressed on across the field, as the grass got taller around us. We came to the portion where the grass grew higher, and it was up past our waists. Thankfully my shorts and shirt were enough protection to keep the grass from really tickling me. But then I noticed Leslie was not so lucky. Her shirt stopped an inch or two short, leaving a band of bare midriff exposed, which the tallgrass seemed somehow eager to sway over, brushing her bare belly, hips, and sides. I noticed her belly starting to shake with pent up laughter.

"Hehe, s-so who's the 'tickwish baby' now? You-hoho look like you're h-having more problems than mehehe!" I told her, my laughter ruining the taunt a little, but not much. Leslie started to say something, but just then a frond swiped over her hip in just the right way, causing her to yelp and break into a stream of giggles.

"Hehehe, sh-shut uhuhup!" she said, as we descended in more and more ticklish laughter. I also noticed we were walking slower and slower… We needed to do something, and quick.
