12123.content:
We moved through the tickling grass, giggling and chortling the entire way until I heard Leslie scream.
"Hahahahaaaaaaaaah!" When I looked up, she was no where to be seen and I started running forward.
"Leslie?! Leslie!! Where are you? Hey! Where are yoooooooooooou?!" That's when I "found" the hole. As I fell, I quickly caught up to Leslie, who like me, was screaming her head off. "Leslie!"
"Dude! What is happening?!"
"I don't know!! Take my hand!" Leslie reached over and took my hand, and we clutched at each other's arms to make sure we didn't get separated. We fell for what felt like hour, but was probably only a few minutes. Suddenly a light appeared and as we fell through it, we must have gone about 30 ft in the air. And then gravity kicked in and we fell toward the ground, but for whatever reason, the grass caught us and gently lowered us down. After about a minute of catching our breath, the grass started tickling us.
"What the hell! Are we back here? Seriously?!" Leslie yelled.
"Come on, let's get out of this stupid grass!" We quickly ran out of the grass, and then fell down onto our butts in order to properly catch our breath. After several minutes, we were just sitting there, trying to figure out what happened.
"I forgot how freaking weird this town can be sometimes. You'd think a giant octopus that held me upside down and tickled my feet would burn that into my memory." She muttered.
"Yeah, no kidding. Come on, let's go back."
"Good idea." But then something just as weird as the grass and the hole happened. The curvy, winding road that was covered in roots that we took to get here was gone. It had been replaced by a straight shot road that was smooth and paved. We exchanged worried, baffled looks, but remained silent as we walked down the road, wondering just where we were. When we looked out, we saw the town just the way we left it. But something felt odd about it. Like it was vastly different somehow. We started walking home. Then I realized what was different. The town looked like it'd be turned into a center of tickling culture. Restaurants and shops had signs that advertised different tickling specials, and some of the places looked like they were devoted to tickling, there were different stocks and bondage tables located around town with people being publicly tickle tortured, and looking at the people, they often wore clothing that exposed vulnerable ticklish spots, they openly tickled friends as greetings and interactions, there were even a few girls and guys dressed up in bathing suits, offering to be pinned and tickled for money. I couldn't decide what was more powerful. My enjoyment of what was around me, or being completely weirded out. Eventually, we made it back home but had to take a double take since it looked to be ten times bigger then we left it. Like it had been different sections added onto it.
"Are you sure this is the right place?" Leslie asked.
"Positive..." I said quietly. "Watch." I walked up to the door and turned the key in the lock and it unlocked easily. We walked through the house, mystified by what had happened. We walked into the kitchen to see...us. It was me and Leslie, and they looked to be making sandwiches. "Hello?" They jumped in surprise and when they turned toward us, I saw that they...

122.content:
"Let's go to the beach!" Leslie says, jumping up enthusiastically. "I want to work on my tan. I'm all pale, and it's so nice and sunny here. And the beach here is so great! Let's go!" Leslie quickly starts rummaging through her bag, presumably looking for a swimsuit. I shook my head, and realized its going to be tough keeping up with her. Leslie gave out an "Aha!" and help up the two halves of a dark green bikini. "Alright, I'm going to go bed changed. Go get your trucks on, what're you waiting for?" She said, already moving to the bathroom to get changed.

Deciding that there was no stopping her, I went to my room and got out my blue swim trunks and changed into them, also putting on a white t-shirt and a pair of flip flops. Good beach clothing. I started thinking about what else I should bring along, but before I could give it any real thought I heard Leslie yell from downstairs. "Alright, I'm ready, let's go! Time's a-wasting!" I hurried downstairs to find Leslie standing in the living room in her bikini. Her tall, statuesque figure looked very, very good in it. She was in great shape, and my eyes were drawn away from her face. Her top hugged her breasts nicely, giving an alluring amount of cleavage. And her toned tummy was fully exposed, and I felt my fingers twitch at the urge to reach out and try to tickle her. That long, shallow depression of her bellybutton, the curves of her hips, the slightest indication of her abs underneath her smooth, pale skin. I bet I could really get her if she wasn't expecting…

"Hey! Earth to dufus!" Leslie called out, snapping me out of my reverie. "My eyes are up here, y'know. I know how awesome I look, but try to keep a handle on those hormones." I blushed and looked away as she teased, but she consoled me, "Hey, it's cool. I know how irresistible I look." She winked at me, and I playfully punched her arm.

"You're a dork." I told her simply, recovering my wits. "C'mon, I'll drive us over there." The two of us got in the car my parents had left for me. Leslie reclined in the passenger seat and relaxed as I drove us to the beach, taking the easy twists and turns west to towards the ocean. It was a quick drive, and before we knew it we were at the beach.

Surprisingly, there weren't many people there, despite the warm and sunny day. I could see some girls playing beach volleyball off to the side. It looked to be an intense competition, although I noticed a girl on the sidelines who reached over to tickle one of the players at a critical moment, leading to her missing the ball. Interesting rules. Here and there were people lying on blankets or playing in the shallows, but there was plenty of beach space to go around. I looked up to see the steep stairway that led up the cliff towards the mansions that overlooked the ocean. Man, it'd be cool to be in one of those.

"Crap!" I heard Leslie mutter. "We forgot sun screen. I'm not going to get tan now, I'm just going to turn into a lobster." We got out of the car and started heading toward the beach, and I realized that she was right, we had completely forgotten sun screen. Well, maybe if someone hadn't been so eager, I would've thought of it.

"Well, if you get all red, I promise to rub aloe on you." I tell her consolingly. Thankfully I don't burn easily, so I wasn't too worried, although I should probably wear sunscreen.

"Yea, I'll bet you'd like that." Leslie retorts playfully. "Wait, wait! Look over there, someone's selling suncreen!" She looked to be right, at the edge of the sand was a table with a woman standing beside it. Getting closer, it looked like she was handing out free samples of some new brand of sunscreen. I picked up a bottle and examined it. "Cosqui 75! Protects from the sun! Sensitive skin!" The bottle said simply. Apparently this stuff was for people with sensitive skin? That didn't really sound like me, but as long as it protected against UV, I supposed it didn't really matter.

"Would you like a free sample?" The woman asked, making me turn my attention to her. She was a shorter girl, about our age. She had jet black hair of chin length in kind of a Cleopatra haircut. She was wearing a golden yellow bikini that showed off her attractive figure. As much as my eyes would be naturally drawn to the curves of her lovely figure, I was struck by her eyes. They were… yellow, which I didn't think was an eye color.

“Sure, we’ll try some,” I told the woman.

“Come lie down here,” she instructed Leslie and me, gesturing towards a table near hers. “I will put the sunscreen on you.”

“We can get it on,” I stated, still a little suspicious about the yellow eyes.

“I will put the sunscreen on you,” she insisted. “I want to see the satisfaction in your faces when it is put on. Please lie down now.”

Although I was still somewhat reluctant, I obeyed the woman and lied down on the table. Leslie followed me, and I could tell that she was also wondering what was going on. Once we were on the table, the woman opened one of the bottles of sunscreen. She put some on her hand and started rubbing it vigorously over Leslie’s bare belly. “HEHEHE,” my cousin giggled. “IHIHIT TIHIHICKLEHES!” Undeterred, the woman kept scrubbing the sunscreen on Leslie’s stomach for about a minute before moving on to her neck. Leslie’s giggling died down to just occasional giggles as the sunscreen was applied to her skin. After she got the neck, the woman began rubbing the Cosqui 75 on Leslie’s arms and legs, which did not tickle at all. She then instructed Leslie to turn over as she put the sunscreen on her back.

By the time the woman was finished applying the Cosqui 75 to my cousin, she had used up about a quarter of the bottle. She took the bottle with her and walked over to my side of the table, and then she started to rub it over my midriff. Soon enough, I felt that the way the sunscreen was being applied did tickle quite a bit, and I fell into fits of giggles. “HEHEHE!” I laughed. “NAHAHAT THEHERE!” Just as she had done with Leslie, the woman ignored my complaints and kept going, even getting a little bit of the sunscreen in my bellybutton. She soon finished with my ticklish tummy and moved on to my neck, arms, legs, and back, none of which tickled very much. Once I was covered in Cosqui 75, the woman spoke up again.

“Please lie on your backs again,” the strange woman announced. We both got on our backs, and then the woman’s hands shot to our abdomens and began tickling us again. Unprepared for more tickling, we both broke out in laughter for the minute that she wiggled her fingers on our bare bellies. The woman then decided to stop tickling us and handed Leslie the remainder of the sunscreen. “Thank you for trying out Cosqui 75. Have a nice day at the beach.” After this, the saleswoman headed back over to her own table, leaving us to ourselves.

Looking at my cousin, we both shrugged our shoulders and got up from the table. “Let’s find a place to sunbathe,” Leslie suggested. I quickly agreed to this, and we headed out onto the beach, finding an isolated area with a good view of the ocean and plenty of sun to go around. Within a few minutes, we had put our towels down and were relaxing as the sun came down on us. Just as I was beginning to fall asleep…

125.title: The Plot

choices: Someone was ringing the front doorbell
Footsteps were approaching from the guest room

A high-pitched giggle came from behind the sofa

13.content:
My parents had trusted me with keeping the house for the month they were out. My sister was at a cousin's in Chicago for a week, back for a day, then off to Los Angeles to reconnect with her childhood friend, whom she met when we had lived there, for the rest of the month. For almost the whole month, I had the place all to myself.

Of course, my parents trusted me not to trash the place, and I was both smart and responsible enough to not throw a huge six-day house party. Stepping on my parents' trust wouldn't get me anywhere and besides, huge house parties weren't really my thing. Unless I did something really stupid, which knowing me was unlikely but still quite possible, nothing in the house would break.

Sliding out of bed, I stretched and yawned as was customary for waking me up in the morning. I checked the clock on my desk, which read 10:00. A decent sleep-in, but not as late as I've slept some days in previous summers. Normally I'd be getting dressed before bolting downstairs to eat whatever my mother had cooked up for me, but a new sense of confidence (or surge of insanity rather) and the fact that I was alone in the house gave me the courage to go downstairs butt naked.

Admittedly it was not the smartest thing to do, but who would be watching? The shutters were all closed, the doors were all locked, and no one save family and close friends had a spare key. It was as if my family put the house in lockdown every time they left. Sure, nothing as secure as the U.S. Treasury, but there was significantly less cash and worth inside our house. With that out of my mind, I went to make breakfast.

Bacon sizzled in the pan, and the familiar pop of the toaster told me that the little appliance had done its job. A slice of butter from the fridge, an egg in the pan after the bacon was slapped on a plate. Fifteen minutes saw me sitting at the kitchen counter with a delicious breakfast ready to be devoured, and all in my birthday suit. Soon a fork materialized in my hand and was shoveling the food into my mouth. The best food is the food you make yourself. Cereal is good and all that, but honestly if you can make bacon and eggs why wouldn't you?

The plate and fork found their way to the sink. Dishes, trash, and cleaning were all my chores until the family returned. Since everyone else was out traveling, the only laundry I had to do was my own. Not a bad load, and as long as I was careful I'd have an easy month. Thoughts of how to spend my month alone began crossing my mind. I could invite Jenna over, or go to Katherine's place, or maybe hang out with Sharon.

But then I heard a noise, and it made me realize that I would not be spending this first day alone entirely as I'd begun to plan it.
13.title: Home Alone!

The door was on a chain and answering it meant that I'd only have to look through a crack so it'd seem I was only going without a shirt as long as my lower body was obscured by the door by leaning to one side. I could rush upstairs to get changed but the person might leave by the time I was finished. Finally, I could shout out to see who it was and hope that they didn't ask too many questions or it wasn't someone I'd have to let in.

After a moment's pause, I decided too...

I decided I should start with a little morning exercise and do something to pass my sports course to fully wake up and finish an hopefully easy one. In my martial arts class I usually just tickled my opponent for a while and hoped they give up or I just lost, my decision for this course war based only on the fact that my indian friend Sharon took it too, so I didn't put in much effort.

I wasn't sure where my sports teacher Ms. Davis was, but I thought I should start by looking in the gym. This proved to be the right decision, because when I entered she was there removing and cleaning matting from the floor on the other end of the large room. "Good morning Ms. Davis" I shouted through the large gym so she could hear me. Looking up she saw me and knew immediately why I was there, so she came over and asked me to change into my martial arts outfit. I went to the changing rooms to do this and when I reentered the gym now in my white martial arts outfit, an orange belt and no shoes, I realized she had changed too.

The 32 year old Ms Davis wore the same things as I did, but had a black belt around her waist. I looked at her from top to bottom, to see her normal blond hair she wore in a pony tail, her nice face, with the very nice smile and her nose that was slightly to large for her face. The rest of her body was pretty athletic, except for her beautiful soft looking feet, with black nail polish matching her belt. I always thought she was pretty and had a little crush on her, because of her friendly way of teaching.

"Hi, again, I want to improve my grade so that I don't fail", I told her and felt like I was a bit too needy. "I know, I know" she answered slightly annoyed confusing me a lot. "It's the same every year there are students choosing martial arts, because they think they can learn very cool stuff and don't have to do anything for it. The truth is, this course is for you to improve yourself and to learn to fight difficulties in your life, not necessarily with violence, but rather with the strength you gained from this course.". "Okay sounds like a really cool idea", I answered a bit cowed, it was a scolding and I had to take it, to get over with this thing as soon as possible, but it still felt strange coming from Ms Davis.

"Here is the task I designed specifically for you: We will have a fight, I will try to keep you in this room and you have to escape, I know you want to see the other teachers to make up for your laziness in there classes too, so the longer you need, the less time you have for them. I am the wall you have to overcome with your strength. We will start in the corner with the largest distance to the exit so you actually have to escape. I am allowed to drag you back, but you are also allowed to push me through the exit with you. There is no time limit for this class and you can stop, if you want to try it later, but then we will go back to the beginning. I will do my best to stop you, but still wish you good look. If you are ready come to the corner so we can start."

This is my task here I have to flee, but she is sort of right, if I manage to escape her quickly I can continue with my other tasks pretty fast, this whole test feels pretty doable and in the end her usually friendly behavior came through again so she might had to put this course on the letter but will let me easily.

“My most ticklish spot is my belly,” I notify Amber.

“Wow, same as me!” she states as she reaches under my shirt and starts tickling.

“HAHAHAHA!” I laugh while she tickles, caught off guard.

After a few seconds, Amber retracts her hands and announces, “Let’s get started with the tour. You’re going to be a really fun visitor.” I follow Amber into the next room, where I see a few holes in the wall. “So, here’s the first stop of the tour. These are called wall stocks. As you can imagine, they are very useful for tickling people’s feet, but they can also work well for tickling tummies. Would you care to see a demonstration?”

“Of course,” I confirm, and then two feet poke through the bottom holes, a stomach pokes through the large middle hole, and two hands come through the top holes. Suddenly, the top and bottom holes get smaller, trapping the hands and feet of the person on the other side.

“Go ahead and tickle it,” Amber encourages, and I walk over with a devious smile. I hear laughter right as my fingers touch the bare belly, and I lightly tickle it for a minute. However, after a minute, I decide to raspberry the midriff, and then my tickling becomes much more intense, tormenting the person on the other side. Five minutes pass, and then I stop abruptly when Amber’s fingers run under my shirt again across my own ticklish tummy. “The best part about this is that after you tickle the person, they get to tickle you back.”

Before I knew what was happening, Amber had placed my hands and feet in the wall stocks, and my midsection pushed through the middle hole. “AHAHAHAHAHAHA!” I laugh as I am suddenly the ticklee. What felt like twenty fingers were running over my bare belly, and as much as I tried to squirm, I do not get very far. “THAHAT REHEHELY TIHIHIHICKLEHEHES!” After a couple minutes, I get my own share of raspberries, with one side of my midsection getting raspberried as the fingers continue to torment the other side. Amber allows me to get tickled for eight minutes before she finally lets me out of the stock holes, giving me a minute to catch my breath again. “That tickled so much.”

“That’s good; it’s the aim of the attraction,” Amber comments. “Anyways, you’ll meet her later; she might even let you have some more tickling fun then. Let’s go on to the next attraction.” I go to the next room and see…
131321.title: Belly Fun

choices: Jenna, one of my best friends
Kimberly, a rich girl who liked to look down on others
1313212.content:
There are a few small tables in the next room that I head into. However, they are not normal tables; they are shaped like a human, with straps for the arms, ankles, upper ribs, hips, and knees. “What’s this?” I wonder.

“This is our surprise tickle table,” Amber explains. “I’ll let you find out the surprise on your own. Lie down.”

I reluctantly comply, looking suspiciously at Amber. “What are you planning?”

“It’s a surprise,” she teases as she restrains me. Once I am fully bound, she tells me, “See you later.”

She walks away, and I strain my body, trying to see if anyone else is around and can let me out. “Hello!” I call out. “Is anyone else here?” No one answers, so I call out to the girl who brought me here, afraid. “Amber? This isn’t funny!” I hear nothing else, and despite being slightly afraid, I eventually settle down, resigned to my fate of being tied up until someone manages to find me. Suddenly, I feel fingers dance on my bare sides, and I yelp in surprise. “AHAHAHA!” The tickling stops just as quickly as it started, and when I look down to find the source, I see nothing. “Who did that? Is that you, Amber? Is someone else here?” My series of questions go unanswered, which I did not expect, and I start to get worried again. Just as I’m about to call out again, fingers come and start tickling my armpits. “AHAHAHAHA! STAHAHAHAHAP!” While the first tickling just lasted a few seconds, this one keeps up, with the tickler deviously moving their nails in my armpits for less than a minute before going back down to my ticklish tummy. “NOHOHOHOHO!” I call out, trying to get them to stop. “AHAHAHAHA PLEHEHEHEHESE!” Despite my pleas, the tickling does not stop, and soon enough, it gets worse. Another set of ten fingernails come up and start tickling my midriff, causing my laughter to double. “NAHAHAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHERE! PLEHEHEHEHEHESE!” The four-handed tickling continues for at least ten minutes, and by the end, I’m laughing myself crazy.

Slowly, the tickling intensity calms down before it eventually stops. “So, what do you think of the surprise tickle table?” Amber inquires as she appears in front of me.

“Was that you?” I ask as I catch my breath.

“You bet,” she confirms. “What’d you think?”

“Well, it was definitely a surprise,” I acknowledge. “You’re a really good tickler, but I know you weren’t alone. Who else was tickling me?”

Someone else comes out from behind, and I recognize her as…
1313212.title: Surprise Tickle Tables

choices: “Let me out! You’re too good a tickler!”
13132122.content:
My other tickler was none other than Kimberly. One of the richer girls who attended my school, Kimberly was part of a trio who always found a reason to demean their classmates. ‘And now she knows exactly how ticklish I am,’ I thought to myself. ‘Look at my luck.’

“Hi, Kimberly,” I announced after recognizing her.

“Hi,” she responded with a smile. “So, you seem pretty ticklish?”

“I guess so,” you half-heartedly answer.

“Oh, don’t try and fool me,” she teased, wagging a finger. “I know you like tickling and being tickled. Everyone at school knew that. That’s why you’re here. Amber knew you’d be a great addition to the team.”

“The team?” I inquired, now confused as to Kimberly’s role.

“Yeah, the team,” she responded, more energetically. “Amber’s going to be the manager, you’ll be the assistant manager, and I’ll be one of the people tickling guests.”

“Okay,” you accept the situation. “Just one question, though. Do you really need a job?”

“Well, I don’t need it,” she stated, “but I kind of wanted it. I’m going to be getting to tickle people, and I get paid for it. Of course, my parents helped fund this place, so it won’t be a normal job, but it should be fun.”

“Alright, that sounds nice,” you begin to grasp what is going on. “Kimberly, I can’t help but notice that you’re acting a bit different. Like… well, you’re a lot more fun like this.”

“You mean not like when I’m around Mary and Alicia?” she questioned, referring to the other two in her trio, and I nodded in affirmation. “Yeah, my parents make me be around them because they are all friends, but I’d rather just hang out with people like you. I know I can be a jerk when I’m with them, and I want to change that, so I’m hoping this job will move me in that direction.”

“That’s very thoughtful of you, and I think it’s already paying off some,” I noted. “In any case, you are very talented at tickling. I have a feeling our guests will have lots of laughs here.”

“So, I guess there’s just one question now,” Kimberly stated, an evil glint in her eye. “Do you want to be tickled again, or do you want me to let you out?”

I thought for just a second before answering,
13132122.title: What does Kimberly have to do with this?

choices: Surprise Kimberly and put her on the tickle table
Ask if Kimberly can continue your tour
131321222.content:
“Please let me out of here,” I requested. “You’re way too good a tickler!”

“Well, if I’m too good a tickler, maybe I should keep practicing with you while I can,” Kimberly mused. “After all, I doubt that you’ll be willing to get in one of these once you’ve taken over as assistant manager.”

“Why’d you ask me, AHAHAHAHAHA!” I began to question Kimberly’s motives when she started tickling my tummy again. “STAHAHAHAHAHAP!”

“Hmm, I don’t think so,” Kimberly refused as her nails skittered across my bare belly. “You’re really fun to tickle, and I’ve just got to do it.”

“PLEHEHEHEHEHESE!” I begged as I felt her fingers begin to trace circles around my bellybutton. “NAHAHAHAHAHAT THEHEHEHEHERE!”

“Ooh, I think someone’s quite ticklish in this little button,” Kimberly teased. “Am I right? If I tickle your bellybutton, will you scream and laugh hysterically because it’s your tickle button?”

“STAHAHAHAHAHAHAP!” My mind was not on answering Kimberly’s question; I was just waiting for her to go in for the navel tickle. “LEHEHEHEHET MEHEHEHEHEHE OHOHOHOHOUT!”

“But you didn’t answer my question,” Kimberly continued to skitter her nails around my bellybutton for another few minutes. Waiting for her to actually begin tickling it, I kept refusing to answer her, instead just laughing and begging for her to release me. Finally, she gave up on trying to get me to answer. “Oh, fine, I guess you really don’t want to answer, so I’ll just have to experiment.”

A poke to my navel was all it took to get me laughing hysterically, just as Kimberly had predicted, “NONONONONONO! GEHEHEHET IHIHIHIHIT OHOHOHOHOHOUT!”

“Oh, wow, this is so much better than I expected!” Kimberly joyfully exclaimed. “You’re so, so, so ticklish in this little tickle button!”

“PLEHEHEHEHEHESE!” I pleaded, not able to say much more than this. “AHAHAHAHA!” Despite not being able to move around very much, I squirmed all I could, trying to get Kimberly’s devilish finger out of my bellybutton.

“Well, I think we can both agree that I am definitely too good a tickler for you to stand,” Kimberly announced after a few minutes with my bellybutton. “And because of that, I suppose it’s time I let you out.” She slowed down and then stopped the tickling, leaving me panting for breath. Soon, I felt my restraints being undone, and I felt great when I was able to pull my hands down over my stomach. Once I had caught all my breath, Kimberly asked, “So, what now?”
131321222.title: Well, if she's too good...

1313212222.content:
“Well, Amber was taking me on a tour of this place before she let you tickle me and left,” I told her. “Do you think you can continue it?”

“Sure,” Kimberly agreed with a smile. “There’s plenty more places for me to tickle you in here.”

“I was afraid of that,” I joked back, looking down for a second to pretend I was nervous. “So, you’re going to be a tickler here? What all does that entail?”

“Mostly tickling customers,” Kimberly stated as we continued to walk. “Sometimes I might even get to tickle other staff. There’s a place for staff to get tickled here, and Amber said that I could go there whenever I wanted to. I’ll show you it.”

“Interesting,” I made a mental note of this, hoping to not find myself in that place. Realizing that we were about to get to another room, I turned to Kimberly and wondered, “So, what do you have for me next?”

With a devious smile, she looked at me and proclaimed, “Well, next up is…”
1313212222.title: Continue the Tour

132.content:
Hearing the footsteps coming down the stairs, my first thought was that it was an intruder, my second was that I would have woken up to someone breaking open the door or the window, and my third was remembering that I was naked and that I should probably cover myself up. I darted over to the living room, grabbed the blanket off the couch and covered myself up with it. When I went back into the kitchen, I saw the "intruder". It was Kimberly Lockwood. She was part of a trio of stuck up, rich girls at school who thought they were better than everyone else. However, they were all incredibly hot. She had ginger hair that she had tied up in a ponytail, bright green eyes, and a ton freckles all over her face. She was dressed in a bright blue tank top and dark purple sweatpants. Looking down at her bare feet, she had painted her toenails a neon green. She was actually the nicest of the trio and many people thought that if Alicia hadn't somehow gotten her to cling to them, she'd be a very nice girl. Now that I saw who was in my house, time for the big question.
"Why are you in my house?"
"Well...umm...this is a bit of a long story."
"I have time."
"Well okay...my parents went to Hawaii for the summer for their second honeymoon and so they wanted me to stay with someone. I overheard you telling your friend Phoebe that your parents were going to be out of town for the summer as well, so I suggested you and they asked your parents if they were okay with it and everybody thought it was a good idea so here I am. And since you're probably wondering why I didn't go with Mary or Alicia, to be honest I kind of want to find friends who aren't so mean to everybody. So I guess I'm also here to make up for the fact that I've kind of been a bitch to you and your friends...Umm...Are you naked under there?"
"Umm...yeah." We both blushed hard at that. I also took a moment to process the information. "Okay, so how do you plan on making it up to me?"
"Well...I figured you'd have some ideas...umm...your interest in tickling is no secret and I'm...PLENTY ticklish...if that helps at all."
I was astounded. Here was this amazingly hot, super ticklish girl who just basically said that I could tickle her as much as I want. But what if she was lying and planned on ambushing me with Alicia and Mary? That didn't seem likely though. She really was a nice girl. And she could always prove herself by helping me tickle prank Alicia and Mary. I thought about it for a moment and I decided. I told her...

Figuring that she had endured enough tummy tickling and deciding to be nice, I elected to give Kimberly a break. The girl had been violently thrashing about on the couch from the skillful way I moved my fingertips over her belly and laughing like a hyena when I finally stopped tickling her. Afterwards, she was panting and gasping for breath, the tickling having took a pretty huge toll on her. "Oh... my god," She said, gasping between words as she still fully hadn't caught her breath. "That was... absolute torture" Despite saying that, Kimberly didn't seem too upset or mad over what had happened.

"Sorry" I apologized. "I couldn't help myself and got a little carried away"

"No, no, you're fine" Kimberly insisted, smiling and admitting. "It was actually kind of... fun"

"Really?" I asked in surprise, not quite able to believe me ears. She had actually enjoyed being tickled like that? Given how berzerk she was going while I was tickling her, I thought she would've hated it. "You actually liked it?"

"Yeah" She said, her smile changing into a smirk that was more mischievous. I had practically no time to react when she suddenly pounced on me. "In fact, I liked it so much that I think I wanna share it with you"

"Wait a minute, wha- AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA" I start to ask, caught off guard by Kimberly before bursting into laughter when she reached her hand underneath my shirt and started tickling my belly.

13211112121.title: Tickle Fight for Freedom

choices: “No, I think I’ll have to tickle you if you untie me.”
132111121212.content:
Both Kimberly and I were in the midst of hysterical laughter as a result of the dusters tickling all over our bare bellies, but in the end, my experience in tickle fights won out. An exhausted Kimberly let her attack fade just enough for me to flip the electric toothbrush on and stick it in her bellybutton. This new attack energized her just enough to scream out, “NOHOHOHOHO NAHAHAHAHAHAT THAHAHAHAHAHAHAT!” before she fell to the ground, dropping her duster in the process.

Having gained the advantage, I pressed the electric toothbrush in, making sure her navel never got a respite. I proceeded to tease her, a smile plastered to my face despite being free from the tickling. “Tickle, tickle, tickle, Kimberly! I told you that you would get what was coming to you. You’re a tick-tick-tickle slave, and I’m going to keep tickling you!”

“NOHOHOHOHOHO AHAHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Kimberly laughed as she pleaded for the tickling to stop. Seeing that she really would need a break soon, I kept the toothbrush in her bellybutton while I pushed her feather duster away and took her electric flosser from her weakened hands before finally stopping. “HEHEHEHEHEHEHEHE!” Kimberly kept up the residual giggling from her tickle torment for another minute or so, and I used the time to get the ropes back. By the time she stopped giggling, I had tied her hands together, and she was able to fully realize the situation. “Oh, shoot, I lost, didn’t I? I’m going to get tickled more.”

“Yes, you are, and this time, I don’t think I’m going to untie you when I give you a break,” I announced before wagging a finger at her. “Can’t have those nails tickling my belly again without my permission. Do you need anything like water or so, though? That tickle fight was exhausting.”

“Yeah, some water would be good,” she stated before smiling back at me and playfully asking, “Are you sure you want to leave me like this, though? I mean, I’m sure I can still tickle that belly of yours. Might have to do it with both hands right next to each other, but that’s fine with me.” To emphasize this, she wiggled her fingers at me, then pointed to my stomach, which was still exposed.

“Yeah, no,” I flatly denied as I took both her wrists in one hand, although I still smiled playfully. “You aren’t getting off that easy. We’re going back to the couch to get you ready for your tickling punishment.”

“Oh, alright, I guess we can do that,” she playfully pouted. “But I really don’t think I need any punishment. I think I did a good job tickling you.”

“That’s why you need to be punished,” I nudged her, then poked her bellybutton, eliciting a giggle. “You weren’t supposed to be tickling me; it was supposed to be this way.” With that, I spidered my fingers all over her midriff, causing her to go into a fit of giggles.

“AHAHAHAHAHAHAHA!” Kimberly’s laughter flowed freely for the ten seconds that I tickled her, but it stopped very quickly after I did. “I think you’ve made your point; my tummy is really ticklish. I guess I’ll even let you tie me up as your tickle slave; I mean, I suppose that was our agreement.”

“Don’t get too disappointed,” I teased her as I saw the huge smile on her face. “I might just have to tickle you to get your spirits up again, and we all know how that goes. Okay, on the couch.” Kimberly complied with my directions, and soon, she had been tied up again, more secure than either of us had been before. “I’ll get you that glass of water now. You don’t go anywhere, and I mean that.”

“I’m not promising anything if you tied any of these knots wrong,” Kimberly teased back as I headed out of the room. A minute later, I came back with two glasses of water. “I guess you did them right; I couldn’t get out to get back at your belly.”

“Now, do you promise to be good if I untie your wrists from the edge of the couch to let you drink this on your own, or will I have to do everything around here?” I playfully questioned her about drinking the water.

With a smile, Kimberly responded…
132111121212.title: Regaining a Tickle Slave

choices: Slam down the receiver and call the police
133.content:
"Ugh," I muttered to myself, hearing that high pitched tone. "Probably just some damn telemarketers."

But my nobler instincts took over, reminding me that it might have been an emergency. While I had been fooled by such thoughts before, being alone as I was meant that I had to step up my responsibilities... even if those responsibilities were as mundane as answering the phone.

I walked over to the kitchen phone, quickly checking the caller's ID. But rather than saying unknown, it said 'jammed'. Huh? I had never seen an error message like that before. My interest piqued, I picked up the receiver and gave a tentative, "Hello?"

The reply was a garbled chuckle. "Well, well. The man of the house is finally up. Enjoying your vacation?"

The voice was strangely distorted... deep and static-like, but unlike any normal person's voice would sound. In fact, I couldn't even tell if the speaker was male or female! It was as if the voice was being run through a filter of some kind.

"Uh, I guess so..." I replied, becoming more disturbed by the minute. "Who is this?"

The voice chuckled again, much more ominously than before. "Irrelevant. But I know a lot about you, little boy. In fact, I've decided to let you play a game with me."

A sinking feeling grew in my gut. Was this a prank of some kind? Some asshole from high school trying to rile me up?

"...a game?" I responded stupidly, unsure of where the conversation was going. Truth be told, I was still a little stunned.

"Yes," replied the sinister voice. "It's really fun. For one of us, any way..."

My hand was shaking, but I fought the fear as best I could. There was a moment of silence on the other end, and I weighed my options...
133.title: A Sinister Calling

1331.content:
"Just what kind of game is this?" I asked nervously.

I could sense the speaker smiling on the other end. "Oh, think of it as a scavenger hunt. One that may require a small amount of boldness on your part." The speaker paused, allowing me to savor the tension.

"And there are other players, you see. In fact, one of them wants to speak to you."

The static-like effect disappeared, and I heard a familiar voice on the other line.

"Bro! It's a trap! Don't do anything they-" It abruptly ended with a muffled sound.

But there was no mistaking it... it was my sister!

"What have you done to her, you son of a bitch?!" I shouted, half-enraged and half-frightened.

"Tsk, tsk," muttered the voice, still distorted. "Why, it turns out this game needs multiple players. You're the star attraction, of course, but think of her as a prize. If you do as we say, then you will see her soon enough. However, if you break the rules, then she has to pay the price. And don't worry, we'll keep you well informed of the situation, at every step. In fact, have a look at your cell phone now."

The familiar buzz of my smartphone alerted me to its presence on the kitchen counter. I lowered the kitchen phone's receiver, and carefully approached my cell.

True to the sinister voice's word, there was a picture. It was grainy and poorly lit, but it was obvious of who it was... my sister! It was her face, blindfolded, with her mouth bulging with some sort of packing. Clear plastic tape was wrapped around her mouth, sealing the gag tightly.

I shook my head, running back to the kitchen phone and shouting, "Don't lay a finger on her, you bastard!"

Once more, the voice tsk-tsked me. "Perhaps not a finger. But maybe a feather?" I blanched at the thought. My sister was as ticklish as I was, and judging from the situation, it may be akin to torture for her!

"But that was just a teaser, young man. For you see, there are two other players: your mother, and your cousin."

My cellphone buzzed again, and I knew that pictures of my relatives were being sent... almost certainly bound and gagged like my sister.

I didn't even have a chance to speak before the voice answered.

"And so, now the game begins. Your decision must be made now... who will you save first?"

I gulped, and made my choice...
1331.title: Relative Games

13311.content:
It was a tough choice, but I had to choose my sister. I knew that she would be suffering horribly with any non-consensual tickling, and she was close enough to my age that I felt I must act quickly. My mother and cousin were tougher, and I knew they could hold out longer. At least, that was my hope.

"Very good," laughed the sinister voice on the phone. "I must admit, she's been an excellent player in the game so far. It'll be a shame to lose her, but fair is fair."

I was growing weary of this speaker's nonchalance. "Just tell me what I need to do."

"Ah straight to the point. You were well chosen," said the voice, obviously relishing this sick little game. "The rules are as follows: you will given a single clue as to your dear sister's whereabouts. If you can decipher the answer, then you will be a step closer to freeing her. However, if you do not have an answer in one hour, then a severe... penalty... must be paid. For all the players."

A simple clue to solve. Seemed easy enough, even if it was only a step closer.

"And of course, you must not speak of the game to anyone. Particularly the authorities. The game will end immediately, and you will never see any of the players again. We guarantee this."

A knot formed in my stomach. Well, so much for bringing in help. "Alright, give me the clue."

I could sense the voice smiling on the other end. "Excellent. The clue is as follows:

'Where the sky has an artificial light, and the ground is as soft as skin.
This is where you can find rings of steel and orbs of leather.'

Good luck, little man."

The receiver clicked dead. Confused, I pondered the bizarre clue. Was it related to my sister somehow? Or was it just a random location?

In any case, I needed to get dressed, so I hurried up the stairs, thinking all the while.

"Must be indoors," I muttered, pulling on a pair of shorts. But what had a 'skin' for a floor? Grabbing the first t-shirt I could find, I quickly looked at the time. 55 minutes left before the penalty would be paid. I promised myself I wouldn't let my sister, Mom, or cousin down. But time was ticking, and I was still pondering the solution.

Suddenly, it hit me like a ton of bricks! It was so obvious! The answer was...
13311.title: Riddles and Games

choices: I reached the gym with no incidents
133111.content:
"Yes!" I blurted out, happy about my answer. That was too easy. If the rest of the riddles were so simple, I'd have everyone rescued soon enough! But there was no time to waste, so I dashed to the kitchen and quickly grabbed my smartphone. If the kidnapper had my number, then he or she was sure to be tracking it.

I wondered what sort of situation I'd be walking into. My sister had warned me that it was a trap, but that was a risk I was willing to take.

So I sprinted to the garage and my bike. Looking at my wrist watch, I realized that I still had a good 50 minutes to get to the school gym. I'd have plenty of time to spare, provided the sinister captor didn't have any obstacles waiting for me. And of course, I was assuming I had the correct answer. It seemed clear enough, but what significance did it have?

I hopped on my bike and with a quick check, I was off down the street, peddling as fast as I could. It would take no more than 10 minutes to reach the school, and hopefully, the next clue. I worried about what sorts of peril my relatives were in. Just what was going on? Why was I targeted? What made me so special?

These and other questions raced through my mind as I biked through the suburbs...
133111.title: Race to the Gym

choices: It was pictures of my kidnapped sister!
It was a new voice... warning me?
133112.content:
I wasn't entirely sure my answer was correct, but it was the best guess I had. In any case, I didn't have time to think of the alternatives... the clock was ticking, and my family was in danger! Dashing down to the kitchen, I grabbed my cellphone and bolted to the garage. I untangled my bike from some clutter and peddled like a madman down our the street. Unfortunately, the rink was on the other side of town, and even going as fast as I could would be cutting it close. I could only pray that my answer was correct.

It was an exhausting ride, even fueled by my desperate adrenaline, but eventually I made it. The rink was nestled in a rundown corner of an industrial park. The building had been closed for some time, and was probably on its last legs. An ideal spot for a kidnapper, I supposed.

My tires squealed as I pulled on my hand-brakes, decelerating from my frantic ride. Not missing a beat, I leapt from my bike and dashed up to the front entrance of the rink. I took a quick moment to look at my watch, panting hoarsely. 5 minutes to go. It was going to be close!

Fortunately, the rusted doors were unlocked, and they creaked and groaned as I forced them open. Inside was the thick smell of musty sports equipment. Nearly gagging, I ventured into the darkened structure.

"Sis?!" I shouted through the ancient stink. "Are you here?!"

Only silence greeted me. I walked deeper into the ruined rink, careful to dodge any fallen debris. The skating area was covered a thin layer of grim, and a collapsed beam had fallen into the middle of it. Smashed concession stands and broken booths lined both sides of the building, but there was no sign of life.

A horrible feeling began to swell in my gut. Was it possible I was wrong? Did the riddle mean another location? The dull realization that I had been so stupid was blunted by the horror that I had failed my sister.

And as if confirming my worst fears, my cellphone began to vibrate.

I answered it, fearing what would be said...

"Where oh where did you go, my little man?" laughed the sinister voice, still distorted by the static. "Judging from my GPS tracker, you're on the far side of the town. Are you trying to run? Or did you fail the challenge?"

"I guess I lost," I said sadly, shaking my head. "But please, don't hurt my family."

The voice seemed oddly supportive. "That is very noble of you. But unfortunately, rules are rules. And now, the penalty must be paid by your family. However, the game is not over. When the time comes, a new riddle will be given and you will have a second chance. Pray that you do better next time."

And with that, the phone clicked dead. My guilt was excruciating, but I understood that I needed to let it go. Wallowing in pity would only make me lose sight of the true goal: rescuing my family.

However, my phone began to buzz again...
133112.title: Failure and Consequences

1332.content:
"Look you weirdo!" I snapped "I haven't got time for this crap! You ring me again and I'll call the police!"

There was silence from the other end of the line at my outburst made me think that perhaps my message had gotten through. This ended however when the voice chuckled darkly "Well, aren't you quite the defiant one? That's good, it'll make the game even more fun. It's so fun to break those who would stand against me..."

A nervous chill went through my spine as I heard those words. There was something so... Eerie about them. The tone, even from a garbled voice, made me think that the person behind it was enjoying this completely "What do you want?"

"To have fun. At your expense of course." The voice replied "But since you were so rude to me earlier, I think I'll share the fun with others. Your friends shall soon learn that you should have treated me with more respect. A red plume shall show you and them to be more polite."

The person then hung up from their line and I was left wondering as to what they meant by that. A sudden flash of memory hit me as I recalled news reports over the last few months. Houses had been broken into while their owners had been inside of them and they were always discovered naked and tied up. Something had happened although the police had managed to keep the details under wraps regarding the events but in each time, a red feather had been left stuck to the front door of each victim.

I realised that the person on the other end (Providing it wasn't a prank), was the one behind the break ins and I knew I had to act quickly. I rushed upstairs to get changed while getting my phone out, determined to phone everyone I knew to make sure they were OK. After a moment's thought, I decided to first call...
1332.title: Angrily yell at the voice

134.content:
I stopped and looked curiously at the furniture, hearing what sounded like a giggle emanate from behind it. More investigative than scared or embarassed, I asked "Who's there?" to see if I'd get a response.

A head peaked up from behind the sofa. It was an early high school girl, about fifteen or sixteen by the looks of it, with long brown hair and a couple of mischievous blue eyes. She looked familiar, but her name escaped me. Then my cheeks started to go red as I remembered I was naked.

"Wh-who are you?" I asked. "How did you get in here? Why did you come in?"

The little girl giggled again, emerging from her hiding spot around the furniture. A blue tank top hugged her skinny body, which was nearly as tall as I was, and her hair fell all the way to her shorts, which cut off mid thigh. A grin spread across her face as she approached me. "My name's Katelyn," she told me. "Your mother let me in before she left, and I'm here because I'm supervising you."

For an underclassman, she was very precocious. She found my nudity amusing, but she wasn't ridiculing and taunting me like most freshies or even sophs would have. Then I recognized her - she was the de facto leader of a small prank-loving girl gang. Their pranks were all harmless though, and their leader, Katelyn, had a reputation for being surprisingly mature.

"Why would my mother let you in?" I asked, now curious as to this girl's motives. She smiled as she kept slowly approaching me, while I was backing away a little bit slower, more playful than serious.

"I overheard your parents talking to a neighbor." she explained. "Your mom mentioned that you were going to be by yourself for most of the month, and she was worried about you being irresponsible. So I offered to help out since my parents are gone most of the month too. She said yes."

This was going somewhere, she'd been planning this. "Help out how?" I asked.

"Like I said, I'm going to supervise you. Make sure you don't do anything crazy while your parents are out. I'm all unpacked in the guest room, and I'm ready to spend the month." She was spending the entire month here with me, and all arranged without my knowledge. I guess I was no longer alone all month, but it could've been worse.

"In the meantime," Katelyn continued, "I'd like to play a game with you." Like a stalking feline, she slowly stepped towards me, pushing me gently against the wall when we'd run out of space, her hands resting on my belly.

Intrigued, I asked "What kind of game did you have in mind?"

"Oh, a little chasing and hiding, cat and mouse, cop and robber, with a little twist." She leaned in close, her voice dropping to a whisper. "I hope you're ticklish."

Suddenly her fingers started wiggling into my belly and sides, causing me to break out in loud laughter. I would've dropped to the ground had Katelyn's hands not been supporting me. However, that meant I leaned right into her fingers, which magnified the sensations and causing me to laugh even harder.

After maybe a minute she stopped, letting me rest for a minute. "Good," she smirked. "In fact, better. You're much more ticklish than I had hoped."

While recovering, I let the information sink in. This girl had planned on us being alone so she could tickle me? This month was looking better and better. And maybe if I was good and she was okay with it, I might return the favor.

"Don't put any clothes on," she ordered. "Much more sensitive this way. Well, better start running you bad, bad robber, 'cause the cop will be here soon."

She backed off and sat on the same sofa she hid behind. Waiting a moment to consider my options, I came up with three spots. I could hide in the attic, stretching out beneath the clutter to block Katelyn's view. The garage was also an option, since she probably wouldn't look in the car. Or I could go for the fallback: my closet. It was so obvious she might not look there.
134.title: Katelyn's Game

1341.content:
Immediately I headed for the stairs, aiming to reach the attic quickly before Katelyn started looking. Years of clutter were all stuffed in the small space, which would make it easier to hide. Of course part of me really didn't want to hide, to let her find me, but I would play the game if it made her happy.

Reaching the cramped loft space, I took in the familiar sight. Stacks of boxes and shelves were all over the place, with tons of stuff just loose on the floor. Anything from deflated footballs to misfitting clothes to ancient art projects. There was a tray of crafts, with the googly eyes and feathers and q-tips, there was a curtain, there was a half-used roll of duct tape, there were sheets draped from the rafters a foot above my head. There was even a stool to the side of the room. And the list went on of all the stuff that was crammed inside.

I searched for a decent hiding spot, scanning the room for something that would conceal me in a subtle way. In the end I decided that the best way to hide would be to get as low to the ground as possible, so I crawled under one of the collapsed curtains, squeezing between a pile of boxes and a shelf, my front resting on the wooden floor.

Settling down to wait for Katelyn, I immediately thought of how childish this was. We were pretty much playing hide and seek, something I hadn't done in years. All too quickly I remembered that during those games I sucked at hiding because I couldn't take the tension.

After a few minutes listening to my heartbeat I heard footsteps ascending the stairs. When Katelyn stepped into the attic my breath caught in my throat, an old habit that never really worked.

"If you turn yourself in now," she said in a cheesy voice, "I'll make sure that your sentence is softened."

My view was blocked by the curtain draped over me, so all I had to go on was her breathing and the light padding of her footsteps. I heard them come right behind me, then stop as if she knew I was there...
1341.title: Hiding in the Attic

13411.content:
I held my breath as the two slender, flip-flop attired feet approached my hideaway. They were making exactly for the place where I had crawled into the narrow space between the edge of the stack of boxes and the shelving unit. Unable to handle the suspense at wether or not she found me, I let out a rather girlish giggle, trying to clamp my jaws shut too late. "I got you knooow robber." I heard her purr mischeviously.
         But then I blinked in surprise. Though she had just said she knew where to find me, her bared little feet were making off to the side of and behind me, out of my field of vision... Suddenly, I felt something wrapping around my shins. To my horror I realized that even though my body was well hidden, wrapped in the old curtain, my feet were likely still sticking out beyond my sanctuary. Another image flashed through my mind; the roll of duct tape I had seen earlier, lying innocently on a disused table.
          I quickly tried to retract my legs as more layers of the sticky material were wrapped tightly around it, forcing them togethor. She apparently noticed, and I felt her hand seize my bare, exposed feet, forcing them back under her arm. "Not so fast, Robber! We need to get some information out'a you first!" More tape went around, and then several strips she stuck to my toes, stretching them out along the length of my foot, pulling the sensetive digits inexorably back.
         I tried to back out of the curtain despite myself, but the same headlock on my ankles kept me form going backward as well as forward."Okay, Robber, got you! -Now tell me; where are all your friends hiding?" She skittered her nails lightly on the taunt arch of one foot, and I burst into giggling. "W-what? Hahahaha! Ack! Not the tohohoes!" I heard her giggling in delight herself at my reaction as she ran her sharp little nails all over my feet, seemingly at random. She teased the skin at the tops of my toes for a few moments while I shook and wriggled in my cloth cocoon, struggling in the horribly confined space for some purchase I could use to manuever myself a bit with, straining against the duct-tape to close my toes from the tingling torture.

         "Hahaha! What are you talking about? Whahahaht friends?! Hahahah!" I laughed as her nails poked and pinched lightly away at my toes, playing along. After lingering there for a while she drifted slowly back down my arch, scratching away instead now instead of simply poking and kneading. "Ahahahhaha! Let me up! Oh kay- you've caught me! Hahaha!" I yelled, feeling that little spot at the base of my arch, right where it met the heel, being deviously exploited by a group of concentrated, probing fingers.
'What do you mean, 'what friends'? I mean all those other ticklish criminals you run around with." Declared Katelyn, as I kept on shaking and laughing, rubbing against the floor and looking like I was trying to do the worm at some points when her fingers teased one of my many, many sweet spots. Even through the emotion-dominated, ticklish haze I was in, I wondered if she might have been serious about wanting to know about my friends. Come to think about it, I knew alot of ticklish people, some who might be happy to play a few games like this with us later...
         I was so distracted, exploring the possibilities, that it wa several seconds before I noticed the tickling had stopped. I craned my head over my shoulde, using the repreive to try and unwind the curtain from around me. It was embarassingly easy when I wasn't jerking around with those devilish little tickles coursing through me.
         "C'mon out now, you bad, bad robber. We'll need to take you down to the station for proper questioning. And possibly sentencing." Katelyn called. I slid out, interupted briefly when she teased my legs and then my belly while my arms were still trapped.
"Up you, come, robber. March!" Still carrying the duct tape, she pushed me along in front of her as I shuffled, helping me down the stairs, and then to the area she had designated the 'station'.
13411.title: An Impromptu Interrogation.

choices: Give her Jen's number hoping she'll come help you
134111.content:
When we made it to my bedroom she sat down the duck tape and pulled out some fuzzy handcuffs she had brought just for this occasion. I played along with her game, actually looking forward to what awaited me, as she handcuffed my hands to the headboard and my feet to the foot of the bed. There I was, stretched taught and naked at her mercy. "Now, I'm going to ask you one more time, Where are your friends?" She glared at me with a devious smile. "What friends?" Her grin nearly wrapped around her head as she said the name that put terror into my heart. "Alicia, I think she would be a good interrogator while I'm at lunch."

"No!" there was no way you were letting that spoiled brat and her friends get their hands on you in a situation like this. Although you knew her number there was no way you were going to give it up. Katelyn straddled me and stroked my sides, eliciting a stream of soft giggles from me. "I had a feeling you would be that way," she said, leaning over me. So sensitive was my skin I was already giggling as her long hair brushed my belly when she massaged it in.

Her nails skittered across my belly sending me into peals of frantic laughter. It tickled like nothing else I had ever felt before. My belly was already sensitive and this vile just made it too much. My cute torturer was enjoying this way too much. Se was laughing nearly as much as me, she was so pleased with the result, all the while cooing, "Tickle tickle tickle!" Only making it worse. I was laughing way to hard to give any response at all or even form a complete thought. I looked into her eyes and knew that there was no stopping her. I tried as hard as I could to buck the younger girl off but her knees just clamped on and she seemed to enjoy the ride and strangely enough I think I was too. As torturous as it was, It was still extremely pleasurable and giving me a painful hard on.

What was left of my conscious thought scattered when she blew a raspberry on my tummy wiggling her slick tongue in my navel. I let out a high, less than manly scream. She stopped tickling, but it took me a few minutes to stop laughing. "The number?"
134111.title: My bedroom.

choices: playing a game to go with it."
134112.content:
I held onto the wall to keep myself steady as we descended the stairs, Katelyn giving me the odd poke and scribble on the ribs with her fingers while holding on to me with one arm, keeping me moving along but also preventing me from stumbling. We reached the landing on the main floor of the house, and she started prodding me in the sides, directing me over to the living room. "Okay, Robber, here we are at the station!" She declared, still keeping with the pretenses of the game. "Sit down on that chair and stretch yourself out, big-boy."

         I dutifully sat down and raised my arms over my head, and she wasted no time in wrapping them in duct-tape, going over and around the tall head rest, tightly adhering my arms to it. She taped busily away at my shins, and then pulled the lever on the sides of the recliner, raising the foot rest, lowering the back rest, and pulling me out still further. "There! Now, to start questioning you properly..." I shifted in nervous anticipation as she lightly rested her painted fingernails on my belly, and then started lightly, slooowly dragging them down my sides.

         I burst into giggles. My stomach had always been a particularlily sensitive spot, and I couldn't stop the continuous river of light laughter as her fingers gently danced around my abdomen, tracing shapes, elleptic circles and spirals, and slowly building momentum all the while. My laughing likewise picked up speed as her nails dug in deeper, swiftly poking my sides in succession. She joined all the fingers on her right hand togethor, forming a 'c' shape, and started rapidly digging them and her thumb into my sides. I verily exploded with laughter, twisting sideways and reflexively yanking on my sticky restraints to escape. "Awwww. Does the bad, bad wittle rober have a tickwish tummy?" She taunted playfully, never remotely slowing as her other fingers skittered all over my other side, before heading up to knead my ribs. I was too busy laughing to respond, shaking and trembling as my nerves were driven crazy by her probing, flashing fingers. I squeezed my eyes shut under the onslaught, but opened them again abruptly as I felt the overwhelming tingling surge outwardsf rom a new point on my body.

         The little sadist was twirling her fingers around in my navel! I sucked in my stomach, desperately trying to abort the tickling, but she was persistant. I clenched my teeth, determined to not give her the satisfaction of seeing me go crazy with laughter. Noticing my reddening expression, she brought in her other hand, putting the fingers to either side of my belly button and then pulling them apart, stretching my navel into an oval shape. And at least doubling its sensetivity."Oh, c'mon, robber. I can see it, give me a nice laugh now. You knooow you want too..." She wormed her fingers around to accentuate her words, and I couldn't hold it in anymore. I shook with laughter, thrusting my body out, and then reversing and sucking my stomach in, struggling to throw her off. Despite my frantic writhing a, some part of me was obviously loving it, and I was faintly glad she was focusing all her attention above my waist. I shook, bounced, and virtually screamed with laughter at her techniques; scratching away at my underarms, kneading my ribs, digging into my belly, and probing my navel, endlessly, it seemed. It went on and on, and I was breaking a sweat just from exerting myself in my futile escape attempts, whens she finally, suddenly stopped, grinning like a maniac. "Heheh. Now that was fun. But still... Why don't we make it better by
134112.title: The Living Room.

choices: The traitor's happy to help the little bugger!
They decide to give me a hand. Whew!
1341122.content:
"I have just the thing in mind for this. I play this game with my friends a lot. Well, something like it. You tell me the phone number of one of your friends. Then I invite them over and we both tickle you until you cough up a third number, and that person comes over until you cough up a fourth, etcetera etcetera. How does that sound, hmm?" She idly traced a pattern over my sensitized stomach as she explained the rules, seemingly oblivious to my discomfort.Â 

         "Hehehe! And what if -hehehe!-don't want to tell you their number?Hehe."

         She turned and smirked down at me. "Oh, I'm sure I can convince you eventually..." She started dancing her fingernails over my sides again, and I braced myself for the renewed assault. Truth is, there were quite a few people who would like someÂ vengeance on me for a few, uh, light tickles that may have occurred in the distant past. Still, I was too surprised to question it when she stopped. "I'm starting to think I simply don't have enough arms to tickle you with. Fortunately, I came prepared." She turned and jogged out of the room, and once she was gone I struggled at the duct tape still holding me firmly against the chair. Hearing those words had given me an idea as to what she was going for - I had probably said something quite similiar myself in the past - and knew just how long I could typically last against that particular little implement...

         My struggles came to naught, save reminding me why I rarely used duct-tape as a restraint (it was quite uncomfortable to reflexively pull away from) as Katelyn dashed back into the room and knealt at my feet. She was holding something I couldn't make out, and strapping it to my foot with duct-tape. I chortled at the slight feeling of bristles worming into the skin beween my toes, and hoped she wasn't using a toothebrush. Those devious little things tickled like mad in the right hands! She was onto the other foot by now, and I squirmed my toes to confound her efforts as best I could, and to avoid the little tickles that accompanied her work. Grinning evilly, she stepped back and looked over her handiwork. "Well, big-boy, this ought to be fun! Ah, sometimes I feel so evil I could just torture myself!" With that announcement, she leaned forward and touched something on my feet.Â 

         Tickles exploded upwards through my body without warning. I burst into renewed laughter as my nerves lit up, all yelling out the primal message 'Make it stop!'. My body struggled to fulfill that command, and I bucked and writhed desperately but futiley. I could feel dozens of tiny, stiff little bristles working away furiously in the space between my biggest and second toes on my right foot, and the base of the arch on my left foot. "Ahahahahaha! You little monster! Ahahahah! I'll get you for thihihis!" Katelyn wasn't even looking at my face though, simply examining my twitching feet.

         "You know, I can't help but feel like I'm forgetting something to go with this...Oh! That's right!" She pulled out a few more pieces of tape, pressing the instruments of tickle - which I was now fairly certain were electric toothbrushes - harder into my sensetized flesh. "And, while I'm at it, remeber you can always stop this by giving me a number. Though I can't promise I won't use this technique when your friend gets here!"Â 

         "Ahahahah! Turn them off! Turn them offhoffhoff!!! Ahahahah!" As determined as I was to not give her the satisfaction of surrendering, and fairly used to tickling, I still hadn't been tickled like this in a long, long time. And as I felt myself tearing up, the idea finally came to be in the back of my mind that if I gave her a number, perhaps whoever she wound up calling might decide to get their revenge later and actually spring me now.

         With that in mind, I quickly gasped out a number when Katelyn held up a third brush and started lowering it towards my navel. "That's it? Splendid!" She went to retrieve the phone, not bothering to turn off the devices on my poor, poor feet.
1341122.title: Not an over-frequented technique at all.

choices: "....The Erotica/Sensetivity ratio? Or, as some call it 'Teasing.' "
13411221.content:
As I flopped and squirmed away on my chair, I could faintly hear her talking over the phone, and then returning to the living room. She held the cell phone out by my head as she finally flipped the dratted toothbrushes off, leaving me panting in relief.

          "Here, she wants to know this isn't a kidnapping attempt. Tell her something that'll put her at ease."
          "Uh, hay, Cat. What's up?" I said, twisting my head over to get closer to the receiver.
          "What's going on?" Katherine asked, sounding more amused than genuinely worried. Katelyn must have already given her an idea as to what was happening.

          "Well, you know how I said my family would be leaving for a while, and that we'd have the entire house to ourselves if you wanted to come over? Turns out that's not entirely accurate. There's a fiendish little torturer innocently disguised as a Freshie-" Katelyn's hand began to slowly finger-walk up my side, once more towards my navel. "Hahaha! Er, um, thereâ€™s a cute little girl, whoâ€™s that offered to move in and keep an eye on me while they were gone, and-"

          Katelyn pulled the phone away again, grinning despite herself as she moved back towards the kitchen leaving me to wonder if Katherine was really the best choice I could have picked.

          I had known her for a few months, and we had met up when we each realized that the other was 'into' tickling. She was a technical genius, and could whip up an array of interesting, unique tools in a shockingly short time. While she had been able to breach the 'Can-Not-Tickle-Self' barrier with her machines, she had felt that the testing would be much more efficient if she had had another subject to work on.

          And that was where I came in. I had provided the nerve ending and vocal cords for all kinds of bizarre devices and techniques. She usually respected limits, but I also knew first-hand how merciless she could be on a body when it's strapped to a rack right in front of her. And then there was that one time when I had come over and, noticing how she had just finished some new kind of tickle-table before dozing off, decided to help her experiment along by gently proceeding to- Well, it's in the past now.

          There was nothing to do but wait, it seemed, and Katelyn was nice enough to get both of us a drink of water. She then removed my leg restraints, piece by piece, before yanking my legs individually farther out to the sides and re-taping them.

          "It wouldn't be good manners to wait until you're girlfriend showed up before we do this, would it? And besides, we're going to need some more space if we both have to share you."
          "She's not my girlfriend."
          Katelyn snickered. 'Yeah, I suppose that makes sense. Ticklish little boy like you; you probably wouldn't want to be within a hundred miles of your girlfriend when you're this helpless." She said, punctuating her words by tweaking my arched ribs repeatedly.

          After a surprisingly long time, I heard the front door open, and Katherine came into the living room. She was wearing a dark sleeveless shirt that complemented her brunette hair nicely and short shorts, as it was summer, and toting a large duffel bag that I knew quite well.

          "Well, well, well. What have you managed to get into this time?" She asked, laughing as she started unpacking a few basic things.
          "Hey, Cat. Cat, this is Katelyn. Katelyn, Katherine."
          "Charmed I'm sure."
          "Likewise."
          "So, basically, you want my help tickling him, because you feel like you can't do it very well alone?"
          "Pretty much, yeah. There's just too much ticklish surface area. I tried using electric toothbrushes, as you can see here,â€™ She gestured at my feet, taking the time to scribble on an exposed section of my arches, â€œbut I still feel like I wasn't living up to the full potential."
          "Excuse me, ladies, but-"
          "Well, I brought along a few things that work just as well as tooth brushes-or, more likely, better. Tell me, have you ever heard of or practised..."
13411221.title: Just wait until I get out of this!

Once we hit and maintain that point, our captive here won't be able to orgasm no matter what we do. But since he's such a little deviant that he enjoys it, if we break this barrier by too far then he'll just have a really, really fucking good orgasm. I was just doing some research on this before you called so I havn't gotten a chance to find out our friends threshold." Cat said in rapid fire as she examined my form.

Katelyn...
134112212.title: Erotic torture

1341122121.content:
My hope flaired as Katelyn began, "I don't know cat... I'm not sure thats included in my interrogative rights as a detective..." Katelyn over-dramaticly tapped a finger to her chin as if debating a serious ethical question before raiseing her eyebrows as saying, "But i'm sure it would be allowed as enhanced interrogation!"

Cat laughed and said, "So you two were playing a little game as well? I'm up for it." She dramaticly cleared her throat and said in a faux serious voice, "But Katelyn, if were going to do enchanced interrogation we'll need somewhere out of our jurisdiction!"

I immdiatly got the feeling she was talking about her house.

"You right Cat! But where?" Katelyn asks. Katelyn and Cat whisper for a minute then turn on me.

"Okay you rotten criminal, you're being transported again." She cut my hand and leg bonds, "Hands behind your back, and no sudden moves." That was the last thing I heard before Cat wrapped a blindfold around my head and I head a click as well as cold metal on my hands. They just handcuffed me!

I felt Katelyn's smaller hands prodding me forewards as we walked, Cats hands tickled my sides as well. I heard a door open and felt the warm summer sun on my skin as they took me outside and down my poarch.

13411221212.title: They put me in a car

Another few minutes of listening to techno on the car radio and I felt the car shift upwards into a driveway. "End of the line, last chance to give up some more numbers." Katelyn taunted as she started leaveing the car. "End of the- end of the line? Since when did anyone like you know that phrase?" I asked her, trying to re-direct the conversation. Katelyn giggled to herself and said, "Only the best movie of our time, FRED." I didn't know how respond to that and I heard Cat's door as well as my door open. Kate got me out of the car and escorted me into Cat's garage.

"Okay kate, can you run up to my room and get a box for me? It should be under my matress, it has the final parts of my machine in it. Parts i'd rather not proudly display publicly on my recent machine while it's not in use." Cat requested. "Sure thing boss." Kate responded as she opened the garage door.

"Okay lets get you a bit more-" Cat began as she undid the blindfold, "Comfortable." She finished as she poped off the handcuffs. I rubbed my wrists and said, "Couldn't you two have been a little more careful about that?" To which she replied with a, "Come on" as she guided me towards their stairs.

(Read the other Cat chapters for a better idea of the room.) Cat's basement looked mostly as it had the last time I had come over. Machines, Chair machines, Portable machines, Bits and Bobs, as well as some fetishy gear hidden away. But the main diffrence was the large examination table at the far side of the room. The table had various arms mounted to its sides, next to it was a server rack on wheels, and nearby was a desk with a computer on it.

134112212122.title: The den of eternal terror

"Fucking hell of a day" I thought aloud. Cat appeared out of nowhere next to me with two of her electrodes in hand, "Yes, that may alter my results" she continued with a more sly tone, "We may need to redo this test later". "I'll see what I can do about getting her away for a little while once she comes back, mind staying over awhile?" Cat said, now back into her serious voice. "Of course not Cat" I replied.

She ordered me to strip down to my underwear as she returned to tinkering with the large machine. I pulled my pants off then pulled my shirt above my head.
