1341122121221.title: Talk with her

13412.content:
And then, just as I thought I would get caught by the girl out for ticklish blood, she moved on. I kept my breaths soft, trying desperately to remain calm. Although she wandered the attic for quite a bit longer, she eventually exited, deciding to search another room. I allowed myself a few breaths before settling down and staying quiet, eager for this game to end one way or the other. Minutes passed into hours, and after a few of those hours (during one of which she returned to the attic and almost found me again) Katelyn, both annoyed and frustrated, called out to me. 

"OKAY! You win fair and square, I can't find you. Come out now!" 

"With pleasure," I answered, starting to move from my nook. Katelyn sped up to the attic again, just to see where I'd been hiding. 

"Dammit! I thought that spot looked too small for you to fit into..." 

"Believe me, it was a tight squeeze..." I replied. Katelyn merely pouted. "Anyway, I do believe I win, yes? That must mean I get my reward..."

Katelyn sighed and nodded her head. "No fair," she replied, stepping down the stairs. "I wanted to to tickle you so much..." I grinned and began to follow her. 

"Don't worry, you'll get your chance," I said with a wink, bringing a smile to her face. "But for now, I get to have my ticklish way with you!" The girl nodded, knowing she had to keep her end of the bargain. 

But, where did I 'entertain' my willing female captive?
13412.title: Passed Over

134122.content:
"C'mon then, let's see if you can take what you can dish out," I said, smiling as I led her to my room. Although she seemed a little disappointed that she had lost the game and wouldn't get to tickle me, to my surprise she seemed to get much more cheery and peppy about her upcoming ordeal as soon as she walked into my room and plopped onto my bed.

"Ooooh, this is comfy..." she said, feigning a yawn as she collapsed on the bed, the springs creaking slightly. While I walked to my closet to throw on some clothes, she opened an eyelid and spied a box next to my bed. She reached down open up and burst into giggles, "Wow, you came prepared, big boy!" she laughed as she emptied the box of feathers, rope, brushes and an assortment of other tickle tools.

Sliding into a pair of shorts, I flushed darkly. I wanted Katelyn to be laughing, and I admitted she had kind of a cute laugh of the soft melodic giggly variety, but her making fun of me was rather not how I wanted it to go.

I dug into the box and considered showing her the ropes, but ultimately decided on the scarves instead. In my experience scarves chaffed far less and were better for light and teasing tickling and the way I figured it, since she had been teasing me so much, it was my turn to get a bit of teasing in.

"I wouldn't be so cocky if I were you..." I said, as I reached over and tied her wrists to the bed posts. I leaned down and whispered in her ear, "Get ready to start squealing." I said it in what I thought was quite a menacing tone, but she responded this to blowing a loud raspberry in my face. I guess in hindsight, trying to spook a master of pranks was not a very good idea, who knows how many boys and girls Katelyn and her gang of tickle-happy comrades had tormented over the years?

Grumbling under my breath, I finished tying down her ankles and stepped back to admire my handiwork. I had left her with a little bit of slack so she could squirm and wiggle a bit, but she wasn't really going anyway unless I had grossly underestimated how strong she was.

And while Katelyn might have not been my first choice of tickle-prey, she was still a very good catch and especially so if we were about to spend a month together in the same house. She was definitely cute, with her long hair and bright blue eyes she was already smiling and wiggling her socked feet in anticipation. Her blue tank top exposed her underarms nicely, and her shorts exposed much of her long legs (I also found it rather somewhat demoralizing that this middle-school girl was nearly as tall as I was, what were they feeding these kids these days?).

"Well? Bring it on, big boy. Do your worst. Just don't forget, I'll be sure to get you back," she said with a wide smile, completely unafraid and, dare I say it, excited.

"I'll just have to make sure to get you extra good then," I grinned back, "but let's make this a little more interesting," I said as I slipped a blindfold over her head. In my extensive experience that always brought about more... entertaining results.

"Now... where should I start?" I said speaking aloud as I looked up and down her ticklish and exposed body. She still had a defiant mischievous smirk on her face, and I looked to remove that ASAP.
134122.title: To My Room

choices: She managed to hold it in.
1341222.content:
"Let's start low and slowly work our way up, shall we?" I said as I got up and slowly grazed my fingernails down her thighs, down her long legs as I made my way to her feet. I had tied them together at the ankles for easier access. I was truly surprised by what Katelyn said next.

"No problem, my feet aren't as ticklish as my tummy anyway," Katelyn shrugged nonchalantly.

I stopped the movement of my trailing fingers for a moment just to digest what she just said. "Wait, did you just give away your most ticklish spot? You're new at this, aren't you?"

"Heh, maybe I did, or maybe it's a terrific bluff. Or maybe it's a terrific double-bluff, who knows?" she laughed.

Wait, she wasn't supposed to be the one playing the mind games, I was! That's not how these usually go, but as I sat there pondering I realized I had fallen into her trap and was wasting valuable tickle time. The penalty for losing the game of Cops and Robbers was one hour of tickling, and I had already wasted ten minutes.

"Nice try, I'm not falling for that one," I said as I sat down at the foot of the bed and yanked her socks off, revealing her bare feet. They were cute, long and slender and her short, neatly trimmed toenails were painted with a glossy dark blue polish that matched her eyes.

"Tell you what, since you're such a fan of games, how about we play one here? It's called 'Don't laugh'," I explained as using just one fingernail I lightly traced down the arch of her left foot.

"I'll just use two fingers, but if you laugh, I get to use all ten," I declared as I immediately began grazing her across her feet with just my two index fingers.

"Wait, how do I win?" Katelyn began to ask, but she had to gasp and bite her lower lip to start herself from giggling as I had just snuck a finger in-between her big toe and second toe and was slowly teasing the soft flesh in between that wasn't used to being touched.

"If you last five minutes I'll let you go," I said with a big grin in my voice, feeling fairly convinced she wouldn't possibly last that long.

I looked up and I saw her competitive streak in full effect as she bit her lip and seemed determine to not lose. It was rather adorable really as she curled her pretty toes up and tried to withstand the two tormenting fingers.

Tracing my two fingers over both soles, I made circles, letters, numbers and sometimes just random squiggles, my fingertips and nails lightly scratching, slowly massaging. Every now and then she would shiver and let out an almost inaudible squeak which I felt would be cruel to disqualify her on.

Sometimes I would focus my slow tinkling tickles on one foot and her poor little feet would flap and wiggle, one crossing over the other in a vain attempt to protect it. This only had the highly amusing effect of leaving the protector vulnerable, as I would simply then tickle the other foot, forcing the roles to reverse in desperation, repeating an endless cycle of ticklish agony.

"Awww, that's so cuuuute," I teased her, as she did the foot protecting thing again. I had been teasing her feet slowly, but now she was getting dangerously close to victory so I let her fingers go wild tickling her long arches rapidly all over.

Katelyn jolted as she felt this powerful high-octane attack and...
1341222.title: Start low.

13412221.content:
She couldn't keep this in and burst out high-pitched giggles as was to be expected, as I used two fingers to rake up and down both her sensitive arches in the closing moments of the game. I figured, hey, if you're not cheating, you're not trying enough.

Of course the fact that she was blindfolded and I had almost certainly got away with it made it even better.

I cracked my knuckles. "Ohhhhhh, you've done it now. Looks like now I get to use both hands, and all ten fingers," I announced, chuckling. Now my fingers were working fast, over both feet. I went for the kill, as I immediately dragged my nails up and down Katelyn's soft soles, not stopping till I heard her burst into hysterical uncontrollable laughter.

To her credit, for the first few strokes she managed to endure my attack, merely flinching and gasping as I dragged my fingernails up her arches. I started off going from her heels to along the ball of the foot and back again, but once I added her blue-painted toes to the mix the flood gates opened as she burst into schoolgirl giggles.

Seeing that it was a soft spot for her, I then switched to targeting each of Katelyn's toes, pinching them, wiggling them, and scraping along the top of them. To my delight, Katelyn yelped with each pinch, giggled from each wiggle and bounced on the bed from each scrape as she tried to escape the tickling. I was starting to really have fun as I began to flick my fingernails across Katelyn's toes, easily tickling each one with a casual flick of a fingernail.

"Told you I would have you laughing before long," I smirked as I continued to play with her long toes.

As much fun as it was, permanently traumatizing middle-school students was something I generally tried to avoid, so it seemed prudent to give her a little break. Of course every now and then I casually stroked her foot to "keep her on her toes" in both a figurative and literal sense as she panted.

"That was totally unfair," Katelyn pouted after she caught her breath. "You totally used more than two fingers at the end."

"I have no idea what you're talking about," I said, whistling. "But tell you what. I'm not totally without mercy, so I'll give you another chance."

Seeing Katelyn grit her teeth and clench her toes determinedly, I shook my head, laughed and spoke again, "Nah, playing the same game in a row would be far too boring. I've got a game that I know you and your ticklish body will just love..."
13412221.title: Better Out Than In

134122211.content:
I reached over to my desk and grabbed a black ballpoint pen as I announced the next game we'd play.

"You know how to play Tic-Tac-Toe, right?" I said as I uncapped the pen and brought it closer to Katelyn's bare feet. Being blindfolded, she didn't see it coming.

"Well, duh. It's not exactly a complicated game, I thought you big boys were meant to be smart?" Katelyn replied cheekily. It seemed her mischievousness had not been tickled out of her quite yet.

“Well, for this game, we'll be playing it with a little twist,” I grinned. “Keep your foot still. Let's make sure it’ll write.” Just as Katelyn began asking what on Earth I was talking about I tapped the tip to Katelyn’s left heel and began scribbling right to left very swiftly.

The response was instantaneous, and carried a much more frantic sound than I had anticipated. Immediately, Katelyn responded with “Ohohohoho” followed by wave after wave of hysterical giggles. Luckily (for me, not her), ink did not immediately flow forth from the pen, which meant I had to dutifully continue the tickling,. I chuckled, I wasn't really in a hurry in sparing the ticklish girl from such apparently tremendous sensations. Her reactions were so entertaining that I half-considered getting a camera and recording this to show some friends. Tragically, I only had about twenty minutes of the hour left, and I didn't really want to take advantage of the girl TOO much, now did I? And if I did, who knew what she'd do in retaliation...

"Stop fidgeting," I said sternly as Katelyn's foot wiggled and squirmed. "If you mess it up, I'll have to wash it off and start again," I said, though truthfully I don't think I would've really minded writing on Katelyn's feet all day long.

Katelyn let out a whimper that sounded remarkably like a puppy before grumbling and bracing herself as the pen began stroking her left heel again.

Finally, the ink had run forth, blackening her light colored sole ever so slightly; I continued the motions for several seconds more, though, watching Katelyn squirm was adorable.

"Alright, I gotta draw the rest of the board, don't move” I said as my hand moved to the toes of Katelyn’s left foot, pushing them back so the sole was pulled taut. Despite anticipating the strokes of the pen, Katelyn's foot still jolted as tip of the pen struck the ball of her foot, nearly ruining my line.

After that, I quickly zipped lines up her arches and just under the ball of the foot. Then I repeated the same action on the other foot so we had two playing boards. They weren't quite perfect due to Katelyn's ticklishness, but they were legibl and hey, no need to be picky. I wasn't exactly designing rockets here. They'd do.

“Alright, the board's finally done. Basically, it’s Tic-Tac-Toe, pardon the pun. As I'm sure you've worked out, the board will be your feet,” I said, smiling as I admired my penmanship.

“Wait, what?” Katelyn said, still panting.

I began to try explaining the rest of the rules, but Katelyn complained loudly:

“How am I supposed to play if I can’t seehehehehehe!” Annoyed that I was interrupted, I began to quickly scratch at Katelyn’s big toe on her right foot with my free hand, watching the toe flex and twitch violently.

“May I please continue?”

“Yes! Yehehes!” she giggled.

“Good. I won’t stop then,” I sniggered, continuing to tickle the toe for several seconds, “Anyway as I was saying, I'll play fair. Hell, I'll even give you an advantage. We'll play two games, leftie and rightie," I said, poking each foot with the pen for emphasis. "If I get three in a row, I win. If I don't, you win. If you win one and I win one, we go to sudden death. I think I'm being pretty reasonable here," I said with a smirk. Perhaps calling this game “fair” was a bit of a stretch. Katelyn was at a bit of a ticklish disadvantage.

"And what if I win?" Katelyn said, sounding very confident in her abilities.

“Well… if you win, I’ll let you tickle me,” I shrugged. To be honest I wouldn't mind losing that much either. It was a perfect win-win situation. “If you lose, you tell my parents that I've been as radiant as sunshine this month. Sound good?” I said.

She had a very curious smile on her face as she accepted the conditions. "I'm so gonna whoop you, big boy. I'm the Tic-Tac-Toe queen in my math class!"

I wondered for a second what kind of math class she was in if they spent all their time playing Tic-Tac-Toe before replying.

"Let's play."
134122211.title: Ticklish Tic-Tac-Toe

choices: Throw the game and play sudden death
1341222111.content:
I hummed loudly as I stared at her feet, deep in thought.

“Uhhhheheh…What are we waiting for?” Katelyn asked, wondering why the game hadn’t begun. She was still blindfolded so she didn't know what was going on and why I was waiting.

“Hmm.. do you want to go first, or should I? What do you think, would it be too unfair if I went first?" I asked, cheekily using this excuse to slyly drag a finger up one of Katelyn’s arches, causing her to laugh lightly and squirm.

“Yehehehes!”

“Ok, ok! Jeez, there's no need to yell. You act like someone is tickling you, or something,” I said with a broad grin on my face.

This was too cute. I wonder if we could play this every day till my parents came back. Oh well.” Slowly, I moved from the far left box to the far right, letting the tip of the pen lightly caress the ball of Katelyn's foot to allow Katelyn to revel in her own ticklishness for just a little longer. When the pen gently touched the far right box, I slowly filled it with my circle, and then drew a long thorough deliberate line connecting the three circles, before drawing the pen back up it, forcing Katelyn to laugh as the line was repeatedly drawn. 135.content:
So there I was, sitting stark naked in the kitchen, when I heard a curious clank come from the front door. It almost sounded like the padlock to the front door was being manipulated somehow. Was it possible that my parents had returned from their vacation already? Or could it have been my sister, home early from our cousin's house?

While being discovered by my family in my birthday suit would be embarrassing for all involved, there was another, far more insidious possibility... someone was trying to break into our house! Afterall, there HAD been that recent prison break-out on the news, and there were rumors of an artifact missing from the local museum. But I dismissed the idea as too outlandish. While we were relatively well-off, there was no way someone would target our mediocre-looking house. So, I decided to head upstairs and put on some casualwear. "Must be the wind," I muttered to myself.

But then the clanking got louder. I froze, and despite my best efforts to rationalize it, it was clear someone was fiddling with the door's lock. Feeling especially vulnerable while naked, I decided to grab whatever clothing I could and confront whoever was at the door. Unfortunately, all I could find was a comical chef's apron with the words "Kiss the Cook" plastered on its front. But it was better than nothing, and I quickly put it on.

I had barely cinched the draw-strings when I heard an ominous THUNK from the front foray. The lock was released! Panicking, I grabbed the nearest 'weapon' I could find... a spatula. Wielding it as a miniature battle-axe, I raced to the front door, hoping against hope that it was merely my parents returning early.

The door creaked open, and a figure stood in the threshold. I squinted, drawing to make out the shape...

1351.content:
There was a woman standing just inside the door to my house! I was part-shocked, part-scared, but mostly confused... for it was a rather stunning red-headed woman.

Dressed in a full-body leather catsuit, her cinnamon locks practically glowed in the early morning light. Her body was that of an athlete; slim but muscular, with curves in all the right places. The zipper to her body-hugging suit was pulled down to her chest, revealing ivory-white cleavage with just a smattering of freckles along the top. Her face was angular yet feminine, and her lips were a ruby-red that matched her hair.

I was too stunned to even dive for cover, and the intruder instantly spotted me.

"Bloody hell," she murmured in a rich, cultured British accent. "This house was supposed to be empty."

Despite her words, I didn't sense much hostility... mostly annoyance. As if to emphasize the point, she sighed deeply.

"Looks like a change in plans."

She took a step towards me, and finally my muscles sprung into action... and I collapsed onto my rear end, stuttering like an imbecile.

"W-who are y-you?" I squeaked out, with about as much manliness as a kitten.

The woman tilted her head, and a small smile appeared on her thick full lips. "I am Saeva Dupont, world-reknown art thief," she stated, as if it were common knowledge. She glanced at my apron, and smiled a little more. "And you appear to be a chef who cooks in the nude?"

Shaking my head dumbly, I muttered, "Uh...no."

Saeva sighed, clearly more amused with the situation than anything. "Well, then perhaps you can help me out, my nude little man. You see, my scouting reported that this home of yours would be empty for the next several months. I had intended to use it as my safehouse during my next heist, but now there appears to be a wrinkle in my plans..."

I stared at the woman before me, trying to think of something witty to say. Unfortunately, all I did was nod ever so slightly.

"So, how about this," Saeva said with her aluring accent, "I use your house, and you don't interfere with my preparations. In exchange, you get to witness the greatest art thief in the world work her magic."

I thought for a moment, before saying...

I stared at it in confusion before Saeva pressed a button on the side, shooting out a group of thin wires that wrapped around my torso, trapping my arms against my body completely!

14.content:
A note was found on our mailbox - a note, not a letter - that had asked me to babysit a couple of secondary school girls down the street for a pretty nice pay rate. The note said it was from a couple that my mother knew well, and she said I could go ahead, even giving me the spare key she had. It was for the first day of summer vacation: their parents were driving deep downtown to spend the day with some old friends, and they didn't want their daughters feeling neglected or running around the friends' apartment (the latter of which I thought was more likely).

I shot up and threw off the covers, checking the clock as I did. Upon reading the digits, I immediately vented a huge sigh of relief. The clock read 9:45. I didn't have to be at the house until 10:15. It was half an hour away, but the house was literally right down the street. Still, it couldn't hurt to be ready. Slipping on a loose t-shirt and some jogging shorts, and hopped downstairs to find a note for me on the kitchen counter.

Headed out to the new mall, see you tonight! - Mom, the note read. Next to the note was a bowl of cereal and glass of juice. Gotta love my mom.

Another few minutes and I'm out the door, walking towards the house where the neighbors live. To be honest, I was surprised that I got the offer to babysit. One of the girls was thirteen, surely old enough to look after her sister and herself. It's not like the parents were staying out overnight or anything. And why had they left a note on our mailbox instead of just coming and talking to us? It was a mystery, but one I didn't stress too much over.

Soon I'd arrived at the address where I was to babysit. The note had said that they'd be out already and the girls would let me in, but because I had the key I could let myself in. The door gave me no trouble, and inside the house I called out for Clarissa and Claudia, the two girls I was supposed to be watching.

In her chirpy voice she called to me "Good morning sleepyhead! Sorry for forcing myself on you like this, but I just couldn't wait to try these out on you." She began maneuvering her cart around the workbench, continuing to talk as she wheeled it closer to my bed. "Your entire family is out for the day and you were fast asleep - and I mean fast asleep - so I couldn't resist tying you up like this and getting my things. I took the liberty of stripping youth save time." Reaching the foot of the bed, she left her cart there and walked up to the mattress before sitting by my naked torso. Being nude didn't bother me at all - besides, she'd seen me naked several times before.

Katherine was a rare genius when it comes to machinery. Both of her parents are robotics engineers, and their talents have clearly rubbed off on their daughter. Already she could turn a pile of circuitry and spare parts into something neat and useful; a while ago she essentially built a small wheeled robot from the ground up, which now helps her carry loads around her 'lab'. Actually, she spends a lot of her talent on her tickling passion - which is rival to my own - creating clever contraptions and machines that tickle me out of my mind. However, when she first started she had no one to test her inventions on - and she wanted to fine-tune devices to specific subjects, so she couldn't use them on herself - so when she heard of my love for tickling she asked if I was okay with being her guinea pig. I answered as soon as she asked. Pretty soon I was spending every other weekend in her basement - her 'lab' she called it - strapped to an examination bed while Katherine invented and tried out new ways to tickle torture me to my limits.

As the brunette sat beside me, I chuckled softly. "I should've guessed it was you," I said. "I might've protested to you stripping me naked, but you've seen everything I could hide with clothes."

She may like inventing machines to do the tickling, but she still likes tickling me herself. "As ticklish as ever I see," she observed. After a few more seconds she let me catch my breath and continue.

"Since I am all prepared for your experiments - and I'm in no position to decline - I'm ready to be tested on. What did you bring with you?"

Her grin grew as she heard my response - she always liked it when I was a willing subject. Walking back to her cart, Katherine surveyed the devices and machines she brought over from her place. "I've brought a lot, and I've got three ideas to start with," she said after a while.

"I brought over something new today. I've got fourteen little machines, each with a suction cup that will stick tightly to your body once activated. On the inside are lots of tiny feathers that can move at various speeds, tickling the skin that the gadget is attached to. They are controlled by a remote that I will be using to adjust the speed of each one as well as which ones are on or off.

"My second suggestion is something a bit bigger. I've got three 'feather discs' as I like to call them. They have a strong arm that attaches to the bedframe and supports the disc, allowing it to spin unhindered across whatever part of the body I position it over. They too are controlled by a remote that sets the speed of the discs. The long plumes are very soft and light, but at high speeds they can be just as torturous.

"Finally, my greatest prototype yet. This little beauty was the hardest to put together, but will be by far the most advanced tool I've ever used on you. A pod twice as big as your head will be suspended above your body by four supporters that I will attach to your bed posts. From this pod will emerge a few small robotic arms, equipped with various tickle tools, that I will direct to tickle the sweet spots on your body - which I know very well.

"Well, which one do you want to start with?"

"Let's try those thingies that you mentioned first," I told her.

Grinning broudly, Katherine picked up a tray from her cart and brought it over to the bed. Two rows of the little gadgets were lined up neatly, ready to be used. Picking one up, she brought it closer to me so I could see what exactly she was putting on me.

Basically, it was a grey box almost an inch big with a black suction cup. The box had a button on the opposite side, currently dim but would probably light up once she activated it. Beside it was the number one, probably to let her know which devices she was controlling. Flipping it over, she showed me the tiny white feathers lining the center of the suction cup, contrasting with the black.

"I'm actually quite proud of these," Kat said, setting the tray down and placing the cup in the center of my armpit. Once she was happy with where it was, she pressed the button and the device attached itself tightly to my skin, the button shining green as it did. "Such small devices are very finnicky."

She proceeded to attach the machines to my body, targeting the spots she knew would drive me wild. Both of my armpits, ribs, and flanks got its own gadget. "There's one more," I pointed out jokingly. Smirking, Kat just set the tray back on her cart. She picked up a remote with the numbers one to fourteen arranged in two columns. Next to each number was a dial and a little light that shone green. Only number fourteen was dark, since it wasn't activated yet. All the dials were off right now, but I suspected that would change very soon.

Sitting down in the chair to my right, Katherine made herself comfortable. "You ready?" she asked. My heart beating too fast for me to speak, I could only nod. "I'll start out lightly," she continued, "just so I can probe your reactions. Don't worry, I'll be sure to tickle the shit out of you before we move on."

With that, she slightly twisted dials one and two, causing the machine in my armpits to activate, slowly shifting the feathers across my skin. Then the ones on my ribs and feet turned on too, and soon the room was filled with my constant giggling.

"You seem to enjoy this," observed Kat. "Though I can tell this is still too light for you." Turning the dials on her remote, she switched on the other devices and sped them up slightly.

Now I was laughing, though it was still nowhere remotely near my limits. Feathers swirled on my thighs, and bristles dove in and out of my navel, brushing the sides and hitting the knot at the bottom, which alone even on such a slow setting was very ticklish. Reflexively I struggled to get away, get free, but since the machines were stuck to me they never ceased their endless movement. And Kat's knot-tying was too good to allow me to escape.

Then she started probing, increasing the speed of one machine for a while, gauging my reaction, before turning it down again and continuing with another one. She didn't need to take notes, as her near-photographic memory kept track of my response to the tickling. Occasionally she prentended to forget, using it as an excuse to bring back an old machine we haven't tried in ages.

I recognized her - in fact I recognized all of them. This little gang of girls were infamous for pulling pranks in and out of school. I knew right then that I wasn't going to have an easy time.

"We thought it'd be fun to prank a boy like this," said a blond to my left. "And it is. Your parents and sister went to the new mall and you were still asleep. It was a good opportunity! We just don't know what to do now."

"We could make him listen to really annoying sounds," suggested one girl.

"We could cover his face in smelly laundry," suggested another.

All eyes turned to a brunette a my right, who was the one who called me big boy. "I have an idea." Without warning, she reached out and poked my side, a small action but it made me giggle and try to squirm away, only to find I couldn't. All the girls shared devious looks, then swarmed around me until six were on my torso and four were on my legs. Despite the imminent embarrassment, I couldn't help but get a little turned on at the thought of being tickled mercilessly by all these girls at once. Luckily they were too focused on tickling to notice.

"Let's go!" shouted blondie, and my entire body was assaulted. Fingers poked and prodded my belly and ribs, nails dragged across the soles and arches of my feet, digits wiggled around inside my armpits, across my thighs, into my hips, even in my belly button. They didn't let up for minutes, which doesn't sound like much but when you're being tickled out of your mind each minute is an eon.

"Wow," a girl at my feet exclaimed amidst my cackling. "He's very ticklish! This is so much fun." Eventually they did relent, but only long enough for me to catch my breath and for them to decide how to proceed.

Still heaving for breath, I barely noticed that they'd untied me. It wasn't until that they started prodding me that I realized through my giggling that I could move. "Stand up and follow me. Don't try to run or we'll tickle you down. Disobey and Cindy's going to have fun with that feather drill."

To my left, the blond from before pointed the drill at me and grinned evilly before giving it a menacing whirr, the feathers moving rapidly. Although I did plan on stopping a few times, just to give Cindy an excuse to use that drill.

"Up," the brunette ordered, and up I got. Following her to the hall, I stopped in the doorway as if reluctant to leave my room. A whirring noise came from behind me, and the feather drill made contact with my butt, forcing a gale of laughter from my lungs and prompting me forward. All the girls giggled at the reaction, and soon the feathers were dancing across my rear again. When we reached our destination, I found myself in our garage beside our house. The other three girls were standing around waiting for us, and they immediately perked up when the brunette brought me into the room.

Cindy poked me with the feather drill again, and I giggled myself into the center of the garage next to the ladder. "Raise your arms," the brunette ordered, and I obeyed immediately. The girl on the ladder quickly tied one end of rope around my right wrist before looping it over one of the crossbeams of the garage and securing the other end to my left wrist. "Open your legs," commanded their leader, and I complied. "More." I split my legs as far as I could, hanging from the rope as I did. Four girls brought over two one hundred pound weights that my dad put in the corner years ago and placed them by either of my feet. Two more girls came over with small lengths of rope and secured my ankles to the heavy metal masses. Now I was stretched to my limit, hanging from a crossbeam with my legs pulled apart by a couple of weights.

Just then the girl who left returned with a tripod and camera. My stomach dropped - if they posted this or showed it to anyone, it would go viral and I'd be mocked for eternity. But before I could open my mouth to plead, the brunette (whose name still eluded me) hushed me and put a feather to my lips. "Don't worry big boy, this is just for us," she reassured me. "We promise we won't share this with anyone - we're not that cruel."

A huge sigh of relief escaped my lungs. If that video had gotten out into town, I'd be the laughingstock of the entire high school forever. As it was, my heart still skipped nervously as they set the camera up in front of me. I heard a beep as it began recording, and all the girls rushed over to me. "Ready everybody?" the brunette asked. She was answered with a chorus of nods and evil chuckles. "Ticklish big boy, take one!" she announced to the camera, and they commenced.

The whirr of the drill emanated from behind me as Cindy pushed the feather tips into my left cheek, causing me to jolt as far forward as able. That wasn't very far, and soon I found just how truly restrained I was. Though I was able to move my hips forward and back, that was all the freedom I had and I could only shift minute amounts of a millimeter. Feathers twirled around in my armpit, someone dusted my flank, one girl dug her fingers into my ribs, some others ran paintbrushes up and down my thighs, a little devil stuck an electric toothbrush in my navel and turned it on. How long they kept me in that perpetual state of tickling I don't know. All that I do know is that I managed to stay conscious and enjoy every second. One by one the girls let up though, until the feather drill finally pulled away from me and let me rest.

I dropped to the floor as soon as my arms and legs were free, panting and gasping for breath. Whilst I was recovering, the girls put everything back and slipped the memory card out of the camera. When I was able to look up, I saw the brunette standing there with a glass of ice water in her hands. "How're you doing big boy?" she asked, handing me the glass. "Thanks, err..."

"Katelyn," she said. "Listen, ah, sorry for going so far. We just wanted to prank you because your family was out, we didn't mean to push you so hard like that." I looked at her and she seemed genuinely apologetic, something I was a little surprised to find.

"Don't worry about it Katelyn," I told her. "I don't mind at all, although you all looked very evil when you were standing over me soon after I woke up. If there's anything you should apologize for, its for being too scary before you started."

The twelve year old giggled a little shyly, and again I was surprised. One by one they left, teasing me on their way out. Cindy even spent a minute goosing my sides as she passed, amused at my ballistic reaction.

On her way out, Katelyn turned towards me and grinned. "I'll be back to give you more," she promised. "Expect plenty of pranks in the near future, big boy." With that, she ran and caught up with her friends.

As for me, I sat there for another few minutes, thinking about the morning that had just happened. I could scarcely believe it, but it had happened. I was still holding the glass of water to prove it. A gang of girls really had tied me up and tickled me half to death. It was like something out of a dream. Is that one a very ticklish area?" She just smiled, squirming a little in a vain effort to get her shirt to fall back down and cover her midriff.

"Help, I think Robb's coming to get me, oh help!" Her performance was surprisingly good, though she kind of spoiled it when she broke out into a huge smile that touched every corner of her face, just before burying it into my shoulder. I was happy to let the moment last a little longer (though Robb felt a little awkward) but a glance over at the clock told me I should be leaving.
         "I should get going soon," I informed my friends sadly. My family would probably be back soon, and I should be there when they returned. It was already seven, and I doubted anybody would be spending dinner out of the house. Reluctantly, Rachel eased off my arm and took a look at the clock.
         "Yikes," she exclaimed. "I gotta go. Didn't realize how long we'd spent here." Hugging me, she then scooted over to Robb, giving him a quick hug too. "Thanks for inviting me over Robby," she said softly. Robb returned the hug, and Rachel got up off the couch. As she passed me on her way out, she leaned in close to my ear.
         "You can bet I'll be seeing you soon," she whispered. "I still owe you some tickles, and I'll be sure to get my full vengeance." And with that threat hanging, she was out the door.
         Now I had two girls who were out to tickle me - one with a personal vendetta, and another with a whole gang.
         Stretching my own sleepy muscles, I stood up from my comfortable spot on Robb's couch. "I better leave too, my family will be home soon if they're not already. God knows mom's gonna throw a fit if I'm not back before dinner. Hey, thanks for having me over man."
         "Anytime," was Robb's casual response. "Gimme a call, we should hang out again like this. Maybe I'll invite more of the gals too." When that thought crossed his mind, a smile spread across his face and he chuckled. "Actually, that sounds good. Remind me to throw a party sometime, the gang should hang out when we're not being swamped with homework."
         Smiling, a shook my head in jest, a theatrical sigh coming from my lungs. "Really? You're calling us a gang now? Yeah, I'll remind ya. At least, when someone reminds me. Don't worry, we'll get around to it eventually." I walked to the door. "Still, a gang?"
         "Well, I need to call it something, and for some odd reason I don't think of us as a crew. Too cheesy." We both shook our heads in agreement. "Anyway, I'm sure I'll be seeing you around dude."
         I replied, "Count on it." Leaving his place, I got on bike and began the quick ride back to mine.

         When I pulled into the garage, the car was there already. Easing my old ride onto the wall of the garage, I quickly went inside, eager to eat after the long day. I wasn't surprised to see my dad working on his laptop at the dining table. I wasn't surprised to see my mother in the kitchen, cooking some delectable looking food. Although I was surprised that my sister wasn't helping her.
         "Hey ma," I said, walking into the kitchen and breathing in the exquisite aromas. "Looks delicious. By the way, how was the new mall? It opened today right, just an hour out of town?"
         My mother smiled in that way that makes someone feel right at home. She answered, "Oh it was great. I swear, they have every major chain from clothes to shoes to jewelry. Where were you?" Before I could answer, an eyebrow on her forehead raised. "And how did you know we were at the mall?"
         "Well, let's just say I heard it from a new friend I made today." While almost everyone knew about my interest in tickling, there were some things I didn't tell them. Katelyn was one of many things I kept (relatively) secret. "I was over at Robb's house, trying out his new Kinnect thingy."
         "Sounds like fun," my mother replied, multitasking our conversation with the stove and microwave. "Lauren's out eating dinner with a bunch of her friends, so it'll just be you, me, and your father tonight. They'll be coming over afterwards - Lauren's hosting a sleep-over. That okay with you hun?"
         "Sounds fine ma." A bunch of girls sleeping over? It's actually a lot less fun than it sounds. They stay up talking late into the night and even the morning, long after I'd like to fall asleep. Sure they were pretty and fun to be with - and Lauren's friends always happened to be very ticklish - but they could be little devils too. More than once they teamed up and gang tickled me for hours. Sure, I don't complain, but it's scary being at the mercy of an army of girls.
         Dinner was rather uneventful when compared to what I'd gone through earlier that day. Once he finished his project, my dad told us he'd be leaving on a business trip sometime that week for a few days at least. Mom told me about the mall, how immense it was and the beautiful architecture, not to mention the sheer number of stores there. After about an hour, we had finished eating and I cleared the dishes while dad went right back to working and mom sat back on our couch to watch some of her favorite shows.
152221111.title: Heading Home

choices: I was abducted by aliens in my sleep
That night, I had a very ticklish dream...
1522211111.content:
After being tickle-tortured in the morning by Katelyn's girl gang and tickling Rachel in the afternoon, I felt that it had been a long day and some early rest couldn't hurt. And without the burden of homework, there was no reason for me to stay up late into the night. I also decided that I didn't have enough stamina remaining to deal with Lauren and her friends when they came back. They could be ruthless, and while it may have been fun I simply wasn't feeling up to it.

Climbing the stairs in our house, I retired to my bedroom. It looked more or less like it had when I woke up, the bedsheets and blankets strewn on the floor from that morning. The girls had left the tickle tools and rope on my worktable for me - even the feather duster. Their use and punishing use of tickling gave me several ideas, but I didn't have the energy nor materials to do so that night.

Digging around inside my closet, I emerged with my old laptop. The thing had been around with me longer than my back, and the trusty old thing allowed me to do many firsts. Setting it down on the desk, I spent the next hour surfing the net, watching some of my favorite YouTube vids and visiting Writing.Com (excellent site by the way). It was entertaining, but as I grew less interested I decided it was time for me to conk out.

I threw my sheets back onto my mattress and slid into bed. The familiar comforting feeling returned, and before long I was fast asleep.
1522211111.title: Early to bed and all that

choices: A voice spoke over a hidden intercom
A strange being entered through the portway
15222111111.content:
That night was a cloudy one, and the shining stars were hidden from view. Even the bright moon, which normally glowed so fiercely white at this time of the month, was partially hidden by the clouds, casting fluffy shadows on the ground below. It was late at night, long past the time I had nodded off, and most of the town had fallen asleep. Most of those who hadn't weren't looking out their windows at a starless sky, and those who were didn't see the enormous flying vessel. The darkness provided natural cover for the town-sized ship, and it could float above the small town without worry of detection. Scanning the remote collection of buildings, the crew found their target: a house on the outskirts of the town, more acurately a male specimen inside that house, namely me.

The noise of machinery emanated from the opening bay door, though by the time the sound reached the surface it was nothing more than a groan in the wind. Out of the now open bay door came a smaller ship, one meant to ferry passengers between the ground and the vessel, no bigger than a bus, and it flew down into the town to retrieve its target. The shuttle lowered itself until it was about level with my window, hovering as the hatch opened to reveal a person covered entirely in a jumpsuit and machinery. Silently sliding my window open, the stealthy intruder snuck up to my bare body and slipped a few drops of solution onto my lips. Had I been awake, the solution would've knocked me out faster than a sledgehammer to the head (and feel much like one) but asleep as I was it sent me into an even deeper slumber, without a chance of me stirring for the next several hours.

Without having to worry about me waking, the intruder then hoisted me over his (or her) shoulder and returned to the shuttle, sliding me to another person within the small ship through the window. Once I was secured, they closed the window behind us, closed the hatch to the shuttle, and returned to the huge dark ship floating miles above the surface.

--------------------

I don't know how long I spent in a semi-conscious state, just waking up from my deeper than expected rest. Feelings of mild happiness filled me, like the light pleasure of lying in your bed in the morning even though you are awake, and this perpetual state of satisfaction was all I knew for the longest time. As I slowly returned to my senses however, I realized that I was actually not in my bed and I could not tell whether it was morning or not. The first thing that greeted my open eyes were silver metallic walls, covered in panels and hatches and bolts, giving the room a futuristic look. Apart from a single closed portway on one side of the room, there were no obvious openings that could lead anywhere. The door itself was made of a darker metal than the silvery color of the walls, but it was still seemless with the rest of the room. Beside it were two lights, a green one that remained dark and a red one that grew dimmer and brighter. Above me was a single source of light, somehow shone equally throughout the entire room, eliminating any shadowy corners. How that could have been possible I have no idea, but it was true.

The only furnishing in the entire space was a metal table on which I now sat up on. Restraints at the head and foot of the table laid open like crab claws, cuffs ready to snap shut at a moment's notice. They were the same color as the walls, creating an overall uninteresting atmosphere. After my observation of this alien place settled in my mind, curiosity soon followed, laced with a hint of panic. What was I doing here? Why was I here? Where was here? Who did this?
15222111111.title: Procurement

choices: She was a humanoid alien, flanked by guards.
She was a completely different kind of species...
152221111111.content:
"Greetings, human specimen 5! We hope you have become acclimatized to your new surroundings, are you feeling well? No oxygen poisoning on the trip over? Do your limbs function properly?" nattered a high-pitched, oddly cheery voice. I looked around at the odd table and the bright silver walls. Somehow I had a feeling this wasn't an elaborate prank.

"Who are you?" I asked shakily, standing up as I looked around for the intercom. Were there cameras in here too?

"Why I am Professor Solaris M. Vordin! Perhaps you've heard of me? I'm told I am very famous in this sector of the galaxy," the voice said proudly. I wasn't sure how to respond, only that in general it's a bad idea to annoy jittery megalomaniacs.

"Uh, no actually," I said truthfully. "What do you want with me?" I asked, but it seemed the professor had already tuned me out and was talking to himself.

"Primitive Earthlings, no idea when they are in the presence of a genius. Perhaps I could use their limited cognitive abilities to test the intelligence adapter strain research that Group C is working on..." Vordin mused, talking to himself. He continued this for a few moments more, rambling on about research that some group or other is working on, before realizing I was still on hold until a few repeated coughs and ahems got his attention.

"Oh yes, Earthman, forgot you were there. Er, yes, Never mind. That is all."

"Wait, aren't you going to tell me what you want! Where am I?"

"Oh, I've no time for this, busy busy busy. Tell Kelliah that Specimen 5 is ready for the initial tests."

"Wait, what, Who's Kelliah?" I said, confused, until I worked out he was talking to someone else. The professor spoke in such a quick and frantic pace I hadn't picked it up. The fact his voice was so high was making my head hurt too. I don't know what kind of drugs they had injected into me, but I felt like I had a been hit by a sledgehammer in the face. I didn't get a reply as the intercom beeped and there was silence. I sat back down on the table

Shortly afterwards, there was a rap on the door of the room and I met Kelliah.
152221111111.title: First Impressions are Forever

choices: I was here to be a test subject for some recently developed tickling weapons.
I was here to be an experiment for a new drug to do with the joy of laughter.
1522211111111.content:
"Greetings and salutations," said a strangely well-dressed purple-skinned woman in a bored tone, pausing as she glanced down at her clipboard, "...human specimen five. We of the OmniProd Corp have a contract for you to sign," she said emotionlessly, as if just going through a routine. She handed me the clipboard and a long metal rod which turned out to be an elaborate pen and not some kind of devious probe. "At the dotted line," she pointed, ignoring my baffled expression.

"Uhhh, there's so much I don't understand I don't know where to start," I said, looking at the clipboard. "First of all, where the hell am I?"

"I don't see how that is in any way relevant. Just sign the papers and we can get on with our lives," Kelliah intoned, staring at her nails. I looked up at her, and while the purple skin had made the obvious she wasn't quite human, upon further examination I realized that instead of hair she seemed to have small tentacles that reminded me disturbingly of Medusa, the Greek myth. The scary serpent-lady who had snakes for hair and eyes that could turn people into stone.

I gulped and stared at the two burly guards, also purple-skinned, that followed her and seemed to be glaring at me. The strange rifles they had in their hands did not made me feel any more assured. I considered just signing the document and saying "screw this, I had a nice life, tickled a lot of girls," but this couldn't be how it ended. No way.

I put down the clipboard and the long pen on the metal table, the noise quiet but distinct in the otherwise silent room. "Tell me what's going on first," I said, looking intently at the Kelliah woman straight in the eyes. She glared back, and I noticed her eyes were purple too.

"Fine. I hate having to deal with such troublesome test subjects," she grumbled as she reached into the pocket of her jacket, which was made of shiny material (it seemed rules of fashion were universal), and pulled out a stack of flashcards.

"OmniProd Corp is the corporation that strives to achieve excellence in every area, oh blah blah blah, just read it yourself," she said, bored already as she tossed me the stack of flashcards.

"Uh, actually, I can't read this at all," I said apologetically. The language reminded me of puddles and blobs, I didn't have a clue what any of it meant, and the documents she had handed me earlier were in the same script. Utterly unintelligible.

"Do they not teach you how to read in Earth schools?" Kelliah grumbled before picking up the clipboard with the document attached to it. "This is a legal binding contract that says you are willing to let us test our new products on you for a few days. In doing so you get paid 200,000 universal currency, credits, dollars, whatever you want. Now please sign."

"Wait, tell me what kind of products you're gonna be testing on me first. What's going to happen to me?"

"There is no chance of lethality. You are merely going to be put in a controlled environment to test our products," Kelliah said, trying to push the clipboard and pen into my hand again.

"Wait, just what does your OminProd Corp sell? Tell me!"
1522211111111.title: The Alien Agent

choices: "Hmm, money for information, that's an acceptable deal."
15222111111111.content:
"Omni Product Corporation is famous for being the most innovative company in anything relating to tickling - interrogation tools, drugs, the like. You're here specifically for the tickling weapons industry branch of the corporation. You and the other specimens shall test the prototypes before they go into mass production. Now please hurry up and sign."

"Can't you tell me more about this first, why tickling? And another thing, how come you aliens can speak English?"

"Universal translator," Kelliah replied like she heard the question a thousand times before, and considering she seemed to be in charge of contract negotiations, it wouldn't be surprising if she in fact had this conversation a thousand times before. "The translator does not work on text however, and it would be a far too inefficient waste of our human expert's time to have her translate for you hairless apes," she said dismissively.

"Why tickling weapons though? Why it is always tickling?" I asked, not ungrateful for this fact, but no closer to understanding any of this.

"I have no more time for your questions. You have already taken up more than my alloted time. Sign the document now or you will see why tickling is the favored method of interrogation in the galaxy," she said, glaring and wiggling her fingers threateningly. I could see now her nails were filed to a sharp tip, polished with a fine purple sheen, and I wasn't too eager to find out how they felt just yet.

"Wait, let's make a deal, I'll sign the documents if someone tells just what's going on!" I said, trying desperate to barter with this woman.

"In order to negotiate, one must have something of value to offer," she said coolly before gesturing to the guards to clamp me down.

"Wait, the 200,000 whatevers in the contract! It's yours!" I yelled as the two muscular purple-skinned guards grabbed my arms and frogmarched me to the table.

She stroked her chin as she pondered my offer. The guards waited for her orders as I squirmed in their grasp. After one of them shoved the barrel of their weapon in my face I decided that being still had its payoffs.
15222111111111.title: The New Art of War

152221111111112.content:
"Lock him in. Oh, and let him taste the double chargers," I braced myself as the guards fiddle with a dial on their weapons, then fired their weapons at me. There was a pair of flashes, and I blinked and looked at myself. It didn't seem to have any effect, but my attention was drawn back to Kelliah who was wiggling her fingers threateningly. I was suddenly painfully aware just how exposed I was, stretched with my ankles and one end and my wrists at the other, with only my thin pajamas (a t-shirt and boxers) for protection.

"Oh, and human, after I break you, not only will you sign the document, but you're also going to give me half of that 200,000 for having me work overtime," Kelliah sneered, the rigid formal woman had disappeared and been replaced by this eagerly sadistic one.

Kelliah hooked her thumb under my shirt and pulled it up until it covered my face, preventing me from seeing anything clearly. Of course, there was nothing preventing me from feeling anything. "I don't need to see your smiles, human, I just want to hear you scream with laughter," she said venomously.

A sudden poke above my navel caused me to squeal and jerk to the direction of the prod, but my bonds prevented me from turning much in either direction. I was starting to realize what those guns had done to me. Every nerve seemed to behyper-sensitized, and it didn't help that I was natrually deathly ticklish either.

“You know, the last human I tickled broke in less than five minutes Do you think you can last that long?” she mocked.

As I opened my mouth to respond, I jolted as if being zapped by lighting when ten fingers burrowed into the sides of my stomach and wiggled in deeply. I exploded with laughter, thrashing on the table. I tried to break the bonds around my wrists and ankles, but it was pointless try to break out of the thick metal clamps. These people knew hot to make good bondage equipment.

I tried to suck in my stomach, but her fingers followed along effortlessly like a bloodhound following prey. No matter which way it twisted or turned, the her fingers were constantly wiggling into my stomach.

After a minute of this she lightened up a little bit, but it didn't really help that much. Her nails lightly skittered circles around my navel, stroking gently. I was still reduced to a giggling fit.

"I guess you wish you had signed that document now, don't you? Well too bad... I'm having too much fun to stop now," she whispered in my ear.

Slowly her nails began to spiral closer to my bellybutton each time she completed a circle around my stomach. My giggling grew more intense once I realized where she was heading.

“Ohohohoho comehehehon plehehease sthap!“

“Okay… You'll sign now, right?” She said, I heard the fluttering of paper.

I was so amazed that she had stopped that I slumped down on the table, relieved. I panted, drawing in deep gasps of air. I guess Kelliah was a business woman at heart, personal enjoyment came second to business. My t-shirt was beginning to stick to the sweat on my face.

“...changed my mind. Actually, I want to hear laugh a bit more first,” She said as a lone finger suddenly slipping into my navel before wiggling about and my world exploded. I shouted with laughter and bucked energetically against the table, but each erratic movement only seems to drive her finger in deeper.

“Okay, tell you what, if you can stay still for ten seconds, I'll stop.”

I could picture the evil grin on her face as she said that, but even if I wanted to hold still I just couldn't. My body was going crazy from the waves of ticklish sensations bombarding me. All I could do was scream and howl as that one finger in my bellybutton turned me into a quivering hysterical mess.

After another minute, smiling evilly, Kelliah finally decided to...
152221111111112.title: Aggressive Negotiations

choices: There was a knocking at the door of my cell.
I managed to pick the door!
1522211111111121.content:
"Oh fine, I'm such a softie," Kelliah said, pulling my t-shirt back down as she shoved the document in front of my face. "Sign it, as agreed?"

I nodded, eager to avoid another round. I liked being tickled a lot, but this was a whole other level of intensity. Kelliah gestured to the guards to open the clamps. There was a brief moment after my limbs were freed I spent shaking my wrists, and when I got to my feet I deeply considered punching Kelliah in the face and giving her a dose of her own medicine. One quick glance at the guards and I changed my mind.

As I was imagining this delightful yet impossible thought, Kelliah thrust the pen and clipboard into my hands. "At the dotted line."

"Would it really take that long to just explain to me the story behind this? I mean, is this how your corporation works? When someone disagrees, you just tickle them they change their minds?"

Kelliah sighed. "It's just business, It's how we do it, it's how everyone does it. Spare me the lecture and sign!" she said threateningly.

After she said this and I once again considered beating her over the head with the clipboard, I pulled out my last resort.

"Please?" I said, giving her my best pleading puppy-dog eyes look. I didn't know if Kelliah even knew what puppies were, but in my experience it was a trick that usually worked on girls, and alien girls seemed be no exception.

"You were a lot of fun to tickle, number five," she said, biting her index finger, it seemed my puppy-dog face was working.

"Tell you what, I'll let you meet with our human expert later. I'm sure she can answer your questions. She's been asking for an interviewee for a while now anyway," she conceded, shrugging. "But in return I don't want any more trouble from you, for some reason I'm sensing you could be the quite the nuisance..."

"I promise," I said, signing her document as a sign of good faith and handing it to her.

"Very well, don't break my trust in you number five. Though I must say, you are quite the specimen. I can see why Professor Adearon is so fascinated by humans," she said accepting the documents.

"Adearon is your human expert, I take it?"

Kelliah nodded as she tucked the clipboard under her arm. She gestured to the guards and they opened the door for her.

"Oh, and if you misbehave, bear in mind that I shall be sure to be the one to personally discipline you, number five," Kelliah threatened as the door slammed shut. I heard a click afterwards. It seemed that despite all the high-tech furnishings, they still used keys for the doors, probably due to budget restraints or something. How delightfully low-tech, I thought, smiling.

I looked up at the ceiling for sign of any cameras, after finding nothing suspicious, I pulled out the metal pen I had sneakily stashed with a nice sleight of hand.

I began fiddling with the door, seeing if I could somehow use my extensive lock-picking experiences (don't ask) to get the door open.

"Sorry, Kelliah, but I'd rather be the one disciplining you, thank you very much..." I murmured as I fiddled with the door, wondering if alien locks were similar enough to human locks for this to work.

After a few minutes of this...
1522211111111121.title: Signed Under Considerable Duress

choices: Rachel and Rob were also abducted as my fellow subjects.
My fellow test subjects were completely random people.
15222111111111211.content:
I pulled my hand back quickly and tucked the long metal pen behind the elastic waistband of my boxers. I didn't think the OmniProd Corp would react kindly if they found out I had been trying to break out within minutes of signing their contract. I stepped back and sat down on the metal bench, trying to look casual (at least, as casual as I could be in a completely empty room).

In burst a harried looking purple-skinned woman in some clothes that I assumed were far more casual than Kelliah's shiny jacket. She also seemed more casual as well, whereas Kelliah marched in all business-lie this woman was panting with exertion. She gave me a friendly smile.

"You must be subject five, it's so nice to meet you," she gushed, and awkwardly stuck a hand out. It seemed OmniProd Corp's resident human expert hadn't quite mastered the art of handshaking as she had her hand palm up as if asking for a low-five, but I awkwardly took her hand and shook it anyway.

"Actually, my name's not subject five, it's-" I began, as she stopp shaking my hand and let go, but she was already muttering to herself, and tapping buttons on a little handheld computer.

"Oh, so that's how you commence a traditional human handshake... How interesting, oh, an interview with a human, oh this is so exciting..." For some reason I was reminded of the first alien professor, who I had briefly chatted with on the intercom who was also like this, babbling quickly and constantly. I wondered if it was a trait of their species, having high-pitched voices definitely seemed to be a trait, though personally I felt that this Professor Adearon's voice was far less grating than Kelliah's or the annoying Professor Vordin's.

"So, human, tell me about your planet! What kind of wildlife is there, how developed are the human nations, what toxicity is the air, is it true humans procreate by sharing saliva?" she asked enthusiastically, with her electronic device at the ready to record my answers.

"Uhhh, slow down, slow down..." I said gesturing with my hands as she bombarded me with questions.

"Oh no, sorry, sorry, I do apologize, where are my manners?" she smiled apologetically, scratching her head, blushing and looking embarrassed. I have to admit, I found her actions to be kind of cute in a way. It was exactly the kind of thing an awkward teenage girl would do on her first date. "I'm Professor Adeara Adearon, an exotic species researcher for OmniProducts Corporation," she said proudly. "As you might have guessed, my particular field is the strange yet fascinating species that live on the planet you call Earth. Unfortunately, not much research has been done on them previously, so we no almost nothing about you humans, which is why this interview is so important to me."

"Well, it's nice to meet you, Professor Adearon, you see, I also have a few questions for you. Maybe we could do a trade?" I offered. "You answer one, I answer one."

"You do know what the table you're leaning against, is for, correct?" She asked, raising her an eyebrow. Well, something like that. She didn't have eyebrows, but her face definitely got the meaning across. I nodded, remembering Kelliah's not-so-compromising approach.

"This'll go a lot faster if we cooperate. And maybe this way you'll have more time to ask me questions," I said, trying to persuade her, "Think how much more you could about humans this way... a human interacting with you in a natural way, treating you like an equal... a friend..." I smiled, trying to charm her.

"So this is how humans negotiate! I must say, you humans are vastly better at cognitive reasoning than the preliminary data suggested!" She said excitedly, pressing some more buttons, typing something on her handheld device.

"I'll choose to take that as a compliment," I said smiling at her. She looked up at me, blushed and then smiled back. She seemed vastly friendlier than that suit, Kelliah. I knew a lot of people like that, and a lot of the time it was the shy, nerdy types who were the nicest, kindest people. Thinking that reminded me of friends I had on Earth, people like Catherine, Maddie, so many of my other friends. I had to get back there.

"Do we have a deal, Professor Adearon?" I asked, to clarify.

"We do, human. And... call me Adeara," she said, her cheeks burning. Of course, it was difficult to tell when the her skin was purple to begin with, but she definitely seemed to have flushed to a darker shade. "I remember reading somewhere that a sign of friendliness and intimacy among humans is offering a friendly nickname or one's first names."

"That's right, how do you know so much about humans anyway?" I asked, genuinely curious.

"Several university papers have been published about your species, though many details are inconsistent. Is it true that some humans enjoying howling at terrestrial satellites? And that these humans also possess the power to spontaneously turn into canines?"

"No, that's definitely not true," I laughed. I saw Adeara put a clear cross on her digital clipboard.

"Next question, is it-"

"Hold on, it's my turn to ask you one first," I said, silencing her. "Why is OmniProd Corp trying to develop tickling weapons."

"Because... they want to sell them? There's a large market for them?" Adeara answered, looking somewhat confused by my question. "Why do humans have such a strange skin color?"

"We like it that way," I said, making up an answer as fast as I could. "Why is there a such a big market for tickling weapons?" I pressed.

Andeara slowed down a bit, casting her gaze to the floor. "Well... have you ever heard of the Great War?"

"I've heard of one, but the one I'm thinking of is probably different from the on you're referring to. Go on."

"Well, ten standard years ago, there was a huge intergalactic war that basically hit every major planet and species in the local clusters. It started with a disagreement over clothing of all things. After the war ended there were estimates that it killed over 90% of every participating nation. My... my home planet was hit pretty bad."

"I'm sorry," I said automatically, as I realized that this poor girl must have seen so many of her friends and family die.

"Thank you," she said in almost a whisper, then coughed and cleared her throat. "So in the aftermath of the war, the The Universal Pacification Law was passed. The law seeks to avoid death at all costs, warranting very heavy fines on the planets who's citizens offend. The new law also believes in deadly retribution: if you kill someone, then your whole family is executed. In the first year of the law's introduction, many, many died, but after that, the world changed, and planets looked for non-lethal ways to defend itself."

"Wow, I can't believe that there would ever be a war like that. Banning death, that's amazing," I said, shaking my head in astonishment.

"Do you really think so human?" she asked, looking me in the eye. "The law will only remain until the clusters rebuild and repopulate themselves to 95% of its original population. And then the wars and death will start again," she sighed.

"Humans have tried to accomplish world peace for years, but we've never been able to do it," I replied.

"Perhaps we will continue at another time, you have already given me some very interesting answers. I thank you, human," she said, rubbing her eyes as she stood up and headed for the exit. She seemed deflated and unhappy, a stark contrast to how she had been when she had first walked in.

"Hey, Adeara! On Earth with have a saying, 'The worst memories stick with us, while the nice ones always seem to slip through our fingers.' So don't let it keep you down, okay?" I said.

She turned back and gave me a big smile, "I take it that it is human custom to cheer up a depressed friend?"

"It is," I nodded, "And I felt bad. Visit me again sometime, okay?" She smiled very widely at that, and even waved at me happily as she left, a bounce in her step again.

"There's a training session with the new tickling weapons in two standard hours! Get some rest... human friend," she called out as the door shut behind her and the lock clicked back into place.

Damn, the weapons. In my hypeand curiosity I had forgotten to ask about those. Another time then, I shrugged, as I plopped back on the metal bench, sighing. I still felt a bit like a jerk for asking her about it, and stirring up all these uncomfortable memories, but hey, I wasn't here to look for an alien girlfriend! I tried to tell myself. I needed to get out of here, and something told me what I had learned was important. They say knowledge was power, and knowing the existence of such a law definitely was some powerful knowledge indeed. So these aliens, couldn't kill us, eh? I thought as I stared at the pen I had stashed.

"I guess I should teach Adeara the most important thing about human beings... we're very hypocritical and we don't like being anyone's guinea pigs," I muttered under my breath as I pulled the metal pen out again and began to twirl it around my fingers.

Laying down on the metal bench, I waited to meet my fellow human subjects. If my plan of escape were ever to come to fruition, I'm sure I would need their help.
15222111111111211.title: Meet the Human Expert

152221111111112111.content:
Relaxing on the surprisingly-comfy-once-you-got-used-to-it metal bench, I jolted upright when a heard a sharp strict voice on the intercom bark out a strict order. "All human subjects! The weapon training session is due to begin in ten standard minutes. Prepare!"

There was a clicking at my door and two armed guards arrived to frogmarch me out. For the first time, I saw a part of the spaceship (or whatever we were on) aside from my room. The hall way was lined with cells, mostly empty, but that did little to reassure me. Eventually, the narrow passage opened up into what looked like a tiny train station with a small platform flanked by two sts of rails. Everything was made of the same silvery metal, glinting in the multiple lights that shone from the ceiling. A line of four other humans was made in the center of the platform, watched by a set of guards. The guy at the end of the line turned back nervously, and I was certainly surprised.

"Robb!" I said, immediately recognizing his auburn hair and dorky button-up black pajamas adorned with stars and moons.

"No way! Bro, I can't believe you're here too! Rach, look who it is!" Robb said, his expression brightening as he waved to me. I glanced at the girl next to him in the vest and the pink pajama bottoms and it was in fact, Rachel.

"Definitely didn't think I'd see you here," the tanned girl said with a grateful smile and she pulled me into a tight hug.

After she pulled away, I turned and gave Robb a friendly slap on the shoulders. This was feeling almost like a happy school reunion until a shout from a grim-faced guard shook us from our stupor.

"Listen, I need to talk to you guys," I whispered as I walked into position next to Robb.

"Tell me about it. There's some serious shizz going on here, man", Robb whispered back. "I thought aliens only abducted cows, man! What’s going on? I sure hope they don’t probe us…"

"They're not gonna probe us," I said automatically. I don't know why, they might well do, but it just seemed like such a ridiculous comment and Robb had whispered quite loudly. It attracted the attention of the other human captives, both of whim looked at me. One was none other than the middle-schooler who had pranked me earlier today, Katelyn. She waved cheerily at me, a bright smile on her face as she winked slyly. She was way too happy considering what was happening. Did she not know what was about to happen? More disturbingly, did she know, and was she looking forward to it? Next to her was a dark-haired girl who I think I shared a class with last year. What was her name? Janet? Jane? Jessie? For the life of me I couldn't remember.

I was still trying to recall her name when I noticed a sixth captive joining our ranks, escorted by the guards like I was. It was a blonde woman whom I recognized as one of the lifeguards at our local pool where I went swimming occasionally, sometimes fantasizing of having her tasty feet all to myself. As she stumbled into our makeshift line, I found myself staring at her feet, tanned from her many hours at the pool and with rose-red nail polish on her toes.

A booming voice shook me from my thoughts.

"Welcome, my eager little test subjects!" shouted a dramatic voice, which I recognized belonged to the demented Professor Vordin. "You lucky six have been chosen to help us in our experiments!" Vordin said, sounding absolutely thrilled. "And you six have the unique and rare honor of testing our most recent batch of experimental weapons for us in a simulated environment. If nothing goes wrong and none of you get fatally injured or damaged, we promise that there will be Earth cake!"

"He's not very reassuring, is he?" Robb whispered. I smirked as I realized that the reward of cake was almost certainly Adeara's recommendation. The cake probably wasn't even a lie.

"Whichever group has the longest survivor wins! Oh, and to give you all a little incentive to perform well, the losing group will volunteer themselves to test Research Group D's creative interrogation methods and tools!" Vordin declared joyfully. "So do fight hard, my lovely subjects! And may the best specimen win!"

At that moment, two pods rolled next to the platform on the rails, one red and blue. Their shape reminded me of those angular bullet trains you'd find in Japan, except with most of the train part cut off. A hatch opened on each, leading to a surprisingly comfy-looking room with seats on the side and a series of metal boxes at the front of the car. One of the guards announced the groups. "Numbers 1, 2 and 3, in the red pod, Numbers 4, 5 and 6, in blue!"

I looked around as the remaining guards divided us up into our teams and began directing us to our respective pods. Pushed by my own pair of guards towards the blue pod, I saw that Robb and Rachel were...
152221111111112111.title: May the Most Ticklish Win

1522211111111121111.content:
"Robb, Rachel!" I yelled as I saw them and Katelyn get shepherded into the red pod.

Before I heard a reply, the doors to each pod slammed shut and I felt the ground shake as the pods began moving along the rails again. I gritted my teeth in frustration before looking at my blue team members. For some reason, maybe because of the fact I was a guy or that I seemed to be the most confident, they seemed to be waiting for me to take charge. The dark-haired girl whose name I didn't remember just stared at the ground, an ambiguous expression on her face like she was just waiting for her stop on a hight-tech cable car.

The blonde lifeguard looked scared and spoke in a light Australian accent. I think this was the first time I actually heard her speak. "What are they gonna do to us?" she asked, fear creeping into her voice.

"Make us tickle each other, probably. With their weird weapons they've been developing," I replied.

There was a brief silence while both of them looked at me incredulously. "Wait? TICKLING?"

"You guys know they want us to test non-lethal weapons, right?" I looked at two blank faces. "You’re kidding me, neither of you bothered to ask?"

"I was scared," the Australian admitted.

"So that's the punishment if we lose? They're going to tickle us, aren't they? Ugh, I hate being tickled..." The other girl whimpered.

I almost wanted to laugh out loud, but it really didn't seem appropriate. "All things considered, it could be worse. We could have been abducted by the type of aliens who want to shove unmentionably large objects up our butts." That earned a nervous laugh from the lifeguard and a half-smile from my dark-haired former classmate. "I know this probably is kind of an awkward place for us all to meet, but we're all in this together, okay?" I said putting my hand forward. My basketball coach had always made us do this before and after games and I had never understood why, but now I did. It was to keep us all together.

"You're right," said the life-guard, smiling as she reached forward and placed her hand on top of mine. "And my name's Liz by the way. wish we could've met under... less strange circumstances."

"I'm Jen," the dark-haired girl said, putting her hand in as well. Then, with a determined voice, she added, "Let's not lose, I'd rather avoid creative interrogation."

"The weapons are probably in these," I said, inspecting the metal boxes at the front of the car. There were three, each one about the size of a shipping crate, and I motioned for Jen and Liz to take the other two while I approached the middle one. We opened them up and found an assortment of very strange looking weapons. In my box I found what appeared to be a futuristic musket with a glove attached to the end of the barrel. Curious, I pointed it at the floor and pulled the trigger, and to my surprise a ghostly blue hand flew out in an arc and bounced off the floor till it hit a target, a target that happened to be Jen's pale bare foot.

"Hehehehe, oh gehehehit it off!" she said giggling helplessly as she kicked her foot and tried swatting the blue hand with her hands to no avail. I searched for an off dial or switch on the rifle, but to be honest, I was in no real hurry. Hearing Jen's laughter reminded me about her. I remembered sitting behind her in science class, where she would always don a pair of nice sandals that showed off her pale feet with black painted toenails quite well.
