After a while Jen snatched the gun from my hand, annoyed that I was taking so long and turned it off herself. "This... one's mine," she said still panting.

"Fine, fine," I laughed. "Jeez, you can aim the next one on me, if you like."

"Okay, if you say so," Liz said mischievously, pulling the weapon out of her box and aiming it right at me. The thing looked like a bowcaster from Star Wars, those weapons that the furry wookies used. It looked like a crossbow and a laser gun hybrid, the barrel sticking out from the crossbow. Liz pulled the trigger and a shimmering net flew out, reflecting the light as it flew at me. Like those gladiator nets, it somehow expanded to wrap around me, covering everything from my shoulders to my ankles in wiry mesh. I flopped about on the floor, but I couldn't get free.

"Jen?" Liz said, looking at the dark-haired girl. The lifeguard and my former classmate echanged glances, and when they turned to face me there was a devilish grin on both their faces as they sat down by my feet.

"Now ladies..." I began, but I was silenced when I felt Liz's warm hands pull my toes back. To make matters worse, Jen then began to scrape her fingertips around my sensitive, stretched soles. I immediately began laughing, scrunching my feet in an effort to minimize the effectiveness of her technique. It didn't help much.

"You know, I take that back, tickling's alright," Jen chuckled as she scribbled and walked her nails up my feet.

"Ooh, let me have a go too," Liz said as she released my toes and scooted over. Now Jen had my left foot and Liz had my right.

"Guhuhuys C'mon! We gohohohota focus!" I said, already wiggling around in the mesh, giggling incessantly.

"This is practice," Liz giggled, now dragging a lone finger up my arch, making me bounce and squirm. "Well, not very good practice, since I doubt that anybody else here is nearly as ticklish as you," Liz giggled as she started spidering the tops of my feet, leading me to burst into uncontrollable laughter

"I know, he has such soft feet for a guy," Jen commented as if observing the weather, all the while her fingers never stopped tormenting my foot. "And so ticklish too."

"Totally."

"EHEHEHENOUGH!" I bellowed as loudly and forcefully as I could. After a lot of thrashing, I managed to tear the net enough for me to free myself, still giggling as I pulled myself away from my two tormentors. Breathless, I knew somewhere a scientist on Vordin's team was being ridiculed for making such weak nets.

"Yes, boss," Liz said mischievously as she gestured to the last box. "Hehe, I feel a little bad that I had so much fun there, so fair's fair, you can use the last one on me."

"Well, fair's fair," I said with a big grin on my face as I stood up and walked over to the final box, looking in at the last contraption. It looked like some kind of silver gun that reminded me of one of those speedometer guns traffic police used. Picking it up, I aimed the thing at her tummy. She was dressed in pajamas like the rest of us, and hers were a pair of baggy shorts and a crop top that exposed plenty of her ticklish belly, inviting me to wonder just how ticklish she was there. To my disappointment however, after I pulled the trigger, nothing happened. I pulled it again, but still nothing. A third time yielded no results either.

"Hey, sorry mate, I gave you a chance," Liz shrugged, smiling that she had lucked out and avoided a well-deserved tickling.

"Fine," I stewed, searching for something else on the gun that might be required to activate it. When I saw a little switch on the side of the gun, I mentally kicked myself. I flipped it and was about to fire at Liz when the door to the pod opened, revealing our battleground for the experiment.

"Looks like we're here," I said, looking out onto the simulation grounds. The place was obviously a practice arena, with platforms and random blocks and steps and grates and a bunch of random stuff so coincidentally place to make perfect cover or an ideal base. There was no way things were just this perfect on a real battlefield.

"Alright, let's do this," I said determinedly, looking at my teammates. Both had eager looks on their faces, a stark contrast with their previously worried expressions. I guess tickling me gave them a morale boost. "Oh, and Liz? I'm taking the...
1522211111111121111.title: Friendly Enemies And Evil Friends

15222111111111211112.content:
"I'll take the weird gun. See if I can figure out how it work it," I said. I tucked the gun into the waistband of my boxer shorts and handed Liz the crossbow.

I didn't really like the idea of wading in with an untested weapon, but I figured I had a bigger chance of surviving with this wild card than the skinny blonde. Then a cheeky smile spread across my face as I realized I was basically venturing into a war game where the crossfire was tickling.

"This is like the Hunger games, but, uh, weirder," Liz said, as she stepped out of the pod with her weapon raised, looking around for our opponents in case they had arrived before us.

"Yeah, the Tickle Games," I said, unable to resist.

"It looks like the red pod was dropped over there," Jen said, drawing our attention back to the battlefield. "If the three of us surround them," she gestured to two chest-high walls and a large metal crate, "we can catch them in a crossfire, they'll be easy pickings," she said confidently.

"How do you know this?" I asked.

"My Dad takes me hunting. Says we should all know how to protect ourselves," she said proudly.

"Wow, I really didn't have you pegged as that kind of person, Jen," I said, shaking my head.

She laughed. "You were in my science class last year, weren't you? I still don't understand why you never said hi to me."

I mumbled some excuse as I looked away a bit embarrassed. I probably should've at some point, but I was one of the guys who often preferred to admire a lovely lady from afar, though I sure as hell wasn't gonna tell her that.

"Anyway!" she said, going back to the topic of battle tactics. "If I get on top of that crate we'll have a great vantage spot. I should be able to snipe them pretty easily," she said motioning with the gun.

"Thank goodness we have you." Both Jen and Liz looked at me, and I nodded. "Let's do it," I said as we charged for our designated positions. It sure was awkward running without shoes, but the cold metal ground seemed strangely free of debris such as glass or stones to cut my feet on.

I crouched and ducked my head under the wall that served as a barrier and occasionally snuck glances at the red pod. I felt reassured that I had Liz alongside me, because at least we knew for a fact that her weapon actually worked. I pulled my gun out and fiddled with the dials and buttons a bit more, but when I aimed at a platform above me and pulled the trigger nothing happened.

"Is that gun still being uncooperative?" Liz asked me, huddling alongside me as she looked at the strange silver contraption.

"Looks like it, I guess I'll have to count on you girls winning the day for me," I said, smiling at her.

"Hopefully we won't let you down," she smiled back. It was amazing, even in a bizarre alien environment and situations as strange as this, the smile of a pretty girl still managed to make my heart thump hard in my chest.

The sound of Jen firing her rifle shook me from my trance. I looked up and saw the gun's floating hands fly through the air and hit their targets. Soon laughter was filling the air. I slowly raised my head to see what happened, then ducked it quickly as a bright green blob flew past. Adrenaline pumped, I noticed Liz had taken the initiative and was standing up and firing nets at the red base.

Wow, I thought, realizing my teammates were actually pretty good at this. Jen really knew her stuff and this tactic had worked wonders. I saw a girl over to the side try to creep up on on the box, Katelyn I recognized, with some kind of melee tool in hand which looked suspiciously like a taser. She tried to scramble up to the shooter's nest but I yelled a warning to Jen. As professional as ever, instead of looking at me Jen looked for Katelyn, found her, and aimed her weapon at the foe. The gun launched out a series hands that hit Katelyn's knees, feet and a headshot resulted in a hand hitting her neck. It was actually quite strange to witness, I saw Jen fire shot after shot, but instead of Katelyn being blown backwards like you'd expect the glowing hands just stopped as soon as they made contact, and hovered there, tickling the spots where they landed. After sustaining so many, Katelyn, was squealing with laughter when she finally made it to the top of the crate. The hands on the legs and knees were making her footsteps shaky (especially the ones on her feet, I remember a rumor that her feet was the most ticklish pair in the entire middle school). Despite this, Katelyn got within range and swung her weapon, which I suspected would tickle quite powerfully if it connected. Before the blow landed however, Jen just hopped off the crate, firing the gun one more time with one hand in a move that reminded me a lot of a scene from an action-movie. By the time Katelyn jumped back down again to follow her foe, she was easily brought down by a well aimed attack from Liz's bowgun. As Katelyn landed at my feet, wrapped in the mesh and giggling as the hands still continued to tickle away, I was sorely tempted to confirm the rumor and give her feet a good tickling. She definitely had it coming. And after all, my teammates weren't just good. They were awesome.
15222111111111211112.title: The Tickle Games

152221111111112111122.content:
"This is gonna be too easy, we're so gonna kick your butts," I said, not realizing I was tempting fate as I bent down and picked up Katelyn's weapon, "Now I wonder what this does," I murmured, teasing the girl who had gang-tickled me senseless just the previous morning. I tapped it against Katelyn's pale bare feet, and she screamed with laughter as the device jolted ticklish nerve endings in her foot. I hummed inquisitively and kept it pressed against her flopping foot. "So that's what it does." There was some more frantic giggling and kicking and laughing before suddenly it all stopped as I realized she had fainted. I noticed the ghostly hands from Jen's gun had disappeared too.

"Hey guys, check this out," I said turning to my team, taser still in hand

"Oi! Give us a hand, you lazy bugger!" I heard Liz shout, I stood up to see what she was yelling about.

Jen was on her side and I saw that some kind of strange green blob had splattered over her arms and across her gun. The Aussie lifeguard was trying to remove the shiny goo or tear it apart or something, but her hands would just reach through the goo every time she tried to dislodge her Jen's hands.

"Pretty cool toy, huh?" I heard a confident voice boast proudly. I turned and saw Robb smiling confidently, a weapon that resembled a shotgun with a barrel the size of a CD in his hands, just before he began laughing as he casually fired a few more shots in our direction, forcing us to scatter. A shot caught Jen on her ankles, trapping them, forcing her to tumble to the ground. "And check this out!" He called to me and Liz as we scrambled behind another wall.

I heard Jen burst into laughter and couldn't resist sneaking a glance over. Robb had launched more shots at her so her entire body, excluding her head, was encased in the green muck. But for some reason, despite the fact that the goo seemed as firm as concrete when keeping Jen's body trapped in place, Robb's hands could flow straight through the goo, allowing him to tickle his prisoner at his leisure.

"That's some crazy suspended animation shizz going on right here. Dude, these toys are insane!" he cackled with the same excited fervor when he told me the Kinect was going to "totally going to revolutionize gaming forever, bro". For some reason, I imagined he would get on splendidly with the other mad scientists working here. Maybe I should see if we could get him introduced to Professor Vordin.

"C'mon, we got to help her!" Liz said determinedly, her Australian accent growing thicker as she got more stressed out by the loss of her teammate.

"He's got a gun!" I said, trying to pull her back.

"So do we!" she snapped, brandishing her crossbow as she prepared to fire. "C'mon, you're meant to be pro at this! Gimme a hand!"

"Wait, I am?" I asked, wondering exactly what I was supposed to be so good at. Shaking strange ideas from my head, I lunged after her, trying to grab her and pull her back under the cover. I missed by a hair. I leapt out of cover just in time to see Liz with her crossbow aimed at Robb's back. I was actually amazed at our good fortune, I couldn't believe that Robb had actually lost us and turned his head. He had always claimed that gaming gave him cat-like reflexes and incredible awareness.

Liz pulled the trigger and the net flew out and nailed Robb good and done, ensnaring his limbs as he flew to the ground like a tall tree.

"Wooot!" the Australian girl cheered as she sauntered over to where his squirming body lay. "I told you we'd get him," she said triumphantly.

"Woah, Liz! Hold up!" I said, trying to hop over the wall, tripping over it in the process.

"We got you tough guy, now let's hear you laugh," I heard Liz say, followed by Robb's laughter echoing across the room.

Something didn't add up. Why would Robb expose himself so fully? Then something clicked in my head, something that I should've long before... Robb wasn't ticklish.

"Heh heh heh, it's a trap!" Robb laughed, and I was pretty sure it wasn't because of the tickling. He sounded absolutely delighted, as if it was a phrase he had wanted to say for ages but never had opportunity to.

I stood up just in time to see Liz get tickle-ambushed from behind as Rachel flew into the picture, slipping her fingers under Liz's thin shirt and stroking the Australian girl's sides. A few frankly adorable squeaks later, Liz managed to pry her opponent off, retaliating by tickling the exposed tanned skin along Rach's midriff in retaliation. Rachel squealed loudly as she was tickled back. Fortunately for her, she had some backup. During the struggle, the girls had inadvertently stepped on, kicked, and landed on Robb a few times. Although he looked mighty uncomfortable, all the commotion tore through the weak mesh. He quikly rejoined the fray by reaching out tickling Liz's belly. Liz turned, jolted, and tried to spin away from him instinctively, but Rachel was right there with her long fingernails waiting. A few squeals later, and the two had quickly tickled her to the ground. Rachel straddled Liz's waist and continued poking and scratching at the trapped Aussie's sensitive belly.

Liz tried to curl up in a ball, thrashing her blonde hair from side-to-side, but Rachel was ruthless, sticking her tongue out as she drove the blonde girl mad with laughter.

"Hey, you're next. We got a score to settle," she called, grinning at me.

I jolted upright, realizing I had been enjoying the show a little too much and hadn't actually snapped into action until they had a two-on-one advantage.

"Looks like it's time to use my secret weapon," I declared loudly as I whipped out the gun from the waistband of my boxer shorts. It still didn't do a damn thing, but they didn't know that. And what they didn't know... could hurt them.

"Well? Go on then? We got one of those too," Rachel dared, smiling evilly.

"And ours is bigger," Robb added helpfully, pointing his shotgun in my direction.

"Yeah, but my gun does something better than shooting goo though," I said, slowly walking forwards, still aiming my gun at them.

"And what's that?"

"It makes an excellent... diversion!" I yelled tossing the gun at them. I knew Vordin and Adeara would probably kill me for this, but hey, desperate times call for desperate measures. I had noticed Liz stirring earlier and I knew this would be the best, if not my only, opportunity for a counterattack.

"GG, man!" Robb smirked, ducking as the gun sailed right over his head. He began to raise his own weapon only to realize he couldn't as a meddlesome Aussie had just latched onto the barrel and pushed it down so it was now aimed against his legs. A brief struggle later and the goo gun launched a great big splotch at a surprised Robb's feet, ending up with him on the floor and the shotgun in Liz's hands.

"Never underestimate an Aussie," she smiled cockily as she pulled the trigger till he was enveloped in the mucky slime. He looked none too happy about it either.

"Nah, Australia's overrated," Rachel said, lunging at Liz's ribs from behind. Having already taken a lot of tickling, Liz fell quickly, trying to curl up in the fetal position as Rachel grabbed at her foe's sides, rummaged fingers over her ribcage, and snuck fingers under her armpits, depending on which was most easily accessible.

From so close up, I only just noticed that Rachel had a peculiar set of brown gloves on. They seemed simultaneously bristly and feathery at the same time, with long points that reminded me of guitar picks, slightly hooked to form some claw-like nails. The gloves made my skin crawl just looking at them, and I wondered just how much they would tickle. Part of me wanted to find out, since Rachel had certainly rather easily tickling Liz into submission.

"So, looks like it's just me and you now," she smiled, flexed her fingers menacingly.

"Wouldn't have it any other way, Rach," I smiled back. It was amazing how you could have a sense of competition in such things. I mean, motivating people by threatening the losers with tickling was one thing, but I could tell that Robb, Rachel, Liz, Jen and I, well, we'd had a lot fun doing this. There was a certain normality to it, like we had organizing some kind of paintball match except instead of paintball guns, we were given these and we just ran with it. It was almost like there were no aliens monitoring us, and we weren't on some giant spaceship God knows where. As far as Rachel and I were concerned, it was just the two of us, having another one of our tickle fights.

Of course, in those tickle fights, I did usually win...

"You think you can beat me, Rach? Even with those gloves, your belly is way too ticklish," I teased, beginning to trash talk already, swinging my baton eagerly.

"Speak for yourself, big boy, Katelyn has some suggestions on how to deal with you..." she replied, wiggling her fingers menacingly, and the mad scramble began.


"So, looks like it's just me and you now."
152221111111112111122.title: The Spirit of Competition

choices: A loud bell signaled the end of the fight
1522211111111121111221.content:
Rachel and I stared down each other, soon beginning to move in a circle around each other, looking for weaknesses in the other’s defenses. “Come on, Rach,” I taunted. “What are you waiting for? Are you scared of me?”

“I’m not scared of you,” Rachel announced, although her body betrayed her, still moving cautiously.

“You sure look terrified,” I proclaimed, trying to incite her to come at me. “If you’re not scared, why don’t you come on and try to get me?”

Rachel paused at this, giving me enough time to come in and strike with the tickle taser. I sprinted up and jabbed it into her belly, causing Rachel to squeal and back away. “AHAHA!” she laughed as she tried to escape, with me chasing her. Suddenly, she swiftly turned, fast enough so that I could not also make the turn, and ended up behind me. “You’re going to get it now.” Right then, I felt fingers under my arms, starting to tickle my armpits. My own arms shot down, trying to protect myself, but this only increased the tickling sensation.

“AHAHAHAHA!” I was now the one laughing. “THAHAHAT TIHIHIHICKLEHES!” As I felt the different tickle tools, including feathers, brushes, and fingers, tormenting my armpits and soon my sides, I began to squirm around, trying to shake Rachel loose. Thirty seconds later, I did so, running backwards with the tickle taser guarding my body.

“What’d you think of that?” Rachel asked deviously.

“It tickled quite a bit,” I responded, having finally caught my breath. “Now you’re going to get it again, and this time, it will stay with you.” I backed away slowly, with Rachel following me the entire time. Eventually, I got back to where the others had been trapped, and I easily found the goo gun, picking it up. “Hey, Rach, remember this?”

Rachel’s face quickly turned to one of fear as she began to run away, but she didn’t get far before I took a shot at her, trapping her legs. She turned around, prepared to fight me, but I simply shot another one at her arms, trapping them with her middle, leaving her midriff exposed. Once I finished covering everything but her head in the goo, I leaned down to begin the tickling. I brought the taser out and held it against her ticklish tummy, leading to screams of laughter, “AHAHAHAHAHAHA! NOHOHOHOHOT THEHEHEHEHERE!” My ticklish opponent squirmed as much as the goo allowed, but I kept the taser on her stomach, giving her no mercy. Before five minutes had passed, Rachel had given up all hope, begging me for mercy. “PLEHEHEHEHESE! IHIHIHI SUHUHUHUREHEHENDEHEHER!” Confident of my victory, I showed some mercy and took off the tickle taser, giving her a short break. This was not to last very long, though, as I removed her gloves and put them on myself. Just as quickly as I had stopped with the taser, my fingers dug into Rachel’s middle, armed with the tickly gloves. “AHAHAHAHAHA STAHAHAHAHAHAP! DOHOHOHONT UHUHUHSE THEHEHE GLOHOHOHOVES!” My friend had fallen into silent laughter in two more minutes, so I thought about giving her belly a break.
1522211111111121111221.title: Victory!

15222111111111211112211.content:
DING! A loud noise got my attention, and I stopped tickling Rachel’s belly, leaving her on the ground, panting for breath. Soon, several aliens and guards came onto the field, and they took Rachel, Robb, and Katelyn away. Adeara walked up with a few guards and addressed me, “Congratulations, subject five, on winning the simulation! We have Earth cake for you if you will follow us.” Jen, Liz, and I, although exhausted from the tickle fight, followed the scientist and guards through a few rooms until we came to one with food on a table. “Here is your reward, humans! According to our sources, this is chocolate Earth cake!” We sat down at the table, and the cake was served to us. When we started eating, we found that the cake was indeed chocolate, and it had vanilla frosting on it, making the food exponentially tastier. We finished the cake in about ten minutes, and then Adeara approached us again. “Would you like to see the other team’s punishments?”

“Of course!” I responded, and Adeara motioned for us to follow her. After walking through several rooms with Adeara and a couple guards, we heard frantic laugher and headed into a room.

The sight we came in on was quite an enjoyable one, as Katelyn was on the ground laughing hysterically. She was being tickled by Kelliah on her feet, restrained in a hogtie position by some mechanical trap. Meanwhile, some tendrils had sprouted out from the trap and were teasing her tummy and the rest of her upper body, leaving the girl helpless on the ground. This continued from the time that we walked in until about five minutes later, when the tendrils retreated. “You may stop now, Kelliah,” the loud voice of Vordin projected. “What did you think of the machine?”

Reluctantly, Kelliah lifted her fingers away from Katelyn’s bare soles. “What did you think, test subject one?” she questioned Katelyn. “How did the interrogation device compare to me?”

“They were both hehe very good hehe,” Katelyn continued to giggle a little while she answered. “You were hehe more effective hehe, but it was hehe close.”

“Well, I think that if the machine can get close to my skills, it is deserving of more funding,” Kelliah gave her approval to Vordin.

“Excellent!” Vordin proclaimed, shaking another alien’s hand. “We will discuss terms for funding your continued research. Who is our next excited test subject?”
15222111111111211112211.title: Reward Time!

choices: A loud klaxon signaled an end to the session.
1522211111111121111222.content:
As we stood opposite each other, waiting for the other to make a move, I was reminded of the shootouts in those wild west films.

Well, in those movies, typically the one who went first lost so... I flexed my right hand and beckoned to Rachel, giving her the universal 'bring-it-on' gesture. With surprising speed, she lunged forward with her gloves. In raising my hand to taunt her, I had foolishly left my underarm exposed and vulnerably, a fact she quickly took advantage of as she snuck a hand under my arm, tickling me ferociously. The furry glove combined some of the best of several tools: the softness of a feather, the pointiness of a bristle, and the firmness of a brush. It tickled quite powerfully, overwhelming my hollow with a variety of ticklish sensations. Rachel, grinning from ear to ear, decided to press her advantage, stepping around me to tickle me from behind and soon her fingers were tickling both underarms at once. I tried clamping my arms down, but all that achieved was a ticklish assault of a different kind as she tried to pry her fingers out. It also meant that, once her hands were free, she could move to another spot, and soon she was giving my ribs and sides a good teasing. Shaking and twisting left and right, I tried to spin loose, but she clung on to me like a cat, never letting go with her claws as she worked me over.

Desperate for respite, I jabbed blindly with the baton I had taken from Katelyn and was rewarded with a squeal as Rachel backed away, rubbing her tanned tummy with her forearm to get rid of the lingering sensations.

"Katelyn tried that thing on me earlier, it's quite effective," Rachel giggled, still massaging her tummy. "How do you like my gloves?"

"They're very... potent," I replied in what was probably the understatement of the year.

"Hmm, I wonder if they'll let me keep a pair afterwards," Rachel smiled as attacked again, reaching for my sides. "They'd come in handy during our tickle fights..."

My baton gave me the extra reach that Rachel lacked, and I tried to use that to my advantage, circling away from Rachel as she advanced, placing the baton between me and her in case she tried to charge again. I could tell she was getting frustrated, and sensing an opportunity I lunged forward... and got the baton wacked away from me as Rachel elegently sidestepped.

"Gotcha," she giggled, wiggling her fingers. "Now laugh for me!" Rachel smirked as she rushed at me, swiping with her dangerous-looking gloves... but at the last second, I managed to duck and weaved to the side, managing to trip her in the process!

Rachel tumbled to the floor, landing on her chest, temporarily stunned as the air got knocked out of her. Wasting no time, I dropped to the ground and hooked one arm around Rachel's ankles while flexing my other hand. Recovering, Rachel looked up and her eyes widened as she realized what was happening.

"Hey, Rach, how ticklish are your feet again?" I asked rhetorically as my fingers wormed into the soft sole of her foot.

Giggling too frenetically to reply, Rachel squirmed under me and tried to get away, but because my entire body weight pressed against her tanned legs she couldn't quite slip free. I began focusing on tickling her cute wiggling toes, pinching them and scratching the fleshy pad of her big toe as I tried to tickle the resistance out of her. But it seemed that she was too seasoned a tickle fight veteran to be taken out so easily, as she reached forward and started tickling my own feet with those menacing claws, putting eveything she had into her last-ditch attempt at winning.

Feeling giggles catch in the back of my throat, I tried to endure, to block it out, and focused all my attention back on Rachel's tanned soles. However, as a few seconds passed, I realized I wasn't gonna be able to win this one, caught in the hands, or wiggling fingers rather, of Rachel's semi-revival. I scrunched my toes, trying to protect them as much as possible from the tickles, but it seemed Rachel knew exactly how to counter that, using one hand to hold back my toes back and the other to probe her furry-gloved fingers all over the undersides of my ticklish toes, slipping between them and running the fibers on the sides of the little digits.

After a while the tickling grew too much and I no longer had the energy to fight back. Reflexively I pulled my foot away, jumping up and releasing my grasp on Rachel's bare foot. Skuttling away, I began rubbing my still tingling foot and tried to catch my breath.

Rachel didn't give me a millisecond to recover, jumping on me and straddling my torso. Feeling her warm body press against mine, I rather hoped she didn't notice the peak in my boxers (or did I? Rachel certainly seemed to be having a lot of fun as well, maybe she liked this as much as I did). All those concerns disappeared from my mind as Rachel's bristly gloves began making contact with my belly. I attempted a few defensive tickles, reaching up to try to tickle Rachel's tan skin, but whenever I did, her hands darted to my underarms and forced me to cover them the only way I could. When I was protecting them, Rachel was having a heyday on my ribs and belly, dashing her fingers across my skin in a haphazard manner, never letting me regain my balance to counterattack.

"Hahahahahah, Rahahahachehel! Stahahahap!" I squeaked, breathless with laughter.

"Not a chance, big boy, way too much fun," she giggled, exploring my ticklish body with her gloves while I writhed with laughter beneath her.
1522211111111121111222.title: Showdown

choices: I took one for the team.
Someone else beat me to it!
15222111111111211112221.content:
A loud noise that sounded like a horn-buzzer hybrid grated against my ears, a brief ring that I supposed signaled the end of the match. Rachel didn't take the queue however, flipping over and grabbing my feet. "Hear that, big boy?" she asked with an evil smile on her face. "We win this time. And I think a little victory reward is called for." With that she ran her fingers up and down my soles, the feather-bristle-claws tickling like mad. I can't say it was entirely unenjoyable, but it smited of injustice that she had already won and was now flaunting her advantage. Of course, when she began fiddling with my toes I was laughing too hard to care. The little fibers got between and underneath my digits, teasing tender skin that rarely felt anything. I completely lost it at that point, flailing my arms and bending my body, her weight on my shins keeping me from esaping.

This time, the ring from the klaxon was a bit longer and more insistent. Sighing, Rachel got off me, looking a little disappointed. I accepted her hand as she pulled me up. "Congrats, Rach, you earned it," I said with a smile that wasn't entirely due to all the tickling I'd just received.

"Maybe you'll have better luck next time," Rachel grinned at me, laying her hand on my chest (I managed to supress a giggle into a snicker). I leaned in, looking deep into her pretty eyes when the loud klaxon blared out a third annoying buzz. A group of purple-skinned alien scientists were making their way towards us (I don't know how they got here)with guards in tow. One of the scientists separated us and pulled us to treat the minor scrapes and bruises we had had gotten from our tussling. As I grumbled under my breath at their lousy timing, I was greeted cheerily by the bubbly Professor Adeara.

"Number five!" she called happily. "You did brilliantly! Here, this should rehydrate you," she said, offering a small silver flask. I took a swig, emptying the little canister in one go, and instantly I felt loads better, as if I'd just got out of bed and felt as fresh a the day. I handed the flask back to Adeara, who leaned forward and whispered in my ear. "Oh, and I should warn you that Professor Vordin isn't happy you used his expensive prototype as a projectile."

"What's he going to do to me? Tickle me some more?" I said loudly, catching Rachel's eye and I saw her giggle at my remark.

"Is that a human joke? Human humor, oh, I must remember that one..." Adeara said excitedly as she jotted it down on her handheld monitor. "Nonetheless, I'm afraid you and your team must come with me, Professor Vordin was rather insistent we test some of the more, uh, intense devices on you."

"Well, not much I can do about it, unless you break me out of here," I joked, watching her carefully to gauge her reaction.

"Now why would I do that!" she laughed. "You are by far our most responsive specimen, and not to mention the most fascinating..." she dwindled off, sounding almost flustered at the end of the sentence. Adeara then brightened up. "Ahh, now I understand! That was another case of human humor! I really must jot this down... Excuse me!" she said, calling over a couple of guards. "Number five is ready to be taken exam room one! Please escort him!"

The guards came over all business-like and stood in front of me. One gestured to follow him, and as he turned I did so, the other guard tailing us. "See you soon, number five," Adeara said with a large and obvious wink as the guards walked me off. I couldn't help but chuckle at the cheesy action. I bet Adeara had come across that in one of her papers and had been just aching to try it for ages. I was marched off to one side of the battlegound where one of my guards swiped a keycard and opened a pair of metal doors. We continued down the hallway past a number of large laboratories. I peered in through the glass on either side of me at the teams of purple-skinned aliens of all physiques and both genders working on a variety of mechanical apparatus, maintaining constant focus on their tasks. They all had one these tight-fitting white clothes, which I assumed was their equivalent of lab coats. Once in a while I saw someone wearing one of those shiny silver jackets like Kelliah had, looking curiously at what was going on.

After a few turns we arrived at what I assumed was exam room one. It looked similar to my room, only it was far larger and with a series of the metal clamp beds on one side. A group of scientists and guards were there already, three white-garbed men and six guards lined up behind them. The two escorting me joined them, assuming the same position like a rank of eery robots. My teammates, the blonde Australian lifeguard Liz and dark-haired Jen, were there as well, looking a bit nervously at the scientists and guards. I walked over, joining them.

"Hey guys, sorry I couldn't win," I apologized, more out of manners more than anything else. To be honest, I wasn't really that bothered by this latest development. I was used to constantly being in these kinds of, well, 'ticklish' situations. I just hoped my teammates would be alright. Jen looked a little edgy, clearly she was more fond of holding the feather than being subjected to it, so to speak. I knew a few like that.

Liz looked a bit apprehensive as well, though a little less frightened. "It won't be too bad, right? I mean, I guess I can handle a bit of tickling... I get plenty of that from my co-workers at the pool."

My eyes widened. "Really?" I asked, sensing the answer would be quite interesting.

"Yeah. You know how some lifeguards like to wear those shades? Well, for some of us it's because sometimes we like to catch a few Z's while we're up there," she admitted with a laugh. "And my co-workers love to poke my ribs and tickle my feet as they walked past, saying they were just making sure I wasn't dozing off. A few times they even invited some swimmers to do it too!"

"That's unbelievable," I laughed, visualizing the incident in my mind. I instantly wished I spent more time at the pool, and made a mental note to remedy that when - if - we got back.

"It's not funny!" Liz exclaimed, trying to keep a straight face, though a smile was tugging at her lips. I reached over stroked her sides, making her burst into cute giggles.

"C'mon, it is a little bit funny, isn't it?" I teased, continuing to flick a finger across her sides, her thin pajamas providing little resistance.

"Okay, maybe it is a little funny," Liz giggled, giving me a big smile.

"Well, looks like you three are the lucky ones who get the pleasure of trying out Research Team D 's exciting new inventions!" blared an annoyingly ecstatic voice. I mentally groaned as the frenetic voice of Professor Vordin ruined yet another one of these moments. Dammit, just leave us alone for a few seconds!

I turned and saw that the Professor himself was choosing to oversee the events, with the moody Kelliah in tow behind him. The professor was a little shorter than I imagined, and the tentacles on his head that served as his species' equivalent of hair was a little shorter than I'd thought, but I instantly recognized his irritatingly high-pitched voice and frantic babbling. I really hoped he wouldn't start a running commentary.

"Team D, show us what brilliant machines you wish to test on these very eager test subjects," Vordin beamed as one group of three nervous-looking purple-skinned scientists walked forward, each with a metal suitcase-like contraption in hand. "Come on now, don't be shy! Tell us what miraculous devices you've created!"

The scientists actually seemed a tad bit overwhelmed by Vordin's enthusiasm, one of them timidly offering their device. It was if they brought a baking soda volcano to a science fair and the announcer was hyping up the crowd. "We've developed a machine in the guise of a simple outdoor sleeping device," the scientist said, rolling out a rather plain-looking sleeping bag onto one of the metal beds. Kelliah raised her eyebrows (eyebrow muscles) skeptically at the device. "It's designed to look innocuous to lure a potential victim or fool a tired captive," the scientist said nervously, reaching into his pocket for a black handkerchief and dabbing his face with it.

"Well, what does it do?" Kelliah asked loudly.

"Of course, of course, um," the scientist stammered, looking at Jen and Liz and I. "Cou-could one of you please demonstrate?"

"Alright, now who wants to be the lucky first person?" Vordin asked cheerily as he looked over at the three of us.
15222111111111211112221.title: The Claws of De-feet

152221111111112111122212.content:
"Alright, fine," Liz said, her accent heavy with anxiety. "Let's just get this over with."

"Excellent, just excellent! Thank you very much, number six, I'm sure you'll love this device!" Vordin exclaimed loudly.

"Erm, right," she grumbled, clearly growing a little annoyed by the guy's voice herself. "So, what do I do?"

The scientist motioned to the sleeping bag and Liz climbed in tentatively. I felt a bit bad about letting Liz take a hit - after all, she was tickled pretty good out there - but I figured that she was the one who volunteered, and I wasn't feeling to preppy after Rachel's victory tickles myself.

"Is the material comfortable? We took lengths to ensure to fabric would not irritate the skin previous to activation," the scientist asked.

"Uh, yeah, it's pretty comfy," Liz replied, sounding a bit surprised by the scientist's apparent concern.

"We also intended for a secondary function of the device to be used a standard sleeping device if need be," the scientist said, reporting to Vordin, who nodded sagely. Kelliah, on the other hand, was a lot less impressed and sighed impatiently. "We have yet to see if the primary function works. Was a greater deal of time and resources spent in developing this secondary function?"

"No, it most certainly was not!" the scientist cried sharply. "Please allow us to demonstrate," he said, pulling out a black remote control. "Each unit is remotely controlled by one of these. It controls the unit's functions, one of which is quick and effective restraint. Observe."

Liz gasped as the sleeping bag visibly tightened around her like it had shrunk three sizes, wrapping her like a mummy.

"We implemented reinforced cords within the cushioning which tighten and constrain the target, also foring excess materials and vibrators into available crevice like between the arms and toes. They are unbreakable by most species, and can be magnitized to stick to any metal surface, keeping the subject still," the scientist said proudly. To prove his point, he asked, "Can you move, number six?"

"No, no. Not at all," Liz said, trying but failing to squirm out.

"And, of course, we know that there are those interrogators who prefer to work personally, and we included an option to expose areas of the captive's body as they please," the scientist continued, pressing another button on his little remote. The material beneath Liz's bound ankles blossomed open, revealing a pair of ticklish Australian feet. She wiggled her red-painted toes nervously, aware of how exposed and trapped her bare feet now were.

"Hmmm, I think we ought to test how secure those cords are," Kelliah purred, walking over to where Liz's soft feet laid ripe for the taking, or rather, tickling.

"Oh, Kelliah, you never could resist taking a hands-on approach, could you?" Vordin laughed good-naturedly.

"Of course not doctor. I wonder, are all you humans as ticklish as number five over there?" she asked rhetorically, shrugging a shoulder towards me. "If so, then I will surely enjoy myself." Jen glanced at me sideways and I felt my cheeks flushing.

"Don't ask," I whispered to her.

"Don't need to, I can guess well enough," she giggled as she quickly skittered her hands over my ribs. I couldn't suppress a squeak, but thankfully Kelliah had already begun on Liz's feet, the Aussie's giggling masking any noise I made.

Kelliah was complimenting the heavily-modified sleeping bag's design as she casually dragged her nails up and down Liz's sensitive soles, scratching up and down her arches. Liz tried to thrash around, but all she could do was scrunch her toes and shake her blonde hair wildly. With a smile on his face, the scientist helpfully pressed a button on the remote that shot out additional straps that went around Liz’s wiggling red-painted toes, leaving her worst spot fully exposed. I didn't know whether he was motivated at the popularity of his device or how entertaining the show was, but regardless Liz now found that she was no longer able to protect her worst sweet spot.

"Hahahahah! Gohohohod thahahat tickles!" she said, laughing ever harder now as Kelliah's wicked sharp nails prodded and scratched all over her toes, pinching them and scratching between and underneath.

"Of course, we also know that sometimes an interrogator will be content to let the machine do its job. That is what these other dials are for," the scientist explained, gesturing to the remote as Kelliah stopped her assault and Liz's laughter began to die down. "We have installed vibrators at strategic locations, observe," he announced, turning one of the dials.

Immediately, Liz's head jolted to one side, the life guard once again giggling and squeaking with laughter.

"Subject six, can you report where the tickling is situated?" the scientist asked inquiringly.

"My tuhuhumy heheheheh," Liz squeaked.

The scientist returned the knob to its original position and another dial was turned. "How about now?"

"My knehehees," Liz panted, now only occasionally giggling. Evidently her knees were not an especially ticklish spot.

A different dial turned. "And now?"

"Ohhhohohhoho, my gahahahawd! My armpihihits!" Liz said, exploding with laughter.

This time, after returning the setting to zero, the scientist pressed an ominous red button. "Now where?"

"Ohohohohoho gohohohowd, everyhehehehhewhere!" Liz said, shrieking with laughter, tears in her eyes.

The scientist pressed the red button again, letting Liz catch her breath. "You see, Professor Vordin, we planted a vibrator at several strategic locations. As a result, whoever controls the remote has the luxury of easily tickling the subject's knees, underarms, sides, stomach, thighs, or feet. All at once is an option as well, as you have just observed" the scientist said, pressing the red button again and Liz again began screaming with laughter. "The machine can remain active for suspended durations of time as well. The battery easily lasts over ninety-six hours."

"A most remarkable invention," Vordin said, applauding the device. "Genius if I may say so myself. And who would ever see it coming? A most effective trap indeed!" I found it a little scary to be honest. I sure wouldn't want to be tickled constantly for more than four days straight like that. I'd lose my mind! Of course, Vordin's comment sort of ruined the scariness. I couldn't help but roll my eyes - who wouldn't be suspicious of random sleeping bag just lying around in the middle of nowhere. Then again, who would see it coming?

"So as you can see, it is quite effective and useful, and we feel that it deserves some extra funding. Given the time and money, we can develop the vibrators a bit more and perhaps invent a way to stretch the target beneath the exterior so that all locations are exposed," the scientist smiled. It seemed hearing Liz's ticklish laughter and given him a much needed confidence-boost.

"What do you say, subject six? Was it effective? Was my tickling worse or the device's?" Kelliah said in a tone that could almost be interpreted as threatening.

"Um, I would, uh, have to say that," Liz stuttered, wilting under Kelliah's stern glare. "They were both, as um, effective."

Kelliah turned to Vordin. "Well," she said decisively, "any device that can tickle half as well as I can is a worthy investment in my opinion. I personally believe that this project is worth the investment. What do you say Doctor?"

"I agree wholly Kelliah! So it is decided, congratulations!" Vordin nodded, leaping forward and energetically shaking the scientist's hand.

The scientist pressed a button and the sleeping bag went slack, letting the Aussie move freely. As he and Vording and Kelliah all shook hands and talked, Liz crawled out of the device, looking absolutely exhausted, and I rushed forward to help her up. "You, okay?" I asked, concerned.

"A... bit... too intense... for my... liking," she said between breaths. "Promise me you'll never tickle me that hard, alright? You too, Jen!"

I laughed, happy to see that, although fatigued, she was otherwise unharmed and okay. "We promise," we both said, grinning.

"Good. I think I'm gonna take a nap now. I need some real sleep." Liz said as she yawned and dropped to the floor rather unceremoniously. Her body curled up into the fetal position, and Jen and I couldn't help but share a smile.

We weren't the only ones to notice Liz's exhaustion. Upon glancing at the tired blonde, Kelliah gestured to the guards. "She's had enough for today. Take her back to her room and give her something soft to lay on that's not one of those units." Nodding, a pair of guards walked forward. One stooped down and picked Liz up in a bridal carry, and soon it was just me and Jen and the aliens.

"Well, let's a get move on, shall we?" Vordin asked, even more enthusiastic after the success of the previous demonstration. "We still two more inventions to evaluate, and two more eager test subjects!" he gabbled, as I noticed the next alien scientist in line bring their suitcase over. "Do we have a volunteer? Who wants to be tortured for the sake of science next? Come now, don't make me choose!"

Jen and I looked at each other.
152221111111112111122212.title: For Science!

1522211111111121111222122.content:
"I really goofed up in the game just now, boss. I'll take this one," Jen told me solemnly, standing up to volunteer.

"Wait, Jen, you don't have to do this," I whispered, grabbing her arm.

Kneeling back down, she gave a sad smile. "Don't worry. It's sweet that you're concerned though." Her smile quickly turned mischievous. "I'm sure you can think of a way to make it up to me later," she whispered back as she gave me a parting poke to the sides. Giggling, I reluctanly let her arm go. She stood up and stepped forward.

"Wonderful, just wonderful!" Vordin exclaimed excitedly. "Always a delight to see a subject curious to make his or her or its own mark on history!" Vordin cheered, clapping his hands together happily. I was vexingly reminded of a giddy child on christmas. "Now what incredible innovative invention do you have to show us?" he asked, addressing the scientist currently setting up his device. In his hands were a mandheld laser gun and a small black monitor that looked remarkably like an iPad.

"We have been developing a weapon designed for more covert forms of torture and distance stimulation," the scientist said confidently. Obviously this purple-skinned alien was far more sure of himself than his colleague before him, never skipping a beat when showing his invention to Vordin up close. "It works by essentially creating a magnetic trace of the nerve endings in the target, and the infra-red lasers connects those to transmit the signals to the target." Vordin nodded sagely, but everyone else - including the other scientists - had a blank look on their face that said that they had no idea what he just said. "Perhaps a demonstration would aid this explanation." Aiming the laser at Jen's feet, he pushed a button and an outline of Jen's bare feet appeared on the iPad monitor. It was an exact visual replica, everthing from the cute birthmark she had under the ball of her right foot to her slightly calloused heels. The scientist casually dragged a finger down Jen's left arch, and her eyebrows shot up as she gave a little squeal, hopping up and rubbing her foot and flexing it to rub off the phantom tickles. On the monitor, the image of her feet flexed in time with the original.

"That's absolutely amazing!" I found myself saying out loud, sitting up straight on the floor and staring wide-eyed at the monitor. It was true. While the first invention had been something that humans could have conceivably invented, this was something that on all acounts should have been impossible. But if there was one thing I knew, it was that once aliens were involved, everything you knew about physics and science went out the window. My enthusiasm was contagious as Doctor Vordin practiacally mirrored me.

"Number five is correct. This is a remarkable breakthrough in stimulation development! True scientific progress!" Vordin said, almost crying with laughter. In fact, he was so enthused that he leaped forward and began shaking the scientist's hand with vigor. The presenter smiled proudly, drawing the ire of the other scientists.

"It truly is amazing gimmick. Though you have yet to explain how this is useful," Kelliah said skeptically. "How is this superior to standard interrogation procedures? Especially if it only works when the subject needs to be naked?" she asked, pointing at Jen's bare feet.

The scientist stiffened, too wrapped up in Vordin's hype to take offense at the verbal jab, replied excitedly. "Well, Madame Kelliah, the subject need not be unclothed for the devices to work," he answered, bringing out two other monitors and pointing the laser gun at Jen's belly and underarms. Visual copies appeared on the two new monitors, every bend and shift Jen made affecting the image. "This device can target any area on the body, and the lasers can pass through several layers of clothing," he said, demonstrating. He wiggled his fingers into the monitor of Jen's belly until she was squealing with laughter, despite the fact her pajama top actually covered her stomach considerably adequately. "Please observe as well that using the monitors we can also implement certain specified tools." As the scientist now began tapping the handheld monitors that represented Jen's tummy with a pen, she burst into uncontrollable fits of laughter.

The monitors were being passed around, everyone taking turns tickling poor Jen to tears, and now Kelliah had her hands on the monitor that held Jen's feet.

I watched as Kelliah began playing with Jen's feet, finding it most amusing as she began stroking her sole on the monitor with a pen and seeing the foot wiggle both on the monitor and in person as Jen tried to shake and rub her feet to get rid of the lingering sensations to no avail. The details looked perfect from what I could see. It was really was a piece of incredible technology. Kelliah seemed impressed by the technology as well, as she gave the tops of the Jen's plump toes a quick tickle, watching them scrunch and wiggle.

Vordin had the monitor denoting Jen's stomach, and was prodding and poking it with the pen, tittering quietly as he saw Jen clutch her torso and laugh. A few experimental delves into Jen's belly button revealed that it was quite a vulnerable spot, based on her surprisingly high-pitched squeals of laughter. Since Jen was such a tomboy I didn't know her voice would actually go that high.

After Kelliah also had a play with Jen's armpits, stroking them till Jen was almost weeping with laughter, the scientist continued.

"The lasers also leave a residue that lasts from ten to twelve standard days, meaning that the laser gun does not need to be constantly renewed every hour and thus can be used to interrogate targets from a distance over several days. One can sometimes endure one tickling session, but a non-stop session that disrupts their routine and affects their mental and physical state? No one can endure that," the scientist said self-assuredly. Jen looked very frightened at the prospect of suffering this for ten days, and noticing her concerned face the scientist wuickly reassured her. "The residue used at present is of a more short-term variety, lasting only an hour or two. Don't worry number two, we will not force you to be subjected to this for days." Jen looked relieved, at least as relieved as she could be while laughing her head off.

"What do you think, Kelliah?" Vordin asked after a few more quick pokes of Jen's navel. "I believe this device has great, great potential!"

"With all due respect, Professor, you always believe that. A test subject is only so reliable. I doubt this device is truly as impactful as they claim. May I?" Kelliah asked, gesturing to Vordin, who nodded as Kelliah stood up. "I doubt that your machine is nearly as efficient as an old-fashioned hands-on approach. It seems to be nothing but a superfluous and unnecessary invention."

The scientist smiled through gritted teeth. "The device is not meant merely for standard interrogation tasks. Imagine the ace pilot in an enemy fleet, about to engage the enemy only to suddenly be overcome by sensations that seem to come from nowhere. Provided this invention stay top-secret, it can even be used to convince individuals of their own insanity."

"I doubt a few lingering sensations would drastically effect the performance of the truly talented," Kelliah said snidely, shaking her head.

"Then we'd like to suggest a wager," the scientist said boldly. After conferring with his colleagues for a moment, he returned and voiced the wager. "We believe that our device could affect the performance of one even as mighty as you."

"You are a fool if you think I will-" Kelliah began, her voice dangerous.

"Kelliah! I do apologize, but I am pulling rank on you," Vordin said apologetically. "If you are truly convinced it will have no effect, then you should accept this wager. I wish to see the device in a practical situation and assess it's potency."

"Very well. But if I am to accept this wager, I wish to add a term. If this device fails, I would like to see the presenting scientist punished for his insolent behavior and insubordination. And that I will handle the disciplining myself."

I shivered. I remember being under Kelliah's wicked sharp purple fingernails. It was quite an intense and harrowing event, even for a self-proclaimed veteran of such experiences like myself.

The confident scientist didn't miss a beat however. "We accept your terms on the conditions that should you lose, you will assist the next group in their next demonstration. As a test subject."

I was rapidly developing a great deal of respect for this man for the sheer size of his balls, er, or whatever the alien equivalent was.

Kelliah looked like she was considering doing something drastic, but a look from Vordin disarmed her.

"Very well. I won't lose anyway," she said, crossing her arms. "You will regret making such a foolish wager."
1522211111111121111222122.title: For Science! Part 2

15222111111111211112221221.content:
"You have a reputation for being a gifted speaker, Madame Kelliah. Could you read this copy of the speech you gave at the previous Tehnological Advancement Convention?" The scientist handed Kelliah a stack of papers (aliens use paper, go figure) and she snatched it out of his hands. Vordin, eager to see thepractical experiment smiled at Jen and motioned for her to sit down.

Sitting calmly on her reclined chair, Kelliah crossed her legs, cleared her throat, and began to read aloud.

Relieved to be free of further testing, Jen walked tiredly back over to where I was sitting, joining me again. "You sure lucked out," I half-whispered to her as she sat down. "They barely tickled you!"

"I wouldn't call that barely, though maybe it is by your standards," she sighed, shrugging. "But I don't blame 'em. That purple chick looks way prettier and way more ticklish than me," she commented, sounding a tad insecure.

When she mentioned that Kelliah was more ticklish than she was in a sad tone, I arched my eyebrows slightly. Still, I felt a twinge of sympathy as I put a reassuring arm around her shoulders, pulling her closer. I realized that Jen, being a bit of a tomboy, must have been teased in class at some point for not being like the girly-girls. After all, seeing her in battle earlier, I felt pretty certain this girl would rather play paintball than go to cheer practice.

"You okay?" I asked, a tad bit concerned.

"Yeah," she replied, hugging her knees and looking at her toes. I noticed for the first time that her toenails were painted black to match her short dark hair and dark eyes. I remembered my friend Robb once telling me about his theory that a lot of girls who put on make up and nail polish do it because they don't feel pretty enough and they need it to boost their confidence. It was very deep, and I found myself agreeing with his reasoning. Of course, this was coming from a guy who once, in all seriousness, told me that he thought X-men were real. He still hasn't lived that down.

"You're definitely way prettier than her, Jen. For a start, her hair is pretty freaky," I said, trying to cheer her up.

"Her hair is a little weird, isn't it?" she agreed, breaking into a smile as she looked at the purple mop of tentacles on Kelliah's head, taking comfort that someone thought she looked better than this alien suit. "Thanks, I guess I was feeling a tad down and very tired," she admitted, looking down at her toes again and blushing gently. "I needed that. Thank you."

"Hey, don't worry about it, Jen. And by the way, just my own observation, I think you're for sure as ticklish as her," I said, poking her in the sides and getting a quiet squeak. "If not more," I teased, sticking my tongue at her.

"I'm still nowhere near as sensitive as you though," she teased back, returning the poke. On that note, with smiles on both our faces, we sat back and focused our attention on Kelliah's show. What happened next was probably the most entertaining thing we ever saw.

After zapping Kelliah's feet with the receptor, the presenting scientist placed his monitor on his lap. With the pen, he began making long slow strokes up and down the outline of a pair of arches. I noticed that he had changed something on his pen, as a tiny feather-like attachment had replaced the pointy tip that was there before. Nonetheless, it was just as effective, if not even more in this circumstance.

Kelliah's voice trembled ever so slightly and I saw her shake a little, crossing her legs again. It seemed she had just felt the ticklish lick of a feather slowly tracing along her feet. She seemed to shake it off quickly and continued talking calmly and clearly, doing her best to the show the tickling wasn't affecting her, but I knew from experience that feathers were terrific for inciting the kind of giggly laughter that is hard to ignore. The scientist had started at one heel and slowly swept the feather up and down the foot, using long teasing stokes on Kelliah’s soles. The purple-skinned alien woman began to squirm more as the feather went from heel to toe in a slow rhythmic pattern. Twice I caught Kelliah cracking a grin.

I also began to realize how covert this could be. To a casual observer, the scientist would look to be a reporter, writing notes.

I was also reminded of a funny moment I had in maths class a few years back. It was warm summer's day so I was wearing flip-flops, and I had made the mistake of using my foot to poke the sides of a cute girl sitting next to me in class. After I prodded her in the ribs, making her let out an adorable ticklish squeak that she somehow managed to pass off as a sneeze, she slipped my flip-flop off and refused to give it back. After pressing my foot in her lap, hissing at her to give my shoe back, she just grinned evilly and locked my foot in the crook of her arm. With my sensitive foot trapped there, she just tickled away as I tried to hold my giggles in as to not draw the teacher's ire. It got especially hilarious when the teacher asked me to answer a question and I couldn't help but giggling. Of course, soon the teacher saw that she had grabbed my foot and sent the two of us to detention. She felt guilty afterwards though, and I got a date with her for my troubles when I got to find out just how ticklish belly was.

Kelliah started slipping up and making more mistakes a few minutes in. At the five-minute mark she repeatedly mispronounced a difficult-to-say name due to the scientist constantly slipping the feathery quill in-between her toes. She closed her mouth, trying to keep the giggles from becoming too audible. She sighed, cleared her throat and attempted to center herself and continue the speech, but the tickling was clearly taking its toll. Kelliah began talking much quicker, speaking through gritted teeth with giggles slipping in every mid-sentence. Every now and then she had her hand over her mouth just to hide the fact she had a wide smile on her face that did not fit her serious demeanor.

Jen and I found the whole affair rather amusing, seeing Kelliah try her best to repress and deny the fact that she was in fact, feather-ticklish. I noticed when the feather teased her toes she couldn't stop her face from temporarily tightening in a ticklish grin, an expression that was erased as soon as it appeared. She began fidgeting much more now, her legs were constantly shifting and wiggling. She put her feet flat on the floor, crossed her legs, but not matter what she did it seemed like she couldn't shake the sensations that must've been flooding through her. Kelliah said her next few lines in a single rush of breath, speaking faster so as to try and get this speech over and done with, which made me think maybe she was further along the ticklish progreesion than I realized. It seemed she was barely about to suppress the giggles now as I watched the scientist drag the feather down the image of Kelliah's left arch. The remaining half of whatever she was saying turned into incomprehensible giggles. It looked like it was already over, and now it was only a matter of time until everyone here, including Kelliah herself, admitted it.

They were at the eight minute mark and it seemed that the scientist decided he'd had enough fun teasing Kelliah's pretty purple feet and was going to make her really squeal with laughter now. I saw him click the pen, and the feather tip was replaced with a far more bristly yet equally soft end, a paintbrush maybe. Then like he was painting a picture, he quickly waved the brush up Kelliah's scrunched feet, from her heel up to her toes like he was trying to outline every single wrinkle in her soles. The headstrong business woman, who had been worn-out from trying to keep her laughter bottled up for so long, couldn't handle the sudden intensity of tickling, and giggles burst from her mouth. The giggles quickly turned into straight, loud laughter when the brush snaked in-between her toes while they waited and began thoroughly exploring all those ticklish nooks and crannies along her poor toes. Kelliah panted, still giggling. All that fighting had worn her out and I doubted she could take another attack.

"Professor Vordin, I believe this should be a sufficient demonstration of how our invention affcts the performances of talented individuals, even Madame Kelliah," the scientist said smoothly, ceasing his tickling.

"Indeed! Well then, it looks like you've lost the wager Kelliah..." Vordin trailed off, smiling at the suit.

"No..." Kelliah insisted, still huffing and puffing. "I can... I can keep going!" Then the scientist scraped the brush up and down her soles, making the purple-skinned woman jump up and shriek with laughter.

"Sorry, my dear, but it seems that this invention has gotten the better of you!" Vordin said, laughing good-naturedly as Kelliah's breathing recovered and she sat back down, grumbling under her breath

I felt significantly better knowing that whatever the next invention was, I would have Kelliah laughing alongside me, an idea I found myself rather liking. No matter how intense it was, there would be a part of me that would be enjoying it. The same couldn't be said for Kelliah, and the idea of the high and mighty Kelliah squeaking with laughter next to me filled me with satisfaction.

"Well then, without any further ado, let us see the final invention then!" Vordin said excitedly. "We now have two more subjects ready to be tested for science!"

The next and final invention to be tested on the two of us was...
15222111111111211112221221.title: For Science! Part 3

choices: She tickled me with her fingers
She tickled me were her tongue
152221111111112111122212212.content:
"Oooh, now what is this?" Vordin exclaimed as the last presenter stepped forward, holding out his invention. Two large metal armbands rested in his palms.

"These were designed as new appendage extension utilities with a built in fail-safe mechanism. They were also designed to automatically incapacitate and interrogate captured targets."

"They don't look very impressive. What are they meant to do?" Kelliah asked pointedly, her tickling having not humbled nor embarrassed her in the slightest it seemed.

"May we demonstrate?" the scientist replied. Pressing a button on the armbands, he held them up and watched with us as they opened up slightly, letting someone slip their hands through. I couldn't help but notice how rather much they looked like iron shackles. The scientist looked from me to Kelliah. "An accurate demonstration requires two subjects, one wearing these..." he said uncertainly.

"Humans first," Kelliah said with mock politeness.

Glaring at her, I offered my arms and the scientist fixed the metal bands to my wrists. I winced slightly as the band tightened, digging into my skin and getting real tight.

"It's pretty snug," I said, "and not really in a good way. What do I do now?"

"Try reaching your appendage out," the scientist said helpfully, pointing to a series of metal chunks he set out for the demonstration. "See if you can pick one of those up."

I looked at him with doubt, but Professor Vordin stared at me expectantly with a manic excited expression on my face, so I decided I might as well try. Reaching my hand out, I was shocked when five metal tendrils flew out of slits on the armband, mirroring the actions of my fingers. I made a fist and the 'fingers' of the armband closed as well. Disappointingly enough, the tendrils seemed too heavy to pull my arm back and punch someone with, which meant my fantasy of becoming a superhero with them would have to be put on hold. Still, it was undeniably cool.

"Incredible! Absolutely incredible!" Vordin exclaimed very excitedly. "A most marvelous invention! I assume there are motion-sensitive neurons built into the surface of the material which is partially what allows it to mimic the action of the subject's organic arm?"

"Why yes!"

While the scientist and the professor continued to talk in techno-babble, I couldn't resist getting a dig in at Kelliah.

"I bet you wish you could have a play with this, huh? It's a pretty cool toy," I bragged, wiggling my fingers and watching the tendrils coming from my wrist wiggle like little snakes.

"Seems to me you weren't listening, subject five," she replied, arms crossed. "Remember these terms? 'Fail-safe mechanism', 'automatically incapacitate and interrogate targets'. I've been in this business long enough to know what they suggest. Those metal tendrils will turn on you soon." She gave me an evil smile. "And I look forward to seeing that."

"Well, if that's the case, I'll be sure to at least take you down with me," I threatened, wiggling my fingers. I hadn't actually meant to do it, but once I started wiggling my fingers at her the tendrils shot out and snared her wrists and ankles and lifted her up in the air. My arm strained at the weight, but thankfully I was in pretty good shape and the diminutive Kelliah couldn't have weighed much more than a hundred pounds.

With two tendrils taking care of binding her ankles and wrists together, there were eight other tendrils eager to instigate their programmed function. Kelliah was beginning to giggle as the vine-like tendrils began to poke around her midsection, her business attire providing little protection.

Kellliah was doing her best to draw Vordin's attention, but her pride stopped her from screaming at him as more tendrils began to tickle both her underarms as well, the metal burrowing through her sleeves and into her uniform. She flinched and shuddered as the cold metal wiggled and burrowed into her armpits. Vordin and the scientist continued to have an animated conversation about the tool's design, seemingly oblivious to Kelliah's predicament. The guards overlooking us seemed conflicted. On the one hand, that was one of their bosses being lifted and tormented. On the other hand, they had been specifically told that they should not risk damaging any prototypes at all costs. Then again, Kelliah would probably punish them severely if it turned out she was in real risk. But then again, they had all heard the wager Kelliah had lost and this would likely be a part of that.

With all those things in mind, they decided the best action was to do nothing, aside from occasionally look at each uncertainly as they waited for an order from Vordin.

After realizing that the guards weren't going to intervene, I started trying to direct the tendrils' attacks, and realized they were incredibly responsive to my pointing and gesturing. I nudged the tendrils and their blunt tips, aiming through her sleeves to continue worming along her underarms. Soon I could see the tendrils sliding along her hips and at the tops of her thighs as well, leading her to let out girlish squeaks with laughter I hadn't expected to hear from the serious business woman. With two strong tendrils restraining her and keeping her in the air, there were eight tendrils away at her ticklish body and though I was slightly disappointed to see that they lacked the manual dexterity to pull her heels off, they were more than sufficiently in tickling her into silent laughter.

As Kelliah giggled helpless in the air, I felt a rush of power that these armbands gave me. I actually considered trying to escape with the armbands as my weapons, busting out my friends and tickling anyone who stood in my way. The thought was dispelled when I remembered Kelliah's words, that the bands had a fail-safe mechanism. I also remembered the dozen guards who stood around me with stun guns and other weapons designed to immobilize me if not outright tickle into submission. There was also the fact that, even though I had been more or less tickled into signing the contract, I was beginning to have fun with her. It was like getting an easy and fun summer job, only weirder. But that aside, it even involved all my favorite things! I even made new friends here, and there was a part of me that just didn't want to see it all change too soon. I looked at the laughing purple-skinned alien in front of me. Sure, they were a strange species that seemed to believe all kinds of bizarre things about humans, but they weren't evil. You couldn't look at the joy on Vordin's face when he saw a new invention and say that he was evil. You couldn't look at the innate curiosity in Adeara's eyes and see evil. You couldn't look at Kelliah's detached demeanor and really say evil... maybe corporate, and a little unscrupulous, but not unrepentantly evil.

I smiled as Kelliah threw her head back in bursting laughter as a tendril had found a way to her tummy and was slowly exploring the insides of her belly button.

"A truly fascinating insight, Professor Vordin," the scientist smiled, as the pair finished their technical conversation.

"Please call me Solaris. And we should continue this conversation another time in my laboratory," Vordin nodded, as they turned to me and realized I had lifted Kelliah in the air and was tickling the living daylights out of her. I smiled guiltily.

They both looked at me, Kelliah and then at each other. "What an enthusiastic subject. Ever-eager to venture in the name of science," Vordin said after a moment of silence.

"Vordin!" Kelliah exclaimed angrily.

"Well, you did lose the wager, Kelliah... Still, could you please set her down subject five?" Vordin asked, before seeing my confused expression and gesturing to the scientist. "Kindly advice him, Timorous."

"Wiggle your fingers again, it will release the ensnared subject and reset the product's targeting-system," the scientist named Timorous chimed helpfully.

I wiggled my fingers and the tendrils instantly retracted, dropping a breathless Kelliah unceremoniously to the ground. A guard immediately went to her and helped her to her feet, but she quickly waved him away.

"You! Scientist!" Kelliah snapped. Timorous jumped and looked at her.

"Yes? How may I help you?"

"The product's fail-safe mechanism. Activate it. Now," she commanded.

The scientist looked at her then at Vordin. "The fail-safe mechanism will also initiate the device's interrogation protocols, did you wish to see a demonstration of those?"

"Indeed I did," Kelliah said through gritted teeth.

Vordin shrugged again. "You do have to admire her scientific curiosity."

The scientist pulled out a remote and pressed it. Suddenly, the armbands starting bending backwards as if pulled back by some unknown force. I tried resisting it, but before long my arms had been pulled backwards and the bands had snapped together behind my back like handcuffs. Then to make matters worse, the tendrils that I had freely manipulated like my fingers pulled up my ankles, hogtying me.

Kelliah cracked her knuckles. "Now, if you don't mind, I intend to test just how secure those bonds are."

"Oh, very well, Kelliah," Vordin nodded, before turning to his scientist friend, "She certainly is keen, isn't she?"

Kelliah licked her lips as she slowly made her way to me, her heels clacking on the metal floors. It certainly looked like she was looking forward to having revenge on me...
152221111111112111122212212.title: For Science! Part 4

choices: I woke up in the infirmary, with Adeara beside me.
I woke up strapped in an X-frame.
1522211111111121111222122121.content:
"I recall Professor Adearon telling me of a curious human phrase. I believe it goes 'the shoe is on the other foot', yes?" Kelliah said as she flipped me onto my belly and dug her hands vigorously into my underarms, scratching her nails into my hollows.

Hit with the sudden tickle attack, I tried squirming loose. Aside from squirming left and right however, there was little I could do. My underarms were completely helpless, and hers to explore in any way she pleased. Kelliah had a wide smile on her face as I attempted to roll around in ticklish agony. To make matters worse, I felt a cool tendril slipped around my big toes, pulling my feet taut as well. Cold metal tendrils then began slowly tracing up and down my trapped soles, making me lay on my side, giggling.

"Ah, yes. As Madame Kelliah is… demonstrating, the product does come with a built-in fail-safe mechanism," the scientist Tomorous explained.Â 

She continued to tease the sensitive skin of my underarms with her fingers, circling the edge of my armpit and slowly closing in on the center of one hollow while using slow, deliberate strokes on the other. It was always nerve-wracking when my ticklers would play these mind games with me, because sometimes I would realize I knew what was coming next and would start preemptively giggling, which would only make things worse.

I instinctively pulled at my restraints, but they still held tight, leaving my arms stretched out and helpless to resist the torment. As the circling got smaller and smaller, I began cackling louder right until her fingers brushed across the spot right at the the top of my ribs, where I couldn't help but give a rather unmanly squeak. Kelliah grinned, seeming to instantly realize that she had just stumbled across an especially soft spot. Still grinning, she placed two fingers on either side and claw her fingers on the exact spot on both sides like no tomorrow.

The pitch of my laughter heightened, and Kelliah seemed to enjoy this change, so she abandoned my underarms and turned me on my side to better access my stomach. She smiled, cracking her knuckles again and went and went in at full force along my rib cage with her devilish long fingernails. She alternated from stroking and scratching to poking and prodding. She jabbed her nails up and down my rib cage and rapidly all over my stomach. This was a very different type of tickling. It was still a scratchy tickling when she used the nails, but she was also poking and grabbing at my ribs, which is more of a muscle-stimulating tickle, which I quickly realized results in a much more guffawing version of my squeaky laughter.Â 

All the while the tendrils on my feet never stopped. They weren't the worst of it by far, but I was already breathless with laughter, and I didn't need yet another tickling stimuli in the background further overloading me with ticklish sensations.

"Oh, and those would be the self-interrogation protocols," Tomorous explained, noticing Vordin looking at the tendrils who never stopped stroking up and down on my feet. "We designed the devices to not only neutralize their users in the event of a perceived betrayal, but also activate their aiming protocols and begin torturing their former users."Â 

"That makes sense, especially after the Weeper disaster that happened two standard years ago," Kelliah added, casually joining the conversation as she continued torment my stomach. Both Vordin and Tomorous looked a bit surprised at her mulit-tasking, joining their conversation while all the while tickling me.Â 

Seeming to realize her fun was due to end soon, Kelliah pulled out all the stops and she seemed determined to make me really scream with laughter for getting her earlier on.Â
