She lunged with her fingers and plowed into my sides, being almost instantly rewarded with peals of frantic laughter. She moved one hand to my stomach and wiggling all around my navel, occasionally dipping in an out of it to keep things lively. She quickly skittered her fingers all over my mid-section, trying to give me a good all-over tickling. She started high, burrowing her fingers into my underarms again, before starting to move down, digging her nails along my ribs and into the spaces between them. The devious purple-skinned woman then began gliding up and down my quivering sides, right before stopping at my tummy and scritching at it lightly before digging her fingers into my belly.

To finish off, Kelliah would then use the tips of her nails to tickle my hipbones, before slowly working her way up again, going at my belly, stroking my sides, teasing my ribs before scraping her nails all over my underarms.Â 

"Alright Kelliah. As mastered as you are in this art, that is sufficient. You have more than adequately demonstrated the sturdiness of the bindings. Please try not to break subject five."

Kelliah gave a little sigh, before giving me a parting poke in the ribs as she stood up and returned to Vordin's side. Noticing that I was still a quivering giggling mess on the floor, Vordin stroked his chin thoughtfully.Â 

"Perhaps now would be an ideal time to test how the specimen responds to sleep deprivation-based interrogation techniques..."Â
1522211111111121111222122121.title: For Science! Finale

15222111111111211112221221211.content:
"You're awake! You wouldn't believe how hard it was to get you here. Vordin and Kelliah were all up for testing you some more before I pulled rank as their human specialist and said you probably wouldn't survive," Professor Adeara greeted cheerily. I groggily got up in what was probably the infirmary, judging all the beeping medical equipment and white sheets. "Of course, that's not quite true. You humans are an awfully resilient bunch, aren't you?" She said.

"Yes we are. Morning sleepyhead," answered a friendly voice. I turned to my left and saw my brown-haired friend Rachel sitting on the be beside mine. "Well, I'm not sure terms like morning apply when you're in space, but good to see you nonetheless," she smiled, scratching her head..

"Subject three and I were having the most enlightening conversation," Adeara said excitedly. "I had no idea Earth courtship rituals were so varied and intricate!"

"Uh, Rach? What have you been telling her?"

"Oh, y'know. Just girl talk," Rachel said, smiling mischievously. "Anyway, is he going to be discharged soon?"

"The monitors indicate he has returned to a normal state of health," Adeara said, reading the machines. "He should be, as soon as a discharge is authorized."

"Anyway, what are you doing here Rachel? Are you okay?"

"Well, y'see, with you taking a nap, Adeara needed another human interviewee. Seeing as there wasn't anything better to do, I volunteered. And I felt guilty for kicking your butt in the last game, so I asked if we could check in on you," Rachel said, I watched her sit on the edge of my bed and kick her tanned legs up and down as she explained. I noticed she was donning a white patient's gown, a mirror image of my own.

"So we came in, sat down, and you woke up a few minutes later," Adeara said, smiling.

"By the way, what happened to my clothes?" I said, sniffing my new garments.

"We've been in those stinky old clothes for so long, aren't you glad we at least have something new to wear?" Rachel said grumpily. I guess it was my mistake for bringing it up. Issues of fashion were savagely female-dominated in my life.

"They will be returned to you once your contract is completed," Adeara added.

"Fine, fine, so when can I get out of here?" I grumbled, as I leaned back into the pillow that smelled like bleach.

"As soon as someone with the proper authority signs you out," Adeara explained. She reached for a pen and signed a clipboard at the foot of my bed. "And now someone with the proper authority has signed you out," she grinned.

"You have been such a good influence on her," I whispered to Rachel, who just smiled mysteriously at me.

"So Adeara, now that he's up, didn't you promise a tour of the labs?" Rachel asked. "Humans never break promises y'know."

"I see..." Adeara murmured, scrawling in her handheld notebook again. "Very well then, you two have been such a great help to me and my research. It seems only appropriate I return the favor," Adeara said as she opened the door to the infirmary and guided us out.

Adeara led us to a large elevator, inside of which she pressed a button with some strange writing on it. In this place it was hard to tell whether we were going up or down, but either way we arrived at our floor within a few seconds. We entered some kind of entryway guarded by two muscly aliens, but neither acknowledged our arrival aside from a respectful nod at Adeara. We opened a pair of double doors and walked into a large hall, with tables full of strange devices and blueprints and purple-skinned scientists working on all sorts of inventions. Further along the hallway narrowed a bit to accompany a series of rooms walled off by glass windows, probably experimenting rooms. The place was bustling with activity, and a few scientists greeted Adeara as they passed, unconcerned with the two test subjects. "Wow, so these are the labs. Look at all this amazing technology!" Rachel exclaimed, clearly impressed. I was a bit surprised at this; I hadn't really pegged her as the geeky tech-loving type.

"Wow, looks like you're making some impressive things here. But with all this, how did you guys make a gun that didn't work? I mean, aside from screwing with me, obviously," I said, a tad sarcastically. It seemed sarcasm was lost on Adeara though, as she tugged the arm of one of the scientists nearby and promptly introduced me to him.

"This is Fellis!" she introduced cheerily. Fellis seemed none too happy to see us. Or at least one of us.

"Oh, um, I'm-"

"Subject five, I know. The one who threw my restrainer gun," he growled. From up close, I recognized him as the ballsy presenter who showcased the tickling monitors and won the wager with Kelliah. He was a bit on the short side, but his glare was still intimating.

"To be fair, it didn't work. What else could I do with it?" I said, trying to explain myself.

"Didn't you read the instructions?" he asked, incredulous. My explanation did little to appease him.

"There were instructions?"

"Oh yeah, all our weapons had instructions. Didn't you notice?" Rachel added.

"Not helping Rach!"

"Argh, of course. The lack of translation," Fellis sighed. "Damn shame. And I had wagered Tomorous that it would take two people out as well."

"Excuse me, what does your gun actually do?" I asked curiously, before hastily adding a "sir", when he glared at me.

"In simpler terms, it launches a pulse bubble, creating a static electro-void that causing all muscles within to seize up. Excellent for creating traps," he explained, sounding rather proud. "I actually have the prototype here, if you're eager for a demonstration."

"Wait, but your prototype didn't work! I pulled the trigger and everything!"

"This is why we need our instructions translated. The gun requires a minimum charge time to create the energy for the pulse bubble. You're meant to hold the trigger down, then it fires at the nearest surface upon release," Fellis grumbled, taking me by the arm. "I'll show you."

"Sweet," Rachel whistled, grinning. I bet she could smell that a good tickling was coming along.

Fellis lead/dragged me into an empty experimentation room and held out the prototype. He pulled the trigger, and after a charging period of about five seconds he released and a large, glowing, almost transparent sphere the size of a beach ball flew out of the gun and hovered a few feet from the ceiling.

"Anything you have on Earth that can do this?" he boasted proudly, adjusting a knob and the gun and the blue sphere followed wherever he was aiming at.

"So what does it do?" I asked.

Just when he was about to answer, Rachel and Adeara burst in, having just caught up. "Ooooh, what's that thing? It looks pretty trippy!" Rachel giggled, pointing at the shimmering sphere right about her head.

"Stick your hands in it, Rach. The scientist over here will show you," I said, thinking fast.

Rachel narrowed her eyes suspiciously, but it seemed her curiosity got the better of her and she raised her hands into the sphere. They didn't get very far until her arms slowed to a stop, most of her forearm inside the hovering ball of pulsating energy. Rachel was puzzled. "I don't feel anything..." she said, confused.

"It is not meant to cause sensation, only immobilize the muscles. Try pulling away," the scientist instructed.

Rachel tried giving a little yank on her arm, but nothing happened. She tried again to pull away, this time using all her might. Still nothing happened. It seemed like her arms were caught in mid-air. "Neat," I said, grinning. "Let's test how immobile she is. Want to join me, Adeara?"

"Wait, what? Comehohohon you guhuhuys!" Rachel began to complain, but I had already slipped my fingernails into the soft hollows under Rachel's arm and began wiggling them around. Throwing her head back, she laughed very hard as my nails skittered around her ticklish tanned skin. Adeara seemed conflicted at first, but her curiosity seemed to get the better of her as she began to caress Rachel’s ticklish sides with her long fingernails. Adeara began to snicker and giggle at the sight of her human friend being tickled to hysterics.

"Are tickling all humans such fun?" Adeara asked with a giggle, as the sound of Rachel's melodic laughter filled the room.

"I'd say so, yeah," I replied.

After a while, having tickled my fill and accruing enough guilt to actually feel bad, I decided that Rachel was done and stopped. Adeara reluctantly withdrew soon after, and Fellis retracted the sphere, leaving a giggling Rachel curled up on the floor. Impressed by the usefulness of the prototype I had assumed broken, I apologized for being rude to him and tossing his gun.

"Next time don't do something that may damage the weapon - these prototypes aren't cheap to make!" he scolded before softening somewhat. "You should pay a visit to Timorous. He said he wanted a word with you, Professor Adearon."

"What would you like to see next?" Adeara asked. I pondered our options. We could head to see the scientist Timorous, who had made the metallic armbands I had used to such great effect against Kelliah, or keep exploring. I could hear muffled laughter farther down the corridor, coming from the other experiment rooms.
15222111111111211112221221211.title: Meet the Maker

152221111111112111122212212111.content:
"Let's pay this Timorous dude a visit," I said, remembering the talkative presenter. Rachel gave me a funny look, and I explained how the scientist showcased the tentacle-wristbands-thingies as we headed for Timorous' lab.

"How is it that you meet all these people so fast?" she asked, still a bit breathless from her previous ordeal. 

I shrugged. "It's a gift. I guess I just attract people who have an affinity for tickling. Actually, these inventors remind me of Catherine back on Earth."

"Who?" 

Not bothering to explain, I just poked in her ribs. "Short version, she's basically like the scientists here, only... weirder. She builds stuff."

"That sounds incredible. When we get back to Earth, you have to introduce me to her!" Rachel said cheerily.

"Actually, about that..." Adeara cut in, somewhat nervous. "Forgive me for eavesdropping, but would you consider another contract?"

This caught Rachel and me so off-guard that we stopped right where we were, forcing Adeara to stop as well. "Wait, what?" I asked, shocked.

"Well, we know so little about humans, and you're the first we've picked up ever. I - we, we wish to study you, as well as have you test some of our non-military products. You could come to my world, see more of the galaxy," Adeara explained, looking a bit embarrassed at having brought it up.

"That's a kind offer Adeara, but as fun as this was I should really be getting myself back home as soon as I can. There're a lot of people waiting for me, a lot of things I need to get back to. I'm afraid I'm going to have to turn you down," Rachel said, shaking her head.

The human specialist then turned to me. This was so sudden and I hadn't really even thought about spending more time in space. Though now that I started thinking, it really appealed to me. Sure, I had things back in Earth, so did everybody, but nothing that I couldn't put on hold. Still, my parents...

"I'm interested, but I need to think about it. I'll get back to you, okay?" 

"Please consider it, won't you?" she said in such in such a hopeful manner I couldn't help but smile. "Anyway, we should move on. I feel we may be obstructing the hall."

"Is everybody getting the same offer?" I asked as we resumed walking.

"Yes. With so few humans to begin with, I can't be choosy. I'll take whoever'd interested."

"Gotcha. Anyway, let's go visit this Timorous guy, yeah?" I said, trying to get us back on track. A few minutes later we found ourselves in a fancy-looking office overlooking a few separate experimenting rooms and a large lab.

"Ahhh, Professor Adearon!" Timorous greeted her merrily. "So glad you could stop by. Do you like my new office? Professor Vordin bestowed it on me and has tripled my funding!"

"Congrats," I said automatically. Timorous peered at me, then a smile lit up his face.

"Ahh, I recognize you, human! Subject five, right?" he exclaimed proudly, as if distinguishing one human from another was a great achievement

"Actually, that's not my name..." I began to say, but he had already moved onto his next sentence. No wonder he and Vordin got on so well.

"What brings you here, Adearon?"

"I was giving them a tour of the labs," Adeara answered.  "They wanted to see some of our projects, so I'm showing them around.

"Ahh, of course! And this is perfect! I was about to call and ask you to recommend a human specimen or two for some experimentation!"

"Please don't call us specimens," Rachel said. "And what kind of experiments are you talking about here?"

"I'm glad you asked, number three! Perhaps a demonstration would suffice?" For some reason, the minute I heard that phrase all my muscles tensed up. Then I recalled all the times I'd heard that during my team's punishment. Timorous noticed and laughed at my reaction.

"Don't worry subject five! I simply meant I would show you what the team is working on," he chuckled, leading us to a small elevator that took us down into the lab below.

"So... anything interesting happen recently?" I asked randomly as the lift doors opened.

"I've received a new office," Tomorous said.

"I've met some human beings," Adeara smiled. 

"I've seen a lot of weird tickling devices," Rachel snorted.

"Actually, I do have to ask, why tickling? Was it just the first thing that popped into mind?" I asked, directing my questions to Timorous.

"Well, do you know about the Pacification Principle?"

Me and Rachel nodded. "Adeara told me after the battle. Basically it says that you can't kill anyone, even in warfare, or there are harsh consequences. So a new range of non-lethal weapons were made, meant for tickling instead of injuring. Right?" she asked.

"That's an accurate summary. Well, by fortunate coincidence, all the species who signed the pact happened to have innately high sensitivity in one region or another. Thus, tickling was logically the easiest non-lethal solution," Timorous explained. 

"Wow, I thought I had just gotten lucky," I sniggered, prompting Rachel to jab me in the ribs. 

"Nonetheless, I am glad I could clear that up for you, number five. But now I wish for your feedback," Timorous said as we began nearing the experimentation rooms.

As we peered into the first room, I could see a purple-skinned woman laughing hysterically. At least I assumed she was. Her mouth was wide open but I couldn't hear a thing, so I guessed that the rooms were soundproofed. I guess it's hard to concentrate with people screaming in the background.

She was trapped in some kind of rather devious x-frame. Her ankles and wrists were clamped in these strange cuffs, which were attached to some machine behind her. From the machine were several small mechanical arms, equipped with feathers that were brushing up and down her body. Each time she yanked on her wrists or ankles, the speed of the feathers increased slightly and another was added to the torment.

"That looks evil," Rachel said, looking nervous. "You aren't about to make us go in, are you?"

"Of course not! Unless one of you want to, of course..." Timorous said, his voice trailing off as he looked at us. I was seriously considering, but felt now was not the time. After a few seconds of silence, he continued. "You see, this interrogation device is designed to prey on the victim's mental state. The more you struggle, the more intense the torture becomes. It encourages the patient to be passive, which is exactly the mindset interrogative want," Tomorous said matter-of-factly.

"Who are the subjects?" I asked.

"Guards, of course. We have a rotation so every guard of average or above-average sensitivity has to spend a certain amount of time here."

I was quite surprised to learn that the oddly-attractive purple-skinned woman laughing her head was in fact a guard. After, um, 'observing' her figure, I realized she was quite lean and muscular. To be honest, I had thought all the guards were men, but as I thought about it I could see how it would be impossible to tell. Since they all wore bucket-helmets and armor thicker than what knights wore, distinction between male and female was almost impossible.

"You were totally checking her out," Rachel whispered as we moved on to the next experiment. I couldn't resist making one playful crack at her.

"Not at all, Rach. I was imagining you in her position."

"In your dreams," she said, laughing. 

We arrived at the next room to see another guard in what appeared to be the alien equivalent of a bathing suit. She seemed to be half-submerged in some kind of liquid, her arms shackled above her, leaving her underarms firmly exposed and taut. A pair of long automated scrub brushes were vigorously scrubbing every available inch of the ticklish girl. At her feet there were even small brushes going between her toes. 

"Ah yes, part of the Pacification Principle is a law that we must treat all prisoners with basic decency, allowing them to wash regularly. We like to take advantage of a nifty little loophole," Tomorous said casually.

"That looks quite... tickly," Rachel shuddered, brushing her skin instinctively. Watching the bristly scrubbers work must have made her own skin feel tingly like she was the one being tickled.

The next room was empty, aside from a pair of stocks. Timorous hummed in acknowledgment. "Ah, yes. This is why I called for your assistance, Adearon. Engineering has requested more crew members to help, leaving us short a few guards for subjects. Could you recommend one of your human subjects?"

"Woah, hold up! I don't want to get in there! My feet are way too ticklish for it!" Rachel exclaimed, looking at the brushes that surrounded the automated stocks.

"I wouldn't mind so much. Or..." I said, before turning cheekily to Adeara. "Why don't you have a go?"

"Me? I... have never been tickled before," she admitted, looking almost embarrassed about it. "And I am not certain I wish this to be my first experience."

"Well, back in Earth we have a way of solving problems like this," Rachel said with a smile. "It's called rock-paper-scissors. Sound fair?" After we explained the rules to Adeara, it was time to play.
152221111111112111122212212111.title: Further Research Required

1522211111111121111222122121111.content:
"Ready?" I asked getting my hands into position. It was decided that Adeara and I would play first, then the loser would play against Rachel.

"Yes I believe so! Oh this is rather exciting an authentic human game!" She eagerly exclaimed and mimicked the movement of my hands by putting her fist on her palm.

"Rock... Paper... Scissors!" I yell and to my dismay looked from own fist being a rock to Adeara who had chosen paper.

"I did it! Wow I won a human game! That was truly an enlightening experience." Adeara celebrated with a big smile. I couldn't help but smile as well seeing her so excited over something as simple as this. However, I realized one more failure and I would end up in those stocks. I had to hope that I would be victorious against Rachel.

"Good job!" I congratulated her and then turned to Rachel. "Well Rach I guess it's between you and me huh? Those stocks are just calling your name." I said playfully with a mischievous grin.

“Haha yeah right! You’re going to be the one in there losing your mind with I get to enjoy it from the comfort of the lab. In fact Timorous crank it up to its highest setting for the loser.” She shot back with a grin boasting confidence but her body language betrayed her, as seemed nervous as the prospect of being tickled on her extremely ticklish feet seemed a very real possibility. Timorous seemed very pleased to be getting to test the invention to its full capabilities. With the pre-game teasing out of the way we ready.

“Rock… Paper… Scissors!” I yelled once more and when I look down at the results I was surprised to see…
1522211111111121111222122121111.title: Round Two

1522211111111121111222122121112.content:
"One, two, three!" Rachel announced as we stuck our hands out. Both Rachel and I went for paper and Adeara had opted for stone, her small purple fist clenched rather tightly.

"Aha! I win, correct? Stone crushes palm!" Adeara cheered. It sounded like her excitement at playing a human game had not worn off. Rock-paper-scissors wasn't THAT fun. 

"Actually, paper wraps rock, so... You lose. Sorry," Rachel said, shrugging. 

"Paper wraps rock? How does that work? It seems... most illogical..." Adeara pouted. I could tell she was rather anxious about her time in those stocks, and I found her distress to be rather adorable to be honest.

"Sorry, but that's how the game works. "

"Do not worry, Adearon. I am able to halt the proceedings at any time should your condition require it," Timorous assured her as he pushed the glass door open and invited her in. "A clock wille be set for a short ten minute run, after which I will stop the machine."

"Oh, very well... but do, erm, have the machine function at a lower intensity, okay?"

"Of course," Timorous conferred as he locked her in. Adeara slid her purple feet out of her black workboots and slipped them into the stocks. Soon after a loud click confirmed that her feet were trapped in place. 

"Uh, I am unsure of this..." Adeara said, gulping as bands sprung out, wrapped around her shapely toes, and gently pulled them back. Her feet looked quite helpless in their stretched position. I had to say, I still found purple feet to be a bit strange, but I rather enjoyed the sight of her slender feet shaking in the stocks as she tested her bonds.

"Good luck!" I called, flashing her a thumbs-up, which she returned nervously, as we closed the door and waited for the machine to work its magic. Four purple digits appeared on a display beside the room, denoting ten minutes.

"So what kind of device is that anyway?" Rachel asked curiously as we gathered to watch through the observation window. We stared for a moment, just watching Adeara look around nervously and wiggle her toes. 

"And why isn't it working?" I asked.

"Oh, well, you see, it takes a moment to scan the nerve mappings and align the targeting algorithms. Do you see those sensors?" Timorous queried, pointing at black bulbs at the front of the top of the stocks. "They analyze sensitivity of skin by measuring the receptivity of nerves," he explained, staring at Adeara's purple feet. 

"Mm-hmm," I affirmed, grinning at the target of Timous' interest.

"Oh yes, I'd forgotten to answer your question, subject three," Timorous said, realizing he left Rachel hanging. He seemed entranced at the sight of Adeara's bare feet. I laughed to myself. Subtlety wasn't his strong suit. "They are specialized automated stocks, rather simple and inexpensive to manufacture. But for some reason despite its inefficiency and natural obstacles, foot tickling remains remarkably popular as an interrogation method universe-wide. Several of our planetside stores report that they sell out quite quickly, even the ones designed for recreational purposes. They're one of our top five selling products."

"That's amazing," I laughed.

"Wait, you guys have stores?" Rachel asked mouth agape. I could tell she was imagining a shopping mall full of nothing but tickle tools. I had to admit it wasn't a bad fantasy.

"Oh yes, OmniProd Corp has stores on 200 planets galaxy-wide, dominating the markets in almost a dozen clusters. We are even considering having one out on your pre-spaceflight planet, Earth. Do you think there would be a market for such items here?"

Me and Rachel looked at each other and couldn't resist giggling. "Oh, definitely," we said.

"Hmm, what an intriguing prospect. I shall have to bring that up with Solaris or Kelliah next time I see either of them," Timorous nodded. "Ah, it seems the device has completed the alignment of the targeting algorithms."

Sure enough, the machine stopped scanning and several fuzzy bendable sticks, which reminded me a lot of pipe-cleaners, popped out and began creeping through the gaps between Adeara's toes. I saw Adeara gasp, try to hold it in, before bursting into laughter over the span of about five seconds. Laughing her head off, the alien could do nothing but grab at the stocks as the sticks flexed and stroked all along her toes.

"It seems the targeting system analyzed that the tops of the feet are her most vulnerable spot," Timorous observed, reaching into his pocket for one of those small monitors I saw a lot of scientists carry.

"That's cool, but is it really necessary to note that down?" Rachel asked, peering over and grinning knowingly.

"I am merely recording observational results!" Tomorous denied. 

"Don't worry, we get it," I laughed, patting Tomorous on the shoulder. A gesture he responded to with confusion.

"Yes... well, moving on. These stocks have several functions and tools, and after they analyze the target's weak spot, they send out tools specialized to get the best reaction. Those," he said, pointing at the fuzzy pipe-cleaners, "are but one of the installed tools. It also comes equipped with quills, brushes, and feathers," Timorous proudly informed us.

Nodding, I said, "That's a good selection."

"Oh, there will be other attachments sold separately for the domestic model," he added. 

"Those are quite cool actually. Any chance I can bring a copy when I head back to Earth?" Rachel laughed, joking. At least I assumed she was joking. Rachel enjoyed the odd tickle fight and a few playful tickles every now and then, but it wasn't till we arrived here that I realized she might be more into this than I thought. It seemed that she was really turning out to be a rather enthusiastic tickle fan.

"By the way, professor? Are there security cameras here?" I asked.

"Of course. All experimentation areas have several security cameras installed all over," Timorous nodded. I found it rather amusing to be having a conversation while our tour guide was bursting with laughter inside a soundproofed room.

"Sweet."

"Why are you asking?" Rachel probed suspiciously, arms crossed.

"I'd quite like to get a tape of this," I answered, eyebrows raised. "I mean you would, wouldn't you Professor?"

Timorous just ignored me though and continued to watch Adeara thrash and squirm as her the pipe-cleaners tormented every spot of her ticklish purple toes. Rachel glared at me for a minute, and then her face softened. "She sure does look like she's having some fun, doesn't she? I feel a bit bad though; that's no way to have your first tickle." For some reason I found her phrasing amusing. She said "first tickle" the way a romantic might say "first kiss". 

"Don't be down, Rach. If you really want to, you can try out the next one," I teased, slipping my hands under her armpits and wiggling them. She shrieked and pushed me away, giggling. 

"Oh, you're getting it now," she declared, grabbing my ribs and tickling me to the ground.

"Please wait until we leave the labs to do that, the scientists are easily distracted" Timorous muttered as he walked in and separated the two of us. We were both giggling as we stood up. 

"Sorry about that. By the way, aren't the ten minutes up?" Rachel said, still a wide-smile on her face as she glanced at the digital clock inside the observation room. Four zeros were flashing incessantly, trying to get attention.

"Oh, of course," Tomorous said almost reluctantly, pressing a button and stopping the machine from further tormenting Adeara's ticklish toes. Rachel and I walked in and helped a shaky Adeara to her feet as Timorous bustled off to fetch her a drink.

"How was it?" Rachel asked as she helped Adeara put her boots back on. 

"That was rather... intense," Adeara panted, her purple forehead damp with sweat. "I would prefer it to be more gentle in the future."

"I'm sure that can be arranged," Rachel giggled as she stroked a finger up Adeara's sole before slipping her second shoe on. "Can you walk?"

Adeara nodded and got to her feet as Tomorous handed her a glass of water, which she chugged down quickly. "Thank you, Timorous. When your machine is finished, let me know. I think I would like to purchase one," she said, smiling at him.

"Good to see you're alright," I nodded, holding open the door for her as we all gathered outside the experimentation rooms. 

"Yes, it was quite the experience. But I fear that may have been too time-consuming. We were meant to meet Madame Kelliah as soon as you recovered. We are behind schedule for the next mock battle, you see."

"Well, if we're behind schedule anyway, what's another hour going to be? I say we keep exploring!" Rachel said rebelliously, looking at me for support.
1522211111111121111222122121112.title: Selling Your Product

152221112.content:
"You know, guys, the strangest thing happened when I got up, or tried to get up, this morning..."

Rachel turned from the screen to look at me. "Huh? What was that?"

"Oh, I woke up tied to the bed surrounded by a huge group of middle-school girls. They tickled me all over for a few hours; even moved me to a different part of the house at one point." I replied nonchalantly, like I might say "One of the corn flakes in my breakfast cereal was shaped like a maple leaf."

"What?!"

"It really wasn't that bad for most of it, it was when they decided to hang me from the garage ceiling and take a feather drill to my-"

Robb broke in. "Wait! Are you actually serious?"

"Definitely. I would never have been able to dream that up myself. As I was sayin'..."

"Wow. They really tickled you for hours straight? Why didn't one of your family members come in?"

"They were all out. Remind to keep some of my, uh, 'instruments', under lock and key in the future. It's ridiculous how many feathers you can find just lying around your house."

Rachel broke in, looking animated. "It's too bad they beat me to the punch. Maybe I should ask them which spots to press and how to press them to really drive you crazy for future reference. What did you say their names were?"

"I didn't. And I only got the names of two of them. Their leader looked to be the oldest. About fourteen, brunette, named Katelyn, actually pretty big for a little kid. One of the other's was a blonde named Cindy, and I think they must do this sort of thing all the time, judging from the way they handled some of those feathers."

Robb shifted his huge feet unconsciously. "Back up? Did you say her name was Katelyn, and she had dark hair?"

"Uh, yeah."

"Hmm. She sounds familiar, where have I heard that name before...Oh yeah! I think her parents asked me if I could baby-sit her for the evening. It could be a different Katelyn, but how many dark-haired, fourteen year-old girls are there running around?"

I snickered. "If that's the case, I think you'll have a busy evening, knowing her. If she asks if she could invite some friends over, me-thinks you're in for a surprise."

Rob shifted nervously, obviously not liking the idea that he would be alone in a house with a resourceful tickle-sadist, even if she was barely a teenager.

"You know what I didn't tell you guys? She even got it all on film. At least the part where her group had strung me up and were tickling me all over. Damn it was embarrassing, I wish there was some way to get the footage back before she does anything with it..."

Rachel, who had been looking intently between us as we discussed what Rob might be in for, suddenly spoke up. "What if we got Rob here to convince her to give the tape back? Or, more risky but with a higher chance of success, what if you sneak into the house and search her room while Robb's babysitting her? The two of them being the only others in the house... You should be able to recover it easily enough while she's distracted."

I shook my head in wonder. "Great idea, Rach. You up for it, Robb? You'd basically just be doing your job anyways, but keeping her downstairs long enough for me to retrieve something that was ill-gotten anyways."

Robb nodded resignedly. "Okay, I'll help you. Just let me know when you're done, and try not to make it very obvious that somebody ransacked her room at the exact same evening she was alone in the house with somebody she didn't even know very well, who just happened to go to the same school and be the same age as one of her most recent victims."

I just grinned, glad to have some help. "Thanks a lot, man. Just be careful around her, you never know what tricks she'll have up her sleeve. If she suspects us... Well, anyways, I wanna get ready ahead of time. What's the address?"
152221112.title: Cue maniacal laughter in 3,2,1,...

153.content:
I stared at the ceiling until I heard my bedroom door slowly open. A cloaked figure emerged and planted itself at the foot of my bed, within arms-reach of my vulnerable feet. The figure did a great job masking its figure. The only portion of the body that was revealed was the lower part of the face. In fact, I could only assume it was a female because of the fullness of the lips and what seemed to be a dark shade of lipstick. She spoke.

"Do you know who I am?"

I looked at her, puzzled.

"Not exactly, but it looks like you are a part of some sort of cult if I had to guess."

"I wouldn't call it a cult exactly. Have you ever heard of an organization called, The Shriek?"

My eyes widened upon hearing this. I had heard of The Shriek before. Nobody besides their victims had ever seen them before. It's a group that appears to target young adults, teenagers, and occasionally children. These victims have generally been described as degenerate young people in need of some sort of discipline. The Shriek apparently uses tickling to help correct bad behaviors, which kind of excites you. What could this woman possibly want with you? You rarely get yourself in any serious trouble, nothing that The Shriek would ever catch wind of. Apparently you've done something wrong if she's here. Either way, you aren't too worried. In fact, you might end up enjoying her.

"I have heard of you. Your group breaks into houses and tortures people, sound about right?" You intentionally sounded a bit snarky, in hopes of getting her upset.

"Actually, we break into the houses of whiny brats such as yourself and teach them lessons of respect and obedience. It appears that you could benefit from such a correction, yes? That is not why I am here, however. I am actually here to recruit you."

I was quite surprised by this. I was also pretty confused as to why she felt the need to tie me up and strip me if she was only going to hire me.

"Why go through all the trouble of stripping me and tying me up if you were just going to ask me to join you? I'm not saying I will join, but you have peaked my curiousity."

"Ahh but that's where you're wrong. First of all, it was no trouble at all. I have access to magics that did this to you. I can strip you, tie you up, and tickle you senseless without even lifting a finger. Secondly, I sense a strong magical connection to you. I know you love being tickled, as well as tickling others, which is why I am here. I also know that you're smart. I had a feeling that once you knew where I was from, that you would try to bait me into tickling you. I also have a feeling that you might try to deny my request in hopes that I would try to persuade you otherwise."

My heart was racing at this point. She pulled back her hood to reveal her beauty, as well as her long brunette hair.

"Rest assured, young man, no matter what you say, these long nails and luscious lips will soon be all over you, finding every little tickle spot that drives you wild. My only question for you is, where would you like me to start?"
153.title: A strange masked person wearing dark clothes - ...

choices: In a way that made me hornier
154.content:
"Well doesn't this bring back memories?"
I looked up to the door to see Stephanie, my old babysitter who is about nineteen now. She had ebony, black hair with the tips dyed bright pink. She had mischievous, hazel eyes and purple eye shadow and lipstick which complimented the wide smirk she had right now. She was also wearing a camo tank top, and black jeans. Back when me being home alone was more common, Stephanie would come over and babysit me all the time. We got along quite well, especially after we discovered that we both had an interest in tickling. After that, there were a number of times where we spent the visit tying each other up and tickling the other senseless. The nudity was something new however. And as hot as Steph was, not unwelcome at all.
"Indeed it does. Although not EVERYTHING about this does."
She smirked even wider. "Well it's been awhile. Thought I'd bring some new tricks since last time." She said as she started crawling up on top of me. I saw that her nails were painted black.
"Since when is undressing someone and tying them up in their sleep a trick."
"Since this!" She then started digging into my hip bones which caused me to squeal rather loudly. And cause a little something to pop up. "Good to see you're just as ticklish as ever." She noticed my erection before skittering two of her nails across it. "It's also good that you're just as into it."
"Well Steph. You got me good. It appears I'm at your mercy."
She grinned widely and she started tickling...
154.title: Stephanie

choices: Scribbles her nails furiously over them
1541.content:
She dug her fingers into my stomach and I howled with laughter twisting from side to side. I howled in hysterics and Stephainie giggled while she continued to tickle every inch of my upper body. I pulled against the restraints but they wouldent budge. My toes wiggled a mile a minute and my hair was getting disheveled.
I cried in laughter and yanked violently against the bonds which held me in place for her tickling.
"My stomach!" I cried. Stephanie smiled and blew a raspberry and I squealed in helpless giggles.
She smiled and tickled faster and tears started to leak out. Stephanie kept at it not stopping for a minute. I tried to speak but I couldent while laughing if I did I would be begging for more. She kept at it making sure to tickle my armpits as well. Stephanie then tickled my hips going lower. She stayed there making sure to tickle really well there while I giggled and pulled at the bonds more. She cooed gently at me as she knew that I loved this. She stopped and I breathed.
"Thanks" I breathed
"No problem I'm just going to talk to you." Stepahinie said.
"About what" He said breathing. She sighed and spoke to him.
"I'm going to tickle your feet next" She said. His eyes grew wide and pulled at the bonds and giggled in nervousness.
"Oh no!" He giggled. Stephanie smiled and knelt by his feet. She

info.brief_description: Read the story of a tickling-obsessed young man during his summer break.
info.description:
Spring semester ended the day before and I can't wait for summer break to start! It's a good thing my intense love of tickling - both receiving and dishing it out - is no secret. Can't wait to see what I get into! This sleepy suburban town also has an extensive and strange history filled with all kinds of weird happenings, so I bet something wacky's bound to happen sooner or later. I'm really looking forward to all the giggles, guffaws, shrieks, and lots of laughter that are coming this summer!

Yes, this poor boy's going to have a summer full of laughter, indeed. Any number of things may have happened. Did he get pranked by a bunch of classmates? Made a guinea pig by some evil corporation? Stumble across some crazy cult? Abducted by aliens? Tortured by a witch? Captured by an evil ring of traffickers? You get to decide what happens every step of the way.


Notes for Writers
- proper grammar
- first person past tense
- 500 word minimum per chapter
- all chapters are subject to editing
- chapters that break many rules will be deleted

Go nuts and have fun!
